1b1(mdo sde): /dkon mchog gsum+b+ha la phyag 'tshal lo//dbang stod phyag brgya pa
1b2(mdo sde): zhes bya ba/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag ni dus gosum
1b3(mdo sde): du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas
1b4(mdo sde): pa rab 'byams ma lus pa'i dkon mchog thams cad la gus par phyag 'tshal lo//
2a1(mdo sde): /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas rin
2a2(mdo sde): chen 'byung gnas de bzhin gshegs pa lo phyag 'tshal lo//lho phyogs kyis sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal
2a3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo//nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro de bzhin gshegs pa la
2a4(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo//byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo//byang shar
2a5(mdo sde): mtshams kyi sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo//shar lho
2b1(mdo sde): mtshams kyi sangs rgyas pad+mo dam pa'i drung la de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo//lho nub mtshams kyi sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil
2b2(mdo sde): 'khor snang ba dam po'i dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo//nub byung mtshams kyi sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa'i dpal
2b3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo//'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas pad+ma'i dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo//bla ma
2b4(mdo sde): phyogs kyi sangs rgyas dga' ba'i dpal de bzhin gshogs pa la phyag 'tshal lo//yang shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de
2b5(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo//lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung ldan de bzhin gshegaso ba la phyag 'tshal lo//
2b6(mdo sde): nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas de bzhin gshegs po la phyag 'tshal lo//byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas don yod grub pa de
3a1(mdo sde): /bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo//sangs rgyas dpa' brtan pa'i sde dga' ba'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag
3a2(mdo sde): 'tshal lo//sangs rgyas tshe mtha' yAs de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo//sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag
3a3(mdo sde): 'tsha lnga lo//sangs rgyas sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tsha lo//sangs rgyas sA la'i me tog kun tu rgyas po'i dbang
3a4(mdo sde): blo de bzhin gshegs pa li phyag 'tsha l-i lo//sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de bzhin ga shogs pa la phyag 'tshal lo//sangs rgyas rin po che'i dpal
3a5(mdo sde): gyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo//sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po de bzhin ga shwe gros pA la phyag 'tshal lo//sangs rgyas rnam
3a6(mdo sde): par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo//sangs rgyas ut+pa la rgyas pa bsung gi tog gi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs po la phyag
3b1(mdo sde): 'tshal lo//ngur smrig gi rgyal mtshan gyi 'jig rten na/sangs rgyas rdo rje snying pos 'dul ba de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo//phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo bskyugs
3b2(mdo sde): pa'i 'jig rten ni/sangs rgyas rab tu gdon mi za ba pad+mo rgyas pa'i sku de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo//rdul med pa'i 'jig rten ni/sangs rgyas seng ge de bzhin
3b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo//rab tu snang ba'i 'jig rten na/sangs rgyas rin po che'i gtsug phud de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo//'od bzang po'i 'jig rten
3b4(mdo sde): na/sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo//'da' bar dka' ba'i 'jig rten na sangs rgyas chos kyi 'od zer rab tu rgyas pa'i sku de bzhin
3b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo//rab tu bzang po'i 'jig rten na/sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa'i blo gros 'od zer gyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal
3b6(mdo sde): lo//me long gi dkyil 'khor bsgrags pa'i 'jig rten na/sangs rgyas zla ba'i thugs de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo//pad+mo dpal gyi 'jig rten na sangs rgyas
3b7(mdo sde): dpal bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa'i bar thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//sangs rgyas zla 'od de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo//sangs rgyas mdzes
4a1(mdo sde): //chen de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo//sangs rgyas 'jig rten gyi dkyil 'khor dbang po'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo//sangs
4a2(mdo sde): rgyas dga' ba'i spyan de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo//sangs rgyas rgya mtsho'i dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo//sangs rgyas gser gyi gzugs
4a3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo//sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa'i yon tan gyi 'od zer de bzhin gshegs pa lo phyag 'tshal lo//sangs rgyas smon lam thams
4a4(mdo sde): cad las byung ba'i rin po che'i gzi brjid shin tu 'phags pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo//sangs rgyas grags pa'i sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po de bzhin
4a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo//sangs rgyas ye shes rdo rje'i rgya mtsho'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo//sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs de bzhin
4a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo//sangs rgyas gtsug tor can de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo//sangs rgyas ma lus pa'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag
4a7(mdo sde): 'tshal lo//sangs rgyas log par drad sel de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo//sangs rgyas gser thub de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo//sangs rgyas 'od
4b1(mdo sde): srung de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo//'das pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//ma byon pa
4b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas thams cad lnga phyog 'tshal lo//byang chub sems dpa'i dpal rnam par snang mdzad chen po thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//sangs rgyas chos kyi sku mu med po la phyag
4b3(mdo sde): 'tshal lo//'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa'i sku gzugs thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//ring bsrel thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//mau chud rten thams cad la phyag 'tshal
4b4(mdo sde): lo//dam pa'i chos mdo'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo//dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo//lung du bstan pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo//tshigs su bcad pa'i sngo la phyag
4b5(mdo sde): 'tshal lo//cheng du brjod pa'i sde lo phyag 'tshal lo//gling gzhi'i sde la phyag 'tsha l-i lo//rtogs pa brjod pa'i ste la phyag 'tshal lo//'das pa brjod pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo//
4b6(mdo sde): skyes pa rabs kyi sde la phyag 'tshal lo//shin tu rgyas pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo//rmad du byung ba'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo//chos rtogs pa bstan pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo//byang chub
4b7(mdo sde): sems dpa'i sde snod thog pa chen po'i mdzod thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi gsung rab thams cad dang /'dul ba thabs kyi sgo mo ma lus pa thams cad
5a1(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal lo//chos kyi dbyings yang dag pa'i mtha' brjod du med pa la phyag 'tshal lo//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
5a2(mdo sde): pa la sogs te/dmo pa'i chos kyi yi ge thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo//shar phyogs kyi byang chub
5a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' 'od zer kun nas 'byung ba la phyag 'tshal lo//lho phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan med pas byin la phyag 'tshal lo//nub phyogs kyi byang chub sems
5a4(mdo sde): dpa' spyod pa'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo//byang phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' rgyal bas byin la phyag 'tshal lo//byang shor mtshams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par
5a5(mdo sde): rgyal pos rnam par gnon pa la phyag 'tshal lo//shar lho mtshams kyi byang chub sems dpa' lago na pad+mo la phyag 'tshal lo//lho nub mtshoms kyi byang chub sems dpa' nyi
5a6(mdo sde): ma rab tu snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo//nub byang mtshams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rin chen mchog la phyag 'tshal lo//'og gi phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' pad+mo dam pa
5a7(mdo sde): la phyaga'atshal lo//bla ma phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' dga' bas byin la phyag 'tshal lo//byang chub sems dpa' kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug la phyig
5b1(mdo sde): 'tshal lo//byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo//byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo//byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la phyag
5b2(mdo sde): 'tshal lo//byang chub sems dpa'i phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo//byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal lo phyag 'tsha lo//byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par
5b3(mdo sde): sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo//byang chubo sems dpa'o sa'i snying po la phyog 'tshal lo//byang chub sems dpa'i dri ma med par grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo//byang chub sems dpa'
5b4(mdo sde): mthu chen thob la phyag 'tshal lo//phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//shes rab chen po'i mchog 'phags
5b5(mdo sde): pa shA ri'i bu la phyog 'tshal lo//rdzu 'phrul chen po'i mchog 'phags pa maud+gal gyi bu la phyag 'tshal lo//mang du thos po'i mchog 'phags pa kun dga' bo la phyag 'tshal lo//
5b6(mdo sde): sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyi mchog 'phags pa 'od srung la phyag 'tshal lo//bslab pa la gus po'i mchog 'phags pa nor sbyin 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo//'dul ba 'dzin pa'i mchog
5b7(mdo sde): 'phags pa nye bar 'khor la phyag 'tshal lo//rdzu 'phrul gyi spyan mnga' ba'i mchog 'phags pa ma 'gags pa la phyag 'tshal lo//'dri zhing lan ldon pa'i mchog 'phags
6a1(mdo sde): ba rab 'byor la phyag 'tshal lo//'phags pa dgra bcom pa'i dge 'dun thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//'phags pa rang sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal
6a2(mdo sde): lo//phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun bzhugs so 'tshal thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//dkon mchog gsum la dad pas phyag btsal nas/sdig pa kun byang dge tsho ga so rnam par
6a3(mdo sde): 'phol/bcom ldan so so'i bka' las ci 'byung ba/yon tan khyod par can de grub par shog/phyogs bcu'i dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo//bstod cing bsngags so//blta
6a4(mdo sde): zhing brtag go//byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams rab 'byam las 'byung ba mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i mchod pa sna tshogs mchog/gtso bo/dam pa/khyad par can/bzang pa
6a5(mdo sde): gya nom pa/bla na med pa/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas phyogs bcu'i snod kyi 'jig rten byur bur bkang ste/chos kyi mchod pa dang bcas pas ma lus mi lus lus pa med pa'i
6a6(mdo sde): dkon mchog gsum la phyi ma'i mu'i mthar rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mchod cing 'don to//dbul zhing gsol lo//bkur stir bgyi'o//bla mar bgyi'o//ri mor bgyi'o//mnyes
6a7(mdo sde): par bgyi'o//bdag cag gi skye ba 'di dang thog ma dang tha ma ma mchi ga nas srid pa gsum gyi 'khor ba na 'khor zhing 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug gsum gyi dbang
6b1(mdo sde): gis lus dang /ngag dang /yid kyi sgo nas mi dge ba bcu dang /mtshams med pa lnga la sogs te/gsung rab kun las 'gal ba'i sdig pa mi dge ba'i las bdag gis ci bgyis pa dang /
6b2(mdo sde): gzhan la btsal ba dang /gzhan bgyid pa la rje su yi rang ba de dag rdul tsam bag tsam yang ma lus par mtho lnga zhing bshags so//skyengs zhing bsal to//gzhig cing gdon to//mi 'chab
6b3(mdo sde): bo//mi sbed do//mi bsnyen mi bgyid do//de nas de'i tshe sdig pa thams cad ni byang /bsod nams thams cad ni rdzogs te/dus 'di nos nam byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du/dgongs
6b4(mdo sde): pA'i bdag gis ched du sprul pa ma gtogs par nam nam zhar zhar tshe tsho rabs rabs su ngan song gsum la sogs te/bgegs rigs pa thams cad du mi skye mi ltung bar shog
6b5(mdo sde): cig/log pa mi dge ba'i las la mi phyogs mi bgyid par shog cig/las dang nyon mongs pa'i rgyal mi phyogs mi bgyid par shog cig/smad pa'i lus dang sdug bsngal gyi
6b6(mdo sde): 'bras bu kun lus thar nas phyin chad mi myong bar shog cig/dus 'di nas nam byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du sgo gsum nas dge ba chu bo'i rgyun bzhin du rgyun mi 'chad
6b7(mdo sde): par shog/cig/tshe rabs gar skyes kyang bde skyid phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan to//sems can thams cad kyi don bya ba la mthu dang dbang yod par shog cig/gang de bzhin gshen pa
7a1(mdo sde): 'ba' zhig gi thugs su chud pa'i chos bla na med pa'i byang chub tu gdon mi za bar 'tshang rgya ba'i don de kho na nyid gang yin pa deng dag gis kyang ma nor bar khong du chud
7a2(mdo sde): cing sgom la/gzhan dag la'ang ma nor bar ston cing 'dren par shog cig/dus 'dri nas nam byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi ste/bdag
7a3(mdo sde): nyid lus dbul gyis thugs rje chen po ldan pa rnams kyis so so nas rtag tu bzhes shig/ji ltar na dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' dngos po thams cad dang bral ba/
7a4(mdo sde): dngos pa dang /sems dang /skye mched kyis ma zin pa'i chos bdag med pa dang mnyam pa/zlog ma nis ma skyes pa/stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis/byang chub kyi sems bskyed po ltar
7a5(mdo sde): bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi sos kyang /dus 'di nas nam byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o//byang chub kyi sems ni nam gzhar yang mi
7a6(mdo sde): stor zhing dge ba'i bshes gnyen dam pa de dang nam yang mi 'bral bar shog cig/ji ltar dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas de dag bla na med pa'i bsod nams kyi rje su yi rang ba ltar/
7a7(mdo sde): bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas kyang 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsod nams thams cad la rje su yi rang ngo //nem 'chi bar nges pa'i dus de ni sangs rgyas dang //
7b1(mdo sde): chubs myapa dang 'dro dag thams cad kyi zhal mngon sum du mthong nas/byug g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog can brkyang ste/bdag gi spro bar byanaganas lung nod par gyur cig/bdug gas
7b2(mdo sde): kyang nyon mongs pas sems mi 'khrul par chos bdag med pa dang mthun po'i 'dun pa can dang /byang chub kyi sems tshad med pa dang ljon bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byed par shog cig/mngon
7b3(mdo sde): na bag chags ma lus kun byar nas//bsod nams ye shes tshogs gnyis yongs rdzogs te//'gro ba ma lus byin gyis bsgral ba'i phyir//bdag nyid myur du mngon par sangs rgyas shog/
7b4(mdo sde): dbang sgong phyag brgya pa rdzogs so///rgya gar skad du/Ar+ya a tsin+du rA dz+nyA sU tA nA ma mahA m+b+ha na smr-i tA/bod skad du/'phags pa bsgom gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyal po'i
7b5(mdo sde): mdo zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i thams cad la phyog 'tshal lo//'od skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das yul ma
7b6(mdo sde): g+ha d+hAn chos kyi dbye dkon pA nA/byang chub kyi snying po na song gA'i khri rdo rje dang nor bu rin po ches smras pa'i pad+ma'i snying po'i gdan la 'gugs te/byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i dge 'dun
7b7(mdo sde): phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi rdul phra rab snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang thabs cig
8a1(mdo sde): tu bzhugs so//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de
8a2(mdo sde): ngag la smras pa/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed kyi 'jig
8a3(mdo sde): rten gyi khams 'di'i bskal pa gcig gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi
8a4(mdo sde): khams kyi nyin zhag gcig go/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bde ba
8a5(mdo sde): can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bskol pa gcig gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje rab tu 'jom pa'i sangs
8a6(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing gi nyin zhag gcig go/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje rab tu 'jom pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
8a7(mdo sde): zhing gi bskal pa gcig gang yin pa don de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer shin tu stug po pad+ma rab tu rgyas pa'i sku'i sangs
8b1(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing gI nyin zhag gcig go//kye rgyal ba'i sgras dgra de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer shin tu stug po pad+ma rab tu rgyus pa'i sku'i sangs
8b2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing gi bskul pa gcig gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi nyin zhag gcig
8b3(mdo sde): go/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bskal pa gcig gang yin pa de ni
8b4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas seng ge'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi nyin zhag gcig go//kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
8b5(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas seng gri'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing go bskal pa gcig gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
8b6(mdo sde): rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi nyin zhag gcig go//kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dge par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang modzad
8b7(mdo sde): kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bskal pa gcig gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi 'od zer me tog rab tu rgyas pa'i sku
9a1(mdo sde): /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi nyin zhag gcig go//kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi 'od zer ma
9a2(mdo sde): tog rab tu rgyas pa'i sku'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gI bskal pa gcig gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes 'od zer
9a3(mdo sde): rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi nyin zhag gcig go//kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes 'od zer rgyal
9a4(mdo sde): po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bskal pa gcig gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba'i blo gros kyi sangs rgyas
9a5(mdo sde): kyi zhing gi nyin zhag gcig go/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ltar bskal pa bgrang ba'i thebs 'di lta bu'i tshul gyis rtsis pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i
9a6(mdo sde): rgya mtsho'i rdul phra rab snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dus pa'i tha ma 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma'i dpal zhes bya ba na/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
9a7(mdo sde): dog par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba bzang po'i dpal bzhugs po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi nyin zhog gcig go//kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
9b1(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi mtshan 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa can/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis
9b2(mdo sde): yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyiso thos par 'gyur gyi/gzhan dag gis ni thos par mi 'gyuraro//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal
9b3(mdo sde): nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyal po dang /thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
9b4(mdo sde): de dag dong /lha dang /mi dang lha ma yin dang /dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
9b5(mdo sde): rgyal pos gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//'phags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyal po'i mdo zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so///
9b6(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/Ar+yAd sha dag an+ta kA ra bi d+hA na sa na nA ma ma hA yA nA sutwAM/bod skad du/'phrogs pa phyogs bcu'i mun pa rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen
9b7(mdo sde): po'i mdo/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das shAkya rnams kyi nang na/ser skya'i
10a1(mdo sde): //gnas shing n+ya klo d+hA'i kun dga' rab na dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /byams pa dang 'jam dpal la sogs pa byang chub sems
10a2(mdo sde): dpa'i 'khor chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so//de nas bcom ldan 'das sde dro'i dus kyi che/sham thabs gsol nas/lhung bzed dang /chos gos mnabus te/dge slong gi
10a3(mdo sde): dge 'dun gyis yongasu bskor cing /dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas ser skya ba'i gan gyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms la gshegs so//de'i tshe na shAkya gzhon nu
10a4(mdo sde): bzhin rab gsal zhes bya ba zhig bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir shing rta la zhon nas ser skya'i gnas grong khyer chen po nas phyir byung ba dang /shAkya gzhon nu bzhin rab gsal gyis/bcom
10a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das thag ring ba kho na nas gshegs pa mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang shing rta de las babs nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la
10a6(mdo sde): ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag btsal nas/bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/thul mo sbyar nas
10a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi skyon sngar 'dug go//de nas bcom ldan 'das la shAkya gzhon nu bzhin rab gsal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'odas 'di ni bdag gi pha
10b1(mdo sde): mya gnyis gnyid log pa dang ma log bdag la mi ma lags pa rnam par 'tsho bar bgyid la/bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang gang gi tshe ljongs kyi phyogs gzhan du mchi ba'i tshe/bdag la 'ang
10b2(mdo sde): chom rkun pa drug rnam par 'tshe bar bgyid cing /gcan zan dag kyang rnam par 'tshe bar bgyid na/de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs po dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
10b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyis bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du ci nas kyang bdag la mi 'am/mi ma lags pa dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa 'ga' yang rnam par 'tshe bar mi bgyid pa de
10b4(mdo sde): ltar bdag la legs par bsrung ba mdzad du gsol/bsrung ba'i cho ga 'ang bshad du gsol/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis shAkya gzhon nu bzhin rab gsal la 'di
10b5(mdo sde): skad ces bka' stsal to//gzhon nu de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la gzung zhig dngangs khyod la bshad do//bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol nas/shU
10b6(mdo sde): gzhon nu bzhin rab gsal bcom ldan 'das la nyan pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//gzhin du shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas
10b7(mdo sde): sas rgyas kyi zhing brgyad khri 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams nyon mongs pa thams cad bskyod pa zhes bya ba zhig yod do//de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
11a1(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas rdzas spyod ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhus so//gzhon nu khyod gang grwa tshwa bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir shar phyog su 'gro na/de'i chu khyod kyi
11a2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa de la phyag btsal to dran par byas shing mdun du byas te/sems kyi rgyan gyis de mngon du byed cing maung na khyod la 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro//de'i tshe
11a3(mdo sde): mgu yengs par de yid la byos na khyod la bya ba gang gi phyir 'gro ba'i bye ba de 'grub par 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshig su bcud pa 'di bka'i stsal to//rtogs
11a4(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas thub pa tsho//rje la rab tu phyog btsalo te//rtag tu don mngon byed cing //'gron khyod la 'jigs mi 'byung //gzhon nu lho phyogs logasu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di
11a5(mdo sde): nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing dgu khri 'das pa ni/'jig rten gyi khams mun pa dang mun nag gi tshogs btsam zhes bya ba zhig yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
11a6(mdo sde): par rtogs po'i sangs rgyas sems dang po bskyed pa yid la mdzad pa rnam grangs bsnyengs pa dang bag che ba dang bral bas mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs
11a7(mdo sde): te'atsho zhing gzhes so//gzhon nu khyod gang gi tshe bye ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir lho phyog su 'gro na/de'i tshe khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la phyag 'tshal te dran par byas shing mdun
11b1(mdo sde): du byas te/sems kyi rgyun gyis de mngon du byed cing /khyim la sogs pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral ba rnam par mu ga yengs pa yid la byed pas slong na//khyod bya ba gang gi phyir 'gro ba'i bya ba
11b2(mdo sde): de'i grub par 'gyur zhing /khyod lnga 'jigs pa gang nas kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bocad pa 'di bka stsol to//khyim gyi bsam pa rnams
11b3(mdo sde): dang ni//kun nas ldang ba kun khrol zhing //lho phyogs su ni 'gro ba ni//khyod la 'jigs pa 'byung mi 'gyur//gzhon nu nub phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na sgo sangs rgyas kyi zhing
11b4(mdo sde): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams yul phebs pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kho na
11b5(mdo sde): dang rgyags po rnam par gnon pa zhes bya bA da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so//gzhon nu khyod gang gi tshe bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir nub phyogasu 'gro na de'i tshe khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs
11b6(mdo sde): pad+mo la phyag 'tshal te/dran par byas shing mdun du byas nas sems kyi rgyun gyis de mngon du byed cing zag pa med pa rnam paro ma g.yongs pa dang dran pas khyod srong na khyod la
11b7(mdo sde): 'jigs pa gang nas kyang 'byung por mi 'gyuraro//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to//chos 'ga' skyes pa yod moni zhing /'ga' yang
12a1(mdo sde): 'gag par mi 'gyur te//gang gis chos rnams de ltar shes//de la 'jigs pa ci yang med//gzhon nu byang phyogs log su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas/
12a2(mdo sde): kyi zhing bye ba phrag stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa can zhes bya ba zhig yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
12a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rin chen gzugs bkod 'od gnon zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhos so//gzhon nu khyod gang gi tshe bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir byang phyogasu 'gro na/de'i tshe khyod
12a4(mdo sde): kyis de bzhin gshags pa de la phyag btsal te dran par byas shing mdun du byas te/sems kyi rgyun gyis dri mngon du byed cing rnam par mgo yongs par yid la byed pas song na//
12a5(mdo sde): khyod bya ba gang gi phyir 'gro ba'i bya ba de 'grub par 'gyur zhing khyod la 'jigs pa gang nas kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshi gau su bcad pa
12a6(mdo sde): 'di bka' stsal to//rtag tu sems can thams cang la//mnyam pa nyid la sems byos la//sems can de la ma brnyas dang //khyod la 'jigs pa 'byung mi 'gyur//gzhon nu
12a7(mdo sde): byang shar gyi phyogs log su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgyad khri 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams bdud kyi sde bcom pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/de na de
12b1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdud dang yid gnyis kun 'joms rnam gnon zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so//de bzhin
12b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa de byang chub kyi shing drung du bzhugs pa tsam gyis stong gsum gyi sdong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/bdud kyi ros kyi lho ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang
12b3(mdo sde): dag par rdzogaso pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par mdzad de/gzhon nu de ni de bzhin gshegs pa de byang chub kyi shing drung du bzhugs pa'i skyes bu'i rtsal de lta bu byung ba yin no//
12b4(mdo sde): gzhon nu khyod gang gi tshe bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir byung shar me phyog su 'gro na de'i tshe khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la phyag btsal te dran por byas shing mdun du byas te/sems
12b5(mdo sde): kyi rgyun gyis de mngon du byed cing rnam par myo g.yongs pas song na khyod bya ba gang gi phyir 'gro ba'i bya ba de 'grub par 'gyur zhing khyod la 'jigs pa gang nas kyang 'byung bar mi
12b6(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa'i dro bko'o stsal to//gang gis dang po'i thugs kyis ni//bdud rnams pham mdzad spangs rgyas de//dran bzhin
12b7(mdo sde): du ni khyod song na//khyod la 'jigs pa 'byung mi 'gyur//gzhon nu she ba rno'i phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi khri 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi
13a1(mdo sde): khams rtag tu snang ba zhes bya ba zhig yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sems dang po bskyed pas phyir mi ldog
13a2(mdo sde): pa'i 'khor lo 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba de ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so//gzhon nu de bzhin gshegs pa des dang po thugs bskyed pa nas bzung ste/sangs rgyas pa
13a3(mdo sde): nyid kyi bar du bar chad med par sbyin pa byin/tshul khrims bsrungs/bzod pa kun tu bstan/brtson 'grus brtsams/bsam gtan bskyobs/shes rab spyad de/gzhon nu de ni
13a4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa de'i skyes bu'i rtsol de lta bu byung ba yin no//gzhon nu khyod gang gi tshe bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir shar lho'i phyogasu 'gro na/de'i tshe khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs
13a5(mdo sde): pa de la yan lag lngas phyag btsal te/phyis khyim nas song zhig dang /khyod la phyis 'gyod po'am 'jigs pa gong nas kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro//rnam par ma g.yengs pas
13a6(mdo sde): yid la byed na/khyod bya ba gang gi phyir 'gro ba'i bya ba de 'grub par 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to//yan lag lngas ni phyag
13a7(mdo sde): btsal to//phyi naso khyim nas song zhog dang /chomo rkun rnams kyis khyod kun tu/zil gyis mi non 'gro bar 'gyur/gzhon nu lho nub kyi phyogs log su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas
13b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing sum khri 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi dra bus g.yogs pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i spangs
13b2(mdo sde): rgyas rin chen gdugs 'phags snang zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so//gzhon nu khyod gang gi tshe bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir lho nub kyi phyogasu 'gro na/de'i tshe khyod kyis
13b3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa de la phyag btsal te dron par byas shing mdun du byas te/sems kyi rgyun gyis de mngon du byed cing rnam par ma g.yongs pa'i yod la byed pas song na khyod la 'jigs
13b4(mdo sde): pa gang nas kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing khyod bya ba gong gi phyir 'gro ba'i bya ba de 'grub par 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcod pa 'di bka' stsal to//
13b5(mdo sde): rdzogs sangs rgyas la phyag btsalA nas//me tog silA maso gtor cig dang //khyod ni lho nub 'gro ba na//'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro//gzhon nu nub byang gi phyogs logasu spangs
13b6(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing 'od nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/'jig rten gyi khams yongs dag rab gnas mngon par 'phags zhes bya ba zhig yod de/de na de bzhin
13b7(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' 'dul zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhaso//gzhon nu de bzhin gshegs pa la
14a1(mdo sde): de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni mi gtsang ba med pa/'khrig pa med pa/bud med medon tsher ma dang /gsog ma dang /gyo mo med pa/snyigs ma lU med pa yin no//gzhon nu
14a2(mdo sde): khyod gang gi tshe bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir nub byang gi phyogs su 'gro na tshangs par spyod pa yang dag par blangs nas phyis khyim nas rnam par ma g.yengs pa'i yid la byed pas srong zhig
14a3(mdo sde): dang /gzhon nu khyod bya ba gang gi phyir 'gro ba'i bye ba de 'grub par 'gyur zhing khyod la 'jigs pa gang nas kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshig su
14a4(mdo sde): bcad pa 'di bka'o stsal to//rmongs spyod yang dog blangs byas te//phyi nas khyim nas song zhig dang //khyod ni grang dang gar 'gro yang //chom rkun rnams kyis zil mi non//gzhon nu steng
14a5(mdo sde): gi phog su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klong drug cu'i bye ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams dmigs pa med pa yid la byed pa can zhes pa ba zhig yod de/
14a6(mdo sde): de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skrag med mun bral ting nge 'dzin mngon 'phags rgyal po zhes bya ba de ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing
14a7(mdo sde): gzhes so//gzhon nu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la phyag btsal te dran par byas shing mdun du byas te 'dug kyang rung /'greng yang rung /sems can thams cad la
14b1(mdo sde): byams byas khyab par byas nas rtogs par byas shing gnas na khyod la 'jigs pa gang nas kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigasu bcang ba 'di bka'
14b2(mdo sde): stsol to//khyod kyis mo yengs yid byed kyiso//rtag tu rgyal ba sbyin zhing //rtag tu byams pa'i sems byos dang //khyod la 'jigs pa 'byud mi 'gyur//gzhon nu 'og gi phyogs logs su
14b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zheng 'di nas sang+yas rgyus kyi zhing dgu khro nyis stong 'das po na 'jog rten gyi khams yon tan thams cad kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/de ni de bzhin gshegs
14b4(mdo sde): pA dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang po sems bskyed the tshom gcod mdzad nyon mongs bskyod ces bya ba de ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so//gzhon nu khyod
14b5(mdo sde): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la bya ba rtsom pa thams cad dang /'greng yang rung /'dug kyang rung /'chag kyang rung ste/spyod lam thams cad du phyag 'tshal cig/yid la byos shig
14b6(mdo sde): dang /snyems can rnams la byam skyo pa'i sems dang /phan pa'i sems bsgrubs shig dang /gzhon nu khyod la 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing /dgos pa thams cad kyang 'bad
14b7(mdo sde): mi dgom par 'gyur ro//denas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshig su btsir ba 'di bka' stsal to//bye bkun la nyin mtshan du//sangs rgyas de ni dran bya zhing //byang chub sems kyi
15a1(mdo sde): ma dang /khyod la 'jigs pa lung mi 'gyur//gzhon tu rgyud kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i spangs rgyas de dag gi mtshan la/
15a2(mdo sde): brgyum gyis shig/legs par btsong par gyis shig/legs pa kun chub par gyis shig dang /'jigs pa dang /bag chab 'am/spu zing zhes bye bra gdu ci 'ang rung ba de dag thams cad
15a3(mdo sde): khyod la 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das lnga shAkya gzhon nu bzhin rab gsal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis
15a4(mdo sde): ngo bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi mtshan rnams dazung lags te/bcom ldan 'das bdag la 'jig rten gyi khams de dag mun
15a5(mdo sde): ba ma mchis shing /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'jig rten gyi kha mos de dag dang /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag kyang dper
15a6(mdo sde): nade bzhin gshegs pa da ltar 'khor rnams la chos ston pa bzhin du mthong ngo //de nas 'byor de las shAkya gzhon nu bzhin rabu gsal la sogs pa skye bo phal blo che'i tshogs
15a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /phyag 'tshal ba dang /mchod pa dang /rim go bya ba dang /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa'i phyir 'khor deng 'dus por gyur pa'i srog chags
15b1(mdo sde): ste ched ba de dag thams cad stan las langs te/blu gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas pus mogayasdu pa'i lU nga sA la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das ga la bde log su thal mo sbyar ba
15b2(mdo sde): btud nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis don gyi slad du de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pas bcom ldan 'das
15b3(mdo sde): bdag cag la phyogs de dag dang 'jig rten gyi khams de dag kyang mun pa ma mchis par gda' la/bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams de dag deng sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
15b4(mdo sde): kyang dper na/de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston pa 'di bzhin du gang 'o//de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa shA rari'i bu stan las langs te/bla gros phyug pa gcig tu byas nas/
15b5(mdo sde): brus g.yas pa'i ltung stsal btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das gau la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba debatud nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das
15b6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dge tshus kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/sbyangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi mtshan rnams thos nas mig rnam par dag cing phyogs bcu
15b7(mdo sde): dgan 'jig rten gyi khams gang dag mchis pa de dge dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mthong ba de dag gi mig rnam par dag pa'i bsod nams de dag bcom ldan 'das
16a1(mdo sde): /ci lags/tshe rangs gzhan du che 'phos na 'ang 'bral bar 'gyur ram/'on te mi 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems
16a2(mdo sde): dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag 'di ltar mig rnam par dag pa de dag ni sgrib pa med pa'i tshul gyis shin tu rnam par dag pa nyid
16a3(mdo sde): tu 'gyur ro//shA ri'i bu khyod kyis srog chags stong tshang ba 'di mthong ngam/shA ri'i bu 'di dag thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi mtshan bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis re res kyang 'khor
16a4(mdo sde): los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid gaung+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag byed du bcug nas srid pa tha ma dang /lus tha ma la byang chub kyi tshogs thams cad rdzogs par byas te/bskal pa gcig la de
16a5(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan dag pas brgyan pa zhes bya bar mtshan mthun pa sha stag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
16a6(mdo sde): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu de rnamaso lung bstan pa bshad pa 'di bka' stsal ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong
16a7(mdo sde): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur te/'gul rab tu 'gul/kun tu rab tu 'gul/g.yos rab tu g.yos/kun tu rab tu g.yos/'u
16b1(mdo sde): bur rab tu 'ur/kun tu rab tu 'ur/ldeg rab tu ldeg/kun tu rab tu ldeg/chem che ma rab tu chem chem/kun tu rab tu chem chem/'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so//
16b2(mdo sde): sa byA'i lha'i rnams kyis kyang kye ma grags pa dge 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'di rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan bzung ba tsam gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
16b3(mdo sde): yongs su bzung zhing chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du mkhyen pas don thams cad thugs su chud pa'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ba ni ngo mtshar che ste su zhig sangs rgya so la dad
16b4(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur zhes sgra bsgrags so//rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang /'thab bral rnams dang /dga' ldan pa rnams dang /'phrulo dga' ba
16b5(mdo sde): rnams dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi ris rnams dang /tshangs ris rnams dang /tshangs pa'i mdun ni 'don rnams dang /tshangs pa chen po rnams nas 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar gyis
16b6(mdo sde): sa bla'i lha rnams kyi sgra de thos nos yi rangs shing rab tu dga' la dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas tshig 'di skad ces kye ma grogs po dge 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'di rnams kyis de
16b7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan bzung ba tsam gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongasu bzung zhing chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du mkhyen pas don thams cad
17a1(mdo sde): /thugs su chud pa'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ba ni ngo mtshar rje ste/su zhig sangs rgyas la dad par mi 'gyur zhes smras so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
17a2(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag por zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang le la chos kyi rnam
17a3(mdo sde): grangs 'di thos nas 'dzin par byed/'chang bar byeb/klog par byed/kun chub par byed cing /gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par byed pa dang /tha na glegs bam
17a4(mdo sde): le byis te 'chang bar byed na/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dog sangs rgyas kyi so byin gyis brlabs pa dang /sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byos pa yin par rig pa par
17a5(mdo sde): bya'o//de dag la 'tsho ba'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung bar rig par bya'o//de dag shis ngan du 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro//de dge pha rol gyi gnod pas 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro//de dag la chu dang //
17a6(mdo sde): chom rkun dang /dug dang /mtshon gyis 'jigs pa mi 'byung bar yid ches par bya'o//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
17a7(mdo sde): bsrung ba lung bstan pa 'di lta bu 'di shes nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung po'i phyir lha'i bu stong tshang bas yongasu bskor cing mdun du bdar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba
17b1(mdo sde): der song ste phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag btsal te/bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/bcom ldan 'das dang srog chags stong /
17b2(mdo sde): tshang ba gang dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yong dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa de dag la lho'i tsan+dan gyi phye ma dang /lha'i me tog man+da ra dwa dang /
17b3(mdo sde): man+da ra ba chen po rnams kyis mngon par gtor nas thal mo sbyar te phyogs cig tu 'dug nas 'di skad ces kyang gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
17b4(mdo sde): glade chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin par bgyid pa dang /'chang bar bgyid pa dang /klog par bgyid pa dang /kun chub par bgyid pa de dge bsrung bar bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am
17b5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu ma de dag khyim na mchis snum/dgon pa na mchis sam/shing drung na mchis sam/khyim stong pa na mchis sam/'brog dgon pa na mchis sam/lam dang lam gol ba na
17b6(mdo sde): mchis sam/gnyid log gam/gnyid ma log pa dag na 'du de dag la pha rol gyi gnod pas 'gum par mi 'gyur bar bdag gis bsrung bar bgyi'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
17b7(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes
18a1(mdo sde): la rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu ma gang zhig gis ji spyod 'tsho'i bang du chos gos dang /bsod snyoms dang /gnas mal dang /spyan gyi rgyun dang /sman gyi yo byad
18a2(mdo sde): rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byed na/kun dga' bo de tsam gyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'gyur spyi byas par mi 'gyur/bla mar byas par myi 'gyur/ri mor byas par mi 'ob+h+yaH/
18a3(mdo sde): mchod pa byas par mi 'gyur gyi/byang chub sems dpa'i thag pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas 'dzin
18a4(mdo sde): par byed do/'chung bar byed dam/klog par byed dam/kun chub par byed dam/gzhan dag la yang dag par rab tu ston tam/tha na glegs bam la bris te 'chang nA/kun dga'
18a5(mdo sde): bod tsam gyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa la bkur sti bye ba dam pa da //blo me bya ba dam pa dang /ri mor bya ba dam pa dang /mchod pa dam pas bkur sti byas pa yin/blam
18a6(mdo sde): byas pa yin/ri mor byas pa yin/mchod pa byas pa yin no//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan los langs te/bla gos phrag pa cog tu byas nas bros mo g.yas pa'i lha
18a7(mdo sde): ngos la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das ga yo ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs
18b1(mdo sde): ming ci ljags/'di ji ltar gzung bar dbye//de skad ces ga sol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun tu dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//kun dga' bo de'i phyir
18b2(mdo sde): khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di phyogs bcu'i mun pa rnam par sel ba zhes bya bar gzung zhig/'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa zhes bya ba dang /dngos po me
18b3(mdo sde): par rtogs pa zhes bya ba dang /mtshon nyid med par rtogs pa zhes bya bar yang gau zung zhig/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /tshe dang
18b4(mdo sde): ldan pa shA ri'i bu dong /shAkya gzhon nu bzhin rab gsal dang srog chags stong tshang ba de dang /lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /dge slong de dag dang /byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /
18b5(mdo sde): lce dang /mi dang /lha ma yin dang /dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rte ni yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//'phagasaso pa phyogs bcu'i mun pa rnam par
18b6(mdo sde): sel ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so///rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi shud+d+ha sing ha dang /lo ts+tsha ba ban+de rtsa des de de na dra rak+Shi tas bsgyur/zhu chen gyi lo sme+e ba ban+de
18b7(mdo sde): klu'i rgyal mtshon gyis zhu chen bgyis te gtan la phab pa///rgya ger skad du/Ar+ya sap+ta dur+dz+dza kaM nA ma ma hA yA na sU tri/bod
19a1(mdo sde): skad du/'phags pa sangs rgyas bdun pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//'di skad
19a2(mdo sde): bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das ti so'i ri'i rtse mo lha'i gnas na drang srong gi spyod pa dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na/dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun
19a3(mdo sde): chen po dang byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya la 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying po
19a4(mdo sde): dang /kun tu bzang po dang /mtha' yas me tog dang /kunau nas me tog dang /de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpo'i skye ba gcig gis thogs pa sha stag dang thabs cig tu
19a5(mdo sde): bzhugs so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ri'i rtse mo'i nags khrod de nyid na dge slong zhig 'byung pos zin nas brdol cing gcer bu gos med la lag pa bsgreng ste ngu zhing
19a6(mdo sde): 'dug pa gzigs so//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying pos bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nge sa la btsugs
19a7(mdo sde): nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das na mkha'i dkyil ni kyi hud ces sgra
19b1(mdo sde): 'byin pa 'di dang /dge slong gtsor bu gos ma mchis pa lag pa bstod pa gcig shes 'di'ang su zhig lags/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
19b2(mdo sde): na mkha' snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//na mkha'i snying po 'di ni nad kyis btab pa yin no//gcig shis 'di'ang nad kyis btab pa yin no//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub
19b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to//nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa dang /'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i rig sdigs bco mo ldan
19b4(mdo sde): 'das kyis bstan du gsol/bka' stsal du gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas sprul pa mdzad de/de nas na mkha' la de bzhin ga bye ba drug byu//bdun pa ni bac+doMs de bzhin ga sh+ye ba shAkya thub pa'o//
19b5(mdo sde): deni de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs steng gi na mkha' la bzhugs te/sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang /nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /'byung po thams cad
19b6(mdo sde): bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to//na mo bud+d+ha ya/na mo d+har+m+ma ya/na maHsaM g+hA ya/tad+ya thA/oM hu lu hu lu/hi li hi li ya/na mau dza ka/na ma sh+tsa nA ya/na mo
19b7(mdo sde): na me swA hA/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs kyis byang chub 'i sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//na mkha'i snying po gang la
20a1(mdo sde): la zhig rlig sngags 'di 'chang ngam+ba/klog gam/kun chub par byed na/de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs/chu dang /sdug bsngal ba'i nad kyis 'chi ba'i dus
20a2(mdo sde): byed par mi 'gyur/dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro//do dug zos kyang zas bzhin du 'gyur ro//zas dang skom la lan bdun bzlas brjod pas te zos
20a3(mdo sde): ni pha rol gyi gnod pa mi 'byung ngo //nad thams cad kyis btab par mi 'gyur ro//ring du 'tshe bar 'gyur ro//thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro//de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi gzugs
20a4(mdo sde): mthong bar 'gyur ro//mtshon btab pa'i rna bar bzlas brjod byas la gna' ma'i mar sbyin no//mdze dang skrangs nad kyis btab pa rnams la sna ma'i mar dang /ut+pa la sngon po dang /
20a5(mdo sde): shu ti dang /nye'u shing rnams bsres pa'i mar phyin na nad thams cad sos par 'gyuraro//las thams cad la'ang sbyar bar bya'o//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor can steng gi
20a6(mdo sde): nA mkha' la bzhugs te/sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang /nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi
20a7(mdo sde): 'di dag bka' stsal to//na mo bud+d+ha ya/na mo d+har+m+ma ya/na maHsaM g+hA ya/oM pa tsa pa tsa pa tsa pa tsa pa ya saurba b+hU ta ni/tshin+na ya kI la pa ra bid+ya nAM swA hAM/na mkha'i snying po sems
20b1(mdo sde): can thams cad la phan pA'i don dang /nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /bsgomanyes pa dang /rmi lam dran pa thams cad bzlog pa dang /dus ma yin par 'chi bA dgag pa'i phyir
20b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas gsungs shing //ngas kyang da ltar bshad pa'i snying po 'di gzung zhig/na mkha'i snying po gang la la zhig nga'i snying po 'di nyin lan
20b3(mdo sde): gsum yid la byed na/de la pha rol gyi gnod pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro//gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs mthong bar 'gyur ro//gshes ngan
20b4(mdo sde): du'i che bar mi 'gyu ro//'di nas shi 'phos nas de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad par 'gyur zhing mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro//de nas 'di'i cho ga gzhan ni nAd thams cad la skud pas bcing bar bya'o//
20b5(mdo sde): 'dus pa las gyur pa la ni sna ma'i mar la bzlas brjod byas te sbyin no//chus phyogs bcing bar bya'o//skud pas bdag la bsrung ngo //byis pa rnams kyi gdon dag la srud pa sngon po gdag so//
20b6(mdo sde): mtshon btab pa'i rna bar lan bdun bzlas brjod bya'o//gzhan dgo la'ang rang gi blos sbyar bar bya'o//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyob steng gi na mkha' la bzhugs te/sems
20b7(mdo sde): can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang /nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' sprul to//na mo bud+d+hA ya/na mo d+harmA
21a1(mdo sde): /ya/na maHsa~Mg+hA ya/oM ka la kA la/ki li ki li/ku lu ku lu/su la ut+pa d+ha na~M ku ru/sarba gra ta nA~M swAhA/na mkha'i snying po gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni bskal pa bzung
21a2(mdo sde): po'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'dres pa dang /ma byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba thams cad kyis gsungs shing /ngas kyang dade ltar bshad pa ste/na mkha'i snying po khyod kyis gsang sngags kyi gzhi
21a3(mdo sde): 'di dag zung zhig/gang la la zhig 'dzin tam/klog gam/kun chub par byed na/de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs/dug gis mi tshugs/dbyig dug gis mi tshugs/rims nad kyis
21a4(mdo sde): mi 'debs shing chu dang /dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang /gshis ngan du'ichi bar mi 'gyur te sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa ni ma gtog so//dge slong ngam/dge slong ma 'am/dge bsnyen num/
21a5(mdo sde): dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig nang par langs nas mgo bkrus te/de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod na de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro//de la
21a6(mdo sde): sems can sdang ba gang dag dang /rgyal po rnams thog mar smra bar 'gyur ro//sems can thams cad de'i dbang du 'gyur ro//'jigs pa thams cad kyi nang du yid la bya'o//'thab
21a7(mdo sde): pa dang /'thab mo dang /rtsod pa dang /'gyed pa thams cad la skud pa dkar po gdags so//mig nad la shing 'o ma can las skud pa byas te rna ba la gdags//dmag 'ongs par byed
21b1(mdo sde): 'dod pas zho dang sbrang rtsil sbags pa'i 'bras yos pa lan kya brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o//rA dza na na rA dza ma tri ma dA pa shI ka ra ru k+She ma ne/'o ma can gyi shing gi spur shing gis me bum la bsreg bya til dag
21b2(mdo sde): la lan stong sbyin sreg bya'o//bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi sgrib pa thams cad dang /sdig pa byang zhing /dpal chen po dang /nor gyi phung po chen po bsgrub par 'dod na/'o ma can gyi shing gi
21b3(mdo sde): spar shing gis me bu so la bsreg bya til dag lan stong sbyin sreg bya'o//sdig pa ji snyed pa tha maso cad sbyang bar 'dod pa dang /rig sngags thams cad grub par 'dod pa dang /bdag bkru bar
21b4(mdo sde): 'dod pas/shu ti dang /nas dang khe dang /shi ri sha dang /rgya spos dang /gur gum dang /gla skang dang /in dro ba ru dang /byang chub kyi shing dang /a mra'i mgo lcogs dang 'di rnams kyis bkru bar
21b5(mdo sde): bya ste/sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar nyim zhag gcig smyung bar bya zhing bum pa sar pa bzhag ste/zla ba nya ba la sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar snying po lan stong rje brgyad sngags la khrus bya'o//dug mi gdug
21b6(mdo sde): par byed par 'dod pas sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar sa nga ldeng gi thur ma ba'i lci bar skyugs pa brgya rtsa brgyad ming nas smos te sbyin sreg byas na dug mi gdug par 'gyuraro//gdon bsrung ba dang /
21b7(mdo sde): 'byung po la sogs pa'i las thams cad la'ang sbyar bar byas na bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa log par dad sel steng gi na mkha' la bzhugs te/sems
22a1(mdo sde): can thams cad la phan pa'i don/nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir dang /'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir grasang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to//na mo bud+d+ha
22a2(mdo sde): ya/na mo d+har+m+ma ya/na maHsaM g+hA ya/na maHkra ku ts+tshan+d+rA ya/ta thA g+hA ya/ar+ha te saM myag saM bud+d+ha ya/oM ka Ta ka Ta/kA Tha ka ShA/ki Ti kri Ti/ki tri ki thi/ki tA pa ya nA ma swA hA/na mkha'i snying po
22a3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas log par dad sel ces bya ba gad+hA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gis gsungs shing rje su yi rang ba'i snying po 'di
22a4(mdo sde): khyed kyis gzung zhig/blangs shing bzung ste kun chub par byas na phyi ma'i tshe dge slong dang /dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyen dang /dge bsnyen ma dag de'i tshe dkon mchog gsum la dad pa brnyes
22a5(mdo sde): nos khrus byas te/bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang /bdug pa dang /spos dag gis mchod pa byas nas gsang sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod par gyur na/tshe rabs bdun du tshe
22a6(mdo sde): rabs dran par 'gyur ro//lha rnams kyi nang du lha'i che ba nyid thob par 'gyur ro//yang mi rnams kyi rlung du 'khor los
22a7(mdo sde): sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro//yang na cho ga bzhin sgrub na de mir skye ba tha ma thob par 'gyur te/'di nas shi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro//tshe 'di la
22b1(mdo sde): 'artag tu brjod na nad thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro//thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro//zas dang skom gyi rnam pa la lan bdun sngags te/zos 'thungs na nad thams cad las thar bar
22b2(mdo sde): 'gyuraro//ji ste sgrom zhi bar 'dod na bzu' ba thams cad la lan stong rtsa brgyad kyis bkru bar bya'o//rdzog rgal gcod na zangs khab kyis bya'o//'thab pa dang /rjod pa dang /'ching ba thams cad
22b3(mdo sde): las rdur bar byin lan dadun pa zlas brjod bya ste/rtag tu nor yang 'phel bar 'gyur/dgegos dang lon 'dred thams cad las kyang bar bar 'gyur ro// steng bzhin gshegs pa mthong
22b4(mdo sde): 'dod na des phyogs gtsang mor mchod rten gyol pongs da kyil 'khor bslus la/u ga dus bdugs te lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas ni/de'i drung du sdus shar phyogs su bstan tu
22b5(mdo sde): nyal na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro//yid la ci smon pa de thams cad ston to//tshe 'am stobs sam pam rgyal thams cad kyang ston to//de nis de bzhin gshegs pa ba~M sau
22b6(mdo sde): thub steng gi na mkha' la bzhugs te/semyas can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang /nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyig ni
22b7(mdo sde): 'di dag bka' stsal to//na mo bud+d+hA ya~M/na mo d+harmA ya/na maHsag+hA ya/na maHkan ka mu na ya/ta thA ga tA ya/an+yo ti sa myaka sa ma bud+d+hA ya/tad+ya thA/oM sa ra sau ra sa ra sa re/si ri si /
23a1(mdo sde): rgyung sa rol/d+hamAn+t+ra sa d+hA sa ya/d+humad+h+yA rmA d+g+ha mAd+hA d+ha ma ya//na marnam sa ka na sa mAnA mr-i N+ya b+hU krAr+dz+dza ya ar+thAt+ta s+yA m+b+ha s+'u b+hUd+d+hA ya s+yA//denas dpya
23a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa gser thub kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam pa'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//na mkha'i snying po gang la la zhig snying po 'dzin cing rtag tu bzlas brjod byed
23a3(mdo sde): ba de la mtshon gyi 'jigs pa mo 'byung /me dang /chu dang /lce 'bab pas 'chi bya'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/dug thams cad kyang zas dang 'dra bar thub par 'gyur/dus ma yin par
23a4(mdo sde): 'chibs 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/gshin ngan du 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro//tshe dong bar 'gyur/longs spyod rgyu bar 'gyur/rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa dang ldan ma gyur/
23a5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/dus gsum du bzlas brjod byas na/sngon gyi las kyi sgrib par gyur pa thams cad byung bar 'gyur ro//ci ste pha rol na
23a6(mdo sde): las thar bar byed 'dod ni ci nus su gter ma gtong zhing pog gama?/a ga ru'i 'dug pos bdugs la gza' thams cad la khrus bya'o//mdze dang spangs nad dang mchin sman la
23a7(mdo sde): shu dag 'jam po btags pa sbrang rtsi dang bsres te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar yin stong rtsa brgyad sngags te bslus ni mdzo nad thams cad sos par 'gyuraro//zhag
23b1(mdo sde): bzhi pa la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar sna ma'i me tog gi phreng ba la lan stong rtsa brgyad bsngags te/mi'i mgo la bcings na zhag bzhi pa'i rims sos par 'gyur ro//
23b2(mdo sde): mtshon btab pa'i rna bar bzlas brjod bya ma pa myed sa thar bar 'gyur ro//lus srul pas zin pa rnams la sangs rgyas la phul ba'i me tog gis bdug go//de la sogs pa'i las
23b3(mdo sde): rnams byed de/las thams cad byed po zhes bya'o//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung steng gi na mkha' la bzhugs te/sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang /nad
23b4(mdo sde): thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang//'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyo gzhi 'di dag ga' stsal to//na mo prad+d+ha ya/nA mo d+har+m+mA ya/nA maHsa~M g+hA ya/a ha raha
23b5(mdo sde): ha ra/ha ha ha/nA maHk+Sha sh+yaM pA ya/ta thA ga tA ya/ar+ha te saM myag saM br-id+d+hA ya/sid+d+h+yan+t+ra man+t+ra pa daM swA hA/de bzhin gshegs pa 'o srung gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
23b6(mdo sde): chen po na mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//na mkha'i snying po snying po 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed dag gis gsung
23b7(mdo sde): bste/na mkha'i snying po snying po 'di khyod kyis gzung zhig/kun chub par gyis shig/gang la la zhog 'dzin tame/klog gam/ku ni chub par byed dam/nyin mo 'am/mtshan ma
24a1(mdo sde): lan gsum gsum bzlas rjod byed na mdor na rmyi la mu na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro//de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang byung bar 'gyur te/sngon
24a2(mdo sde): gyi las ni ma gtogs so//las thams cad le 'od sbyar bar bya'o//mdze dang sha bkra la sogs pa la sangs rgyas lha phul ba'i me tog la sangs rgyas kyi sprin sngar lan stong rtsa brgyad
24a3(mdo sde): sngags te blugs shing bkrus na sos par 'gyuraro//glong pan po la sangs rgyas la phul ba'i me tog sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar bzhag ste/sangs rgyas kyi sbyin ster lan stu
24a4(mdo sde): brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o//thams cad du'ang sbyar bar bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa steng gi na mkha' la bzhugs te//sems can thams
24a5(mdo sde): cad la phan pa'i drin gyi phyir rig sngags 'di dag bko' stsal te//na mo bud+d+ha ya/na mo d+har+m+ma ya/na maHsaM g+hA ya/ted+ya thAM/g+hu mi g+hu me g+hu me ma hA g+hA mai/ta le ta le ma hA ta le/tsa le
24a6(mdo sde): tsi le mU hA tsa le/d+hu re d+hu mo hU hu re/te rI ti rI ma hI ti ri ki li ki lI ma hA ki li/tsu ru tsu ru na hA tsu ru/mi li mi li ma hA mi li/ti l-i ti lo ma hA ti li/d+hA me d+hu ma~M mA hA d+ha me/tsa le tsa li ma hA tsa ye/
24a7(mdo sde): khi ri khi rim hA bi ri/tsi li tsi li ma hrIHli swA hA/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka
24b1(mdo sde): stsal to//glad pa'i nad pasal na mtshon dang lag mthil gyis bya'o//sprin bzlog na shing kar bi ra'i lcug mas bya'o//ga skyon chus bya'o//las gzhan rnams kyang bya'o//khrus kyi tshogs sgyur bar bya'o//
24b2(mdo sde): /cho ga thams cad kyis thams cad du sbyar bar bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' sprul nas/byang chub sems dpa'
24b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying po yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon por bstod do//'phags pa sangs rgyas bdun pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//
24b4(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/Ar+ya aSh+Ta bud d+ha ka nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/bod skad du/'phags pa sangs rgyas brgyad pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
24b5(mdo sde): dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sprin gyi kun dga' rab na/dar
24b6(mdo sde): slong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/nyon mongs pa med pa/dro bang dang ldan par gyur pa/
24b7(mdo sde): sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/cang shes pa/glang po chen po bya ba byas pa/byed pa byas pa/khur bor ba/rang gi don rjes su thob pa/srid pa
25a1(mdo sde): /kun tu sbyor ba yong su zad pa/yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol bya/sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa shwa stag ste/gang zag
25a2(mdo sde): gcig ma gtogs pa ni 'di lta ste/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'o//de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go//de nas de'i mod la stong gsum gyi stong chen
25a3(mdo sde): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'ang rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ma dkrol bar bar snang las sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya ste ga sgra dag kyang byung /lha'i me tog man+dA ra ba dang /man+da ri ba chen
25a4(mdo sde): po dang /many+dzu shaSha dang /many+dzu sha Sha chen po'i me tog gi char yang bab ste/rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tsha l-i mgron med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' rab thams cad rin po che'i me tog gis chal par
25a5(mdo sde): gang bar gyur to//de nas de'i mod la thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di gser gyi kha dog snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to//de nas de'i
25a6(mdo sde): mod la shwar phyogs nas pad+ma sdong po ni gser/'dab me ni dngul/ze 'bru ni bai DUr+ya/snying po ni rdo'i snying po las grub pa brgyad cig byung bar gyur to//pad+ma'i snying po thams cad kyi sted na
25a7(mdo sde): seng ge'i khri gro bzhi pa/rtsa ba bzhi zug pa/bkra ba lta na sdug pa/dri dang ldan pa/yid du 'ong ba/dar gyi lda ldi sbyangs pa/pog phor nas spos kyi dris shin tu bdugs pa/rin po che sna
25b1(mdo sde): tshogs du ma dag gis legs par brgyan pa/dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba du ma 'khrol ba/rin po che du ma'i bla bre bres pa dag byung bar gyur to//seng ge'i khri thams cad kyi steng na de bzhin gshes
25b2(mdo sde): ba'i sku dag kyang bzhugs par yang snang ste/mdzes pa/lta na sdug pa/dbang po zhi ba/thugs zhing //dul ba dang zhi gnas mchog brnyes pa/dul ba dang zhi gnas dam pa brnyes pa/dbang po
25b3(mdo sde): bsrungs shing thub pa/glang po shin tu dul ba blta bu/mtsho ltar dang zhing rnyog pa med la gsal ba/skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag gis sku legs par brgyan pa/gser
25b4(mdo sde): gyi kha dog lta bu'i skus nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzi brjid zil gyis mnan te bzhugs pa/spyod lam brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa/sku mdog lta bas chog mi shes pa dag snang ngo //de nas sangs
25b5(mdo sde): rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/pus mo g.yas pa'i lha de sa la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su
25b6(mdo sde): thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das shar phyogs nas pad+ma sdong po ni gser/'dab ma ni dngul/ze'u 'bru ni bai DUr+ya/snying po nr-i
25b7(mdo sde): rdo'i snying po las grub pa brgyad po 'di dag byung bar gyur te/pad+ma'i snying po thams cad kyi steng na seng ge'i khri gru bzhi pa/rtse ba bzhi zug pa/bkra ga blta na sdug pa/dri dang ldan pa/yid du
26a1(mdo sde): mchig/da b+h+re lnga ldi sbyangs pa/pog bor nas smos kyi des shin tu 'dugs pa/rin po ni sna tshogs dums logs par brgyan ga/dril dun pad/du'odang du
26a2(mdo sde): ma la khrol ba/rin po che du ma'i bre bri bros pa dag byung bar gyur pa/seng gi'i khri thams cad kyi steng na/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dag du zhugs par yang gda' ste/mdzes b+ha/
26a3(mdo sde): nathug pa/dbang po zhi ga/thugs zhi ba/dul ba dang zhi gnas mchog brnyes pa/dul ba da zhi gnas dam pa brnyes pa/dbang po bslus shing thul gyi/gling po che shin
26a4(mdo sde): s+yA l+yA zlu mats+tsha m+b+ha nga shrI rnyog pa med pa gsal ga skyes rkyen po mtshan sum thu cha gnyis po dag gis sku legs pa brgyan gyi/sa kyi la dog dzu sa
26a5(mdo sde): drizla pa'i ga gyis kyis men ste grus pa/spyod la ma rgyu dum dung na/sgyus ga skyes ga do sa pa'i daklung lags/rkyen gang gas
26a6(mdo sde): ded ces gsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das rgyas tshe dang ldan pa 'i la 'di ces kyi sprul te//shAr-I bu khyod de'i phyi sa par rab tu nyon la yod la gzu ga
26a7(mdo sde): dang bshad do// dang ldan pa shA ri'i bras bcom ldan 'das de bzhin na zhib gas la nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi lta nyon pa ngo /com ldan lam kyi mdel 'di da ces pa
26b1(mdo sde): stsal to//shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs log su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba rang
26b2(mdo sde): de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shin tu yongasu bsgrags dpal zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to//
26b3(mdo sde): shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logasu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma rnyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams yid 'od dga' zhes bya ba yod de/de na de
26b4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po'i tog gi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhos la chos kyang ston
26b5(mdo sde): to//shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logasu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gsum gyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams sdug dga' zhes bya ba yod de
26b6(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dog par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shin tu rnam par gnon pa grags mchog dpa la zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'che zhing
26b7(mdo sde): gzhes la chos kyang ston to//shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logasu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams sgo kun
27a1(mdo sde): nas 'jug pa zhes bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas g.yul las shin tu rnam par rnal ba'i rtsal
27a2(mdo sde): zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to//shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sher phyogs logasu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung lnga'i bye ma snyed 'das
27a3(mdo sde): pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rnam dag rtsegs pa zhes bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan bkod pa'i dpal kun tu
27a4(mdo sde): snang ba zhes bya ba da ltar zhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to//shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logasu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung drug gi bye ma
27a5(mdo sde): snyid 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams 'gyur med ldan zhes bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi rgyal po dpal thog
27a6(mdo sde): pa med pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhis la chos kyang ston te/shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zheng gong+gA'i klung bdun gyi
27a7(mdo sde): bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams spobs pa brtsegs pa gang ba zhes bya ba yod de de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i
27b1(mdo sde): pad+ma las rnam par gnon pas bzhud pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to//shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su spangs rgyas kyi
27b2(mdo sde): zhing gang+gA'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams sgra dbyangs snyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
27b3(mdo sde): rin po che'i pad+ma la rab tu gnas pa sA la'i rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to//shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sangs rgyas
27b4(mdo sde): kyi zhing dag ni yong su dag pa ste/snyigs ma lnga med do//yo mtshan can thams cad med do//gseg ma dang gyo mo dag med do//nye ba'i nyon mongs pa med do//bud med med do//dud 'gro dong
27b5(mdo sde): gshin rje'i 'jig rten yang med do//skang bu dang /sha sbrang dang /sdig sbrul gyis reg pa rnams med do//shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
27b6(mdo sde): de dag gi mtshan nyan pa dang /'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /ston pa dang /rab tu 'don pa dang /kun chub par byed pa de dag ngan song gsum du 'gro ba de ni gnas ma yin zhing glo
27b7(mdo sde): skabs med do//shA ri'i bu de dag sems can dmyal ba 'am/dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam/gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba de ni gnas med do//mtshams med pa byed pa dang /dam pa'i
28a1(mdo sde): chos spong ba'i gang zag ni ma gtogs te/de'ang chung ngu myong zhing mang du myong bar mi 'gyur ro//shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo grang sangs rgyas
28a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de dag gi mtshan nyan pa dang /'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /ston pa dang /rab tu 'don pa dang /kun chub par byed pa de byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi
28a3(mdo sde): bar du nam yang mngon par shes pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur/nam yang mtshan dang bral bar mi 'gyur/nam yang gzungs dang bral bar mi 'gyur/nam yang dbang po ma tshang bar mi
28a4(mdo sde): 'gyur/nam yang sgra dbyangs shin tu rgyas pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur/nam yang rnga sgra'i dbyangs dang bral bar mi 'gyur/nam yang sbyin gnas dang phyir mi ldog pa dang bral bar mi
28a5(mdo sde): 'gyur/nam yang byed chub kyi yan log gi me tog dang bral bar mi 'gyur/nam yang theg pa chen po'i mdo sde shin tu rgyas pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro//shA ri'i bu gnas ma
28a6(mdo sde): yin zhing go skabs med do//shA ri'i bu bud mod gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi mtshan nyan pa dang /'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /ston pa dang /rab tu
28a7(mdo sde): 'don pa dang /kun chub par byed pa/de bud med kyi dngos po lan gnyis thob par 'gyur ba de ni gnas med do//smon lam gyi dbang gis len pa ni ma gtogaso//shA ri'i bu
28b1(mdo sde): gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med do//shA rI'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo sangs rgyas bac+doMs de dag gi mtshan nyan pa dang /'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /ston pa dang /
28b2(mdo sde): rab tu 'don pa dang /kun chub par byed na rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo de rgyal pos 'jigs par 'gyur ba 'am/rkun pos sam/mes sam/chus sam/ma rungs pas sam/klus sam/
28b3(mdo sde): gnod sbyin gyis sam/dri zas som/lha ma yin gyis sam/mis sam/mi ma yin pas 'jigs par 'gyur ba'am/gang gis kyang glags rnyed par 'gyur ba de ni gnas med do//las kyi
28b4(mdo sde): rnam par smin pa drag po ni ma gtogs te/de'ang chung ngu myong zhing mang du myong bar mi 'gyur ro//de 'jig rten pa 'am/'jig rten las 'das pa'i don gang ci rtsom yang rung ste/ge dge ba'i
28b5(mdo sde): chos rnams 'phel ba nyid du 'gyur gyi/'grib par mi 'gyur bar re bar bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to//'jig rten mgon po de
28b6(mdo sde): ngag gi mtshan rnams 'dzin par byed pa ni//mi khom thams cad yongs spongs nas//myur du bzang 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur//sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes byas nas//ston pa de mthong dang
28b7(mdo sde): byed cing //'jig rten sgron ma mthong nas kyang //mchod pa bzang po byed par 'gyur//bskal ba bye ba grangs med tu//'khor ba rnam par spong bar byed//gang gis 'drin rnams mthong
29a1(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'i//dri med mig kyang rnam par skyong //'jig rten mgon po de dag gi/mtshan rnams su zhig 'dzin byed pa//de na gang dang grwar skyes par//'jig rten phyag bya'i
29a2(mdo sde): 'os su 'gyur//de yi gzugs mtshan phun sum tshogs//phyug pa'i khyim du skye bar 'gyur//dpa' zhing sbyin pa'i bdag por 'gyur//ser sna med cing ldog par gtong //mtshan rnams
29a3(mdo sde): 'di dag su 'dzin pa//bskal pa bye ba mang por ni//lha yi tsan+dan dmaro po yi//dri dang khA nas 'byung bar 'gyur//drang srong chen po de dag gi/mtshan rnams bud med thos gyur na//dud
29a4(mdo sde): med dngos po rnams spangs te//skyes bu mkhas par reng par 'gyur//mtshan rnams 'di dag su 'dzin pa//pha dang ma dang spyan rnams dang //mdza' ba shes nye du'i tshogs rnams kyi//
29a5(mdo sde): sdug bsngal nam yang mthong mi 'gyur//mtshan rnams 'di dag su 'dzin pa//de dang de dag 'jig rten na//'dra ba ma stong phrag bye ldan pa'i//rin chen pad+mar skye bar 'gyur//mtshan ma
29a6(mdo sde): rnams 'di dag su 'dzin pa//sangs rgyas zhing rnams thams cad du//nam mkha' las ni 'gro byed cing //'jig rten mgon po sangs rgyas zhing //rnam par dog pa mthong bar 'gyur//
29a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten mgon po'i drung dag tu//zab mo'i tshes ni nyan byed cing //ji ltar thos pa chud mi goson//mtshan rnams 'di dag su 'dzin pa//de dag la ni sdig can bdud//nag po'i
29b1(mdo sde): rtsa lag sder bcas pas//nam yang glags rnyed mi 'gyuraro//mtshan rnams 'di dag su 'dzin pA//de dag mtshon gyis mi gsod cing //dug dang mes kyang ma yin la//rgyal po dang ni rkun po
29b2(mdo sde): yis//dri dag gtse bar byed mi 'gyur//lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang //dri za lto 'phye che rnams kyis//glags kyang rnyed par mi 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas 'di dag mi mchog ste//dpal gyi snying po
29b3(mdo sde): 'dug gi rgyal//'dzangs pa bag yod gyur nas ni//mkhas mi su zhig mtshan mi 'dzin//'jig rten mgon po thams cad kyi//mtshan rnams 'di dag su nyan pa//mi de dag ni cho
29b4(mdo sde): gas nyan//grags ldan rnams kyi mtshan thos nas//de dag dpal zhing shes rab che//'jig rten mi mchog sangs rgyas 'gyur//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/
29b5(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang /lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin dang /dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rengs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa
29b6(mdo sde): mngon par bstod do//'phags pa sangs rgyas brgyad pa zhes bya ba theg po'i mdo rdzogs so////rgya gar skad du/da sha bud+d+hA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/bod
29b7(mdo sde): skad du/sangs rgyas bcu pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo//sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/
30a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong gi dge 'dun stong nyis brgya lnga bcu dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong phrag
30a2(mdo sde): rab tu mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so//de'i tshe 'khor de nyid du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yul yangs pa'i li tsa bi gzhon nu yon tan rin chen me tog rgyus pa
30a3(mdo sde): zhes bya ba 'dul bar gyur te 'dug go//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin chen me tog rgyas pa stan las langs te/blo gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar
30a4(mdo sde): nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das gang na bde log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//gal te bdag
30a5(mdo sde): cag gis zhu ba zhus pas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs rangs pa lta na/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag
30a6(mdo sde): phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin chen me tog rgyas pa la 'di skad ces
30a7(mdo sde): bka' stsal to//yon tan rin chen me tog rgyas pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la gong dang gang 'dod pa dris shig/
30b1(mdo sde): dang /ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin chen me tog rgyas pas
30b2(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag ni da ltar bcom ldan 'das bzhugs te 'tshe lco ga zhes
30b3(mdo sde): shing ches kyang ston pa gang dag gi mtshan bzung na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba mchis sam/de skad ces gsol pa dang //
30b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin chen me tog rgyas pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//yon tan rin chen me tog rgyas pa legs
30b5(mdo sde): so legs so//yon tan rin chen me tog rgyas pa khyod 'di ltar 'dir lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /lha dang /mi dang /skye bo mang po
30b6(mdo sde): rnams kyi don dang /phan pa dang /bde ba dang /'jig rten la snying brtse ba'i phyir zhugs te/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la don 'di
30b7(mdo sde): yongasu 'dri bar sems pa yon tan rin chen me tog rgyas pa khyod yang legs so//yon tan rin chen me tog rgyas pa de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la gzung zhig dang
31a1(mdo sde): ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin chen mo
31a2(mdo sde): tog rgyas pas bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyon pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//yon tan rin chen me tog rgyas pa shar phyogs legs na yon tan
31a3(mdo sde): thams cad rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan bskal ba
31a4(mdo sde): dpag tu med pa las 'das pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho la gzhes shing chos kyang ston to//bskal pa de ni thams cad nye bar bsags shing brtsegs pa zhes bya'o//de na
31a5(mdo sde): sems can rnams kyi tshe yang dpag tu med do//bcom ldan 'das yon tan bskal pa dpag tu med pa las 'das pa de'i 'khor thams cad kyang theg pa chen po l-i yang
31a6(mdo sde): dag par zhugs pa sha stag ste/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan bskal pa dpag
31a7(mdo sde): tu med pa las 'das pa zhes bya ba de'i mtshan bzung na bskal pa stong phrag drug cur 'khor ba le rgyab kyis phyogs par byed do//shi 'phos nas kyang sgrib pa med pa'i gzungs
31b1(mdo sde): zhes bya ba 'thob par 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang spobs pa yang dag par bskyed do//chos ston pa na'ang khengs par
31b2(mdo sde): mi 'gyur ro//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/gang gis skyob pa'i mtshan ni bzung byas na/de la byang chub dam pa rnyed smra zhing /bde bar gshegs pa'i yon tan gzhan rnams dang /yon
31b3(mdo sde): tan dri med 'di dag mang 'thob 'gyur//yon tan rin chen me tog rgyas pa lho phyogs logs na yon tan rin chen bkod pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/de na de bzhin
31b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan rin chen bkod pa'i dpal gzi brjid kyi phung po'i bskal pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho la gzhu
31b5(mdo sde): shing chos kyang ston to//bskal pa de ni yon tan rgya che ba zhes bya'o//rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mos de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
31b6(mdo sde): rin chen yon tan bkod pa'i dpal gzi brjid kyi phung po'i bskal pa zhes bya ba de'i mtshan bzung na shi 'phos nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od kyis mtha' klas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
31b7(mdo sde): 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi zhing yon tan bkod pa dpag tu med pa rnams yongasu 'dzin par 'gyuraro//sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du smon lam btabo pa de dang der
32a1(mdo sde): skye bar 'gyur ro//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs so//shi 'phos nas skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa
32a2(mdo sde): gnyis kyang 'thob par 'gyuro//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/khyab bdag mtshan 'di sus bzung po//mtha' klas pa yi ting nge 'dzin//'od ni nyi mo'i dkyil 'khor can//mtshan
32a3(mdo sde): rnams bcas te shi bas 'thob//yon tan rin chen me tog rgyus pa nub phyogs na sbyor bas mun pa thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khyams yod de/de na
32a4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad la spobs pa bkod pa'i dpal de ltar bzhugs te 'tsho la gzhes shIng chos
32a5(mdo sde): kyang ston to//bskal pa de ni shAkya'i rgyal po bkod pa zhes bya'o//rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
32a6(mdo sde): rgyus chos thams cad la spobs pa bkod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba de'i mtshan bzung na mtshon cha dang /me dang /chu dang /dug gis 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur zhing rdzus te
32a7(mdo sde): skye bar 'gyur ro//shi 'phos nas shugs brgya pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/rgyal ba de yi mchin ni sus bzung ba//mi dang chu
32b1(mdo sde): dang dug gis mi 'chi zhing //'di la mtshon gyis mi tshugs ma bsdu ba dang /mngal du mi skye bgazungs rnams mi des 'thob/yon tan rin chen me tog rgyas pa byang phyogs logs na mun pa dang /
