32b2(mdo sde): rdul dang bral ba zhes bya'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spobs pa dpag tu med pa yang dag par spyod pa zhes bya ba
32b3(mdo sde): de ltar bzhugs te 'tshol gzhes shing chos kyang ston to//bskal pa de ni rin che ba zhes bya'o//rigs kyi bu 'am rigs bu mos de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag por rdzogs pa'i
32b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas spobs pa dpag tu med pa dkod pa yang dag par spyod pa zhes bya ba de'i mtshan bzung na sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig drug cu mnyes par byed do//thams cad kyi rjes su song ba
32b5(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i bzungs 'thob par 'gyur ro//sgyu ma lta bu las nges par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur ro//mi zad pa'i za me tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par
32b6(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma gyur gyi bar du ngan song gsum du mi skye zhing mi spyod par 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der sems
32b7(mdo sde): can ngan song du song ba thams cad yongs su grol bar byed cing de de/thams cad bla na med pa yong dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par byed do//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/
33a1(mdo sde): bde gshegs de'i mtshan ni sus bzung ba/sems can mthu' yas byang chub bskyed pa dang /
33a2(mdo sde): gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin rnams thob pa dang //ngan 'gror skye bas 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro//yon tan rin chen me tog rgyas po shar lho'i phyogs mtshams logs na yun ring por 'de
33a3(mdo sde): ba bgod pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin gyi 'brug sgra sgra dbyangs stong pa zhes
33a4(mdo sde): bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho la gzhes shing chos kyang ston to//bskal pa de ni yon tan 'byung ba zhes bya'o//rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
33a5(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin gyi 'brug sgra sgra dbyangs stod pa zhes bya ba de'i mtshan bzung na/de shi 'phros nas so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'thob par 'gyur ro//
33a6(mdo sde): mi 'jigs pa bzhi 'thob par 'gyur ro//byams pa chen po drang snying rje chen po 'i thob par 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'thob par 'gyur ro//ji ltar de
33a7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de 'dra ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yon tan bkod pa
33b1(mdo sde): rnams 'thob par 'gyur ro//bud med kyang shi 'phos nas skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob cing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal mthong bar skye bar 'gyur ro//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/gang
33b2(mdo sde): gis mtshan 'di dag ni bzung byas na//'od dpag med 'dra'i zhing dag 'thob pa dang //bud med phor 'gyur ba sam gyis mi khyab pa'i//yon tan 'di dag gzhan yang thob par 'gyur//
33b3(mdo sde): yon tan rin chen me tog rgyas pa lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams logs na yon tan dpag tu med pa bkod pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dag
33b4(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i 'od dam pa dpal gyi gzi brjid 'byung ba zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho la gzhes shing chos kyang ston to//bskal pa de ni
33b5(mdo sde): yid bde ba yang dag par skyed pa zhes bya'o//rigis kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi
33b6(mdo sde): ma'i 'od dam pa'i dpal gyi gzi brjod 'byung ba zhes bya ba de'i mtshan thos na mtshan de dag thos pa tsam gyis sangs rgyas bye ba mnyes par 'gyur ro//thams cad du mdangs lta bu
33b7(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos mtshan de dag rgyun du bzung ba byas na shi 'phos nas sems can thams cad mdangs lta bu
34a1(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jog par byed cing /thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro//rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis
34a2(mdo sde): sems can thams cad mdangs lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par byed cing thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur zhe na/rigs kyi bu
34a3(mdo sde): ma rigs kyi bu mo gang la las ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas shing chos bstan na de ltar chos bstan pas ting nge 'dzin 'dir thob par 'gyur zhing stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
34a4(mdo sde): rten gyi khams de sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang bde bar 'gyur ro//dper na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yid du
34a5(mdo sde): 'ong ba zhes bya ba'i zhing na sems can rnams bde ba la gcig tu bkod pa dang /dran song du song ba'i sems can rnams kyang yongasu grol bar byed cing lha dang mi'i ngo bo nyid
34a6(mdo sde): thob par byed pa dang /de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par byed pa bzhin no//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/gang gis mgon de'i mtshan
34a7(mdo sde): ni bzung byos na//phyi rol ma yin rtog par byed pa dang //mdangs lta bu yi ting nge 'dzin thob byed cing //de dang gzhan du mang po skyed par byed//yon tan rin chen me tog rgyas pa
34b1(mdo sde): nuchub byang gi phyogs mtshams logs na ngan song spangs pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
34b2(mdo sde): rnam pa ma po'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po dpal 'byung ba zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho la gzhes shing chos kyang ston to//bskal ba de ni dge ba rgya che ba zhes bya'o//rigs kyi bu 'om
34b3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu mos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs po dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam pa mang po'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po dpal 'byung ba zhes bya
34b4(mdo sde): ba de'i mchin bzung na shi 'phos nas spobs pa dpag tu med pa bkod pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'thob par 'gyur ro//tshegs chung ngus de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang
34b5(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan phun sum tshogs pa bkod pa yongasu 'dzin par 'gyur ro//skye ba gcig gis bla na med pa
34b6(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'grub par 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcus chos bstan pa'ang thos par 'gyur ro//de la 'di ska do tsas bya ste/gang gis rgyal ba'i
34b7(mdo sde): mtshan de bzung byas na//skyo ba gcig gis byang chub 'thob pa dang //'od dpag med dang mnyam pa'i zhing dag dang //gzungs kyang sems can de yis 'thob par 'gyur//yon
35a1(mdo sde): tan rin chen me tog rgyas pa byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams logs na mya ngan gyi gnod pa thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/
35a2(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bskal pa bye ba grangs med par kun tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho la gzhes shing
35a3(mdo sde): chos kyang ston to//bskal pa de ni spobs pa bkod pa zhes bya'o//rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
35a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bskal pa bye ba grangs med par kun tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba de'i mtshan bzung na shi 'phos nas sgra dbyangs yan lag drug cu dang ldan pa'i spobs pa phun sum tshogs
35a5(mdo sde): pa 'thob par 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cu las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/gang gis rgyal po'i mtshan de dag ni bzung byas na//
35a6(mdo sde): rgyal ba bye ba khrag khrig brgyad cu mchod pa yi//bsod nams de dag/de la chung bar mi 'gyur zhing //sgra dbyangs phun tshogs yan lag drug cur ldan pa 'thob//yon/
35a7(mdo sde): rin che na me tog rgyas pa steng gi phyogs logs na gzi brjid dpag tu med pa bkod pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
35b1(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dge ba gser gyi na mkha' nges par sgrogs pa bkod pa dpal gyi gzi brjid 'byung ba zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho la gzhes shing chos kyang ston/
35b2(mdo sde): to//bskal pa de ni snang ba shin tu gsal ba zhes bya'o//rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
35b3(mdo sde): dge ba gser gyi na mkha' nges par sgrogs pa bkod pa dpal gyi gzi brjid 'byung ba zhes bya ba de'i mtshan bzung na tshul khrims kyi phung po dpag tu med pa yongasu dag pa dang /ting 'dzin
35b4(mdo sde): gyi phung po dpag tu med pa dang /shes rab kyi phung po dpag tu med pa dang /rnam par grol ba'i phung po dpag tu med pa dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po dpag tu med pa
35b5(mdo sde): yongs su dag par byed do//sa nas sa 'thob par 'gyur ro//'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes mchog 'thob par 'gyur ro//gnyen gyi stobs dang /rgyal srid 'thob
35b6(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro//stobs pa mi bul ba 'thob par 'gyur ro//myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//sems can thams cad kyang
35b7(mdo sde): 'chi 'pho dang /sngon gyi gnas rje su dran pa dang /brda skad shes pa thob par 'gyur ro//spobs pa rgyun mau 'tshed pa 'thob par 'gyur ro//rigs mthon po 'thos par 'gyur ro//
36a1(mdo sde): rigs chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro//tsha rabs dran par 'gyur ro//mngon par shes pa lnga dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'thob par 'gyu/
36a2(mdo sde): de la 'di skad ces bya ste/gang gis sangs rgyas mtshan de dag ni gzungs byas ni/yan lag kun dang ldan pa'i phun sum tshogs pa dang /byang chub dam pa sangs rgyas ring po ma
36a3(mdo sde): thogs shing //'jig rten rnams kyi shes pa bla na med 'thob par 'gyur//yon tan rin chen me tog rgyas pa 'og gi phyogs logs na rdul thams cad 'dus pa zhes bya ba'i
36a4(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad kyi tshul rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzi bi rgyud 'byung
36a5(mdo sde): ba zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tshol bya zhes shing chos kyang ston to//bskul ba de ni 'jig rten kun tu bas glos pa zhes bya'o//rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos bcom ldan
36a6(mdo sde): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad kyi tshul rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzi brjid 'byung bya zhes bya ba de'i
36a7(mdo sde): mtshan bzung na zla ba'i gzungs zhes bya ba 'thob par 'gyuraro//skye ba gcig gos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob par 'gyuraro//sangs rgyas
36b1(mdo sde): bye ba phrag dgu bcus chos bsnunu pa thos par 'gyur ro//sa nus kyang thams cad kun tu 'dzin par 'gyur ro//de lnga 'di skad ces bya ste/gang gis mgon de'i mtshan ni gzungs byas na//
36b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bri ba'i chos ni 'dzin byed cing //skye ba gcig gis byang chub dam pa dang //zla ba zhes bya'i gzungs ni 'dis 'thob 'gyur//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
36b3(mdo sde): bo yon tan ri na chen me tog rgyas po dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan thams cad dga' bas ni gzungs thob par gyur to//byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag
36b4(mdo sde): brgyad cu ni phyir mi ldog pa la gnas pas gnas par gyur to//lha dang mi khri phrag dpag tu med pas ni bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do//bcom ldan 'das dgyes shing
36b5(mdo sde): de skad ces bka' stsal nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin chen me tog rgyas pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan thams
36b6(mdo sde): cad dga' ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' dang /dge slong de dag dang /lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin dang /dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das
36b7(mdo sde): kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga'o//sangs rgyas bcu pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so///rgya gar skad du/Ar+ya dra da sha bud d+hi kan nA
37a1(mdo sde): ma ma hA yA na sU tra/bod skad du/'phags pa sangs rgyas bcu gnyis pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
37a2(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus cig na/bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i kha bon bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge 'dun chen po dang
37a3(mdo sde): thabs cig tu bzhugs te/byang chub sems dpa' mi pham pa la sogs pa/byang chub sems dpa'i khri nyi stong gi byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig go//
37a4(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bka' stsal pa/byams pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logasu sangs
37a5(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brjod du med pa bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dus pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mu tig can zhes bya ba yod de/
37a6(mdo sde): don de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas na mkha' dpal dri med rdul sel rab mdzes yon tan gyi tog gi 'od me tog pad+ma bai DUr+ya/
37a7(mdo sde): 'od zer rin po che'i gzugs lta bu'i sku dang ldan pa spos mchog dam pas mchod pa sku rnam par spras shing legs par brgyan pa gtsug tor gyi gtsug nas nyi ma'i 'od zes
37b1(mdo sde): dpag med zla 'od smon lam gyis brgyan pA rab sprul bgrod pa chen po chos kyi dbyings lngas mngon 'phags chags med rin chen rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing //
37b2(mdo sde): gzhes la chos kyang ston te/su rgyal ba'i mtshon 'dzin pa de bskal pa chen po dzam+bu'i gling gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi bsgral por 'khor ba los ldog go//des byang chub sems
37b3(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dra med ces bya ba lung bstan te/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas na mkha' dpal dri med rdul sel rab mdzes
37b4(mdo sde): yon tan gyi me tog gi 'od me tog pad+ma bai DUr+ya'i 'od zer rin po che'i gzugs lta bu'i sku dang ldan pa spos mchog dam pas sku rnam par sbas shing legs par brgyan pa gtsug tor gyi
37b5(mdo sde): gtsug nas nyi ma'i 'od zer dpag med zla 'od smon lam gyis rgyan pa rab sprul bkod pa chen po chos kyi dbyings las mngon 'phags chags med rin chen rgyal po de yongasu mya ngan
37b6(mdo sde): las 'das pa'i dam pa'i chos nub ma thag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
37b7(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs po/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i khe lo sgyur ba/bla na med pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi
38a1(mdo sde): ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chu lha gzhon nu nyi ma'i skyon ma zla ba'i me tog rin chen pad+ma gser sdug na mkha' lta bu'i sgra ldan rnam par snang mdzad 'ang
38a2(mdo sde): zer rab brgyan thogs myed 'khor lo dkyil 'khor phyogs bcur 'od zer rab 'byin 'jig rten khams kun tu snang byed rtog gi rgyal mtshan rgyal po zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung
38a3(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro//shar phyogs de nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bgrod pa thams cad dri med 'od ces bya ba'i mtshan kyang gzung
38a4(mdo sde): ngo //tshig 'don to//phyag bya'o//lho phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spobs pa'i rgyan la dgongs pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan
38a5(mdo sde): kyang gzung ngo //yod la bya'o//nub phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dri med zla ba'i tog gi rgyal po grags ldan zhes bya ba'i mtshan kyang gzung ngo //phyag bya'o//byang phyogs/
38a6(mdo sde): kyi de bzhin gshegs po me tog gi bkod pa snang bar mdzad pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan kyang bzung ngo //phyag bya'o//shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mdzad ces
38a7(mdo sde): bya ba'i mtshan kyang bzung ngo //phyag bya'o//lho nub kyi phyogs mtshamos kyi de bzhin gshegs pa ron tshon mchog gi grogs ldan zhes bya ba'i mtshan kyang gzung ngo //phyag bya'o//
38b1(mdo sde): nub byung gi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin ga shegs pa 'jigs med rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba'i mtshan kyang gzung ngo //phyag bya'o//byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin
38b2(mdo sde): gshigaso pA 'jigs bral bag tsha ba mi mnga' spu zing mi byed ces bya ba'i mchen kyang gzung ngo //phyag bya'o//'og gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge bsgyings pa'i med
38b3(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan kyang gzung ngo //phyag bya'o//steng gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa go ser 'od gzi brjid rgyal po zhes bya ba'i mtshan kyang gzung ngo //phyag bya'o//
38b4(mdo sde): byams po dang pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcu gnyis po 'di
38b5(mdo sde): dag gi mtshan brjod la/nyi ma bcur sdig pa thams cad kyi nyes pa bshags par bya/dge ba'i rtse ba thams cad la rje su yi rang bar bya/sangs rgyas thams cad la bskul
38b6(mdo sde): ba dang /sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol ba gdab pa dang /dge ba'i rtsu ba thams cad chos kyi dbyingasu sngo byas yongasu bsngo bar bya'o//'on kyang sdig pa thams cad zad
38b7(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro//los kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par byang bar 'gyur ro//de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing ga yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /mi 'jigs pa
39a1(mdo sde): mangs byu / na /snang tshogs pa du rgyu rlung mas rgyun na su tshogs pa dang /nas su ma du /
39a2(mdo sde): g+h+ra tu na na smras nga / sa sad+d+ha ma rdzun sna tshugs / sa
39a3(mdo sde): dun snyun rdzob s+yA m+b+ha rjes su na /DU dang yang dasan 'a 'a kun
39a4(mdo sde): byed do//de'i lo sa spyod dran sum tshogs pa dang /rigs phun sumatshogs pa dang //skyo phun sum tshogs da dang /dus phun sum tshogs pa dang //gzugs tshun dum
39a5(mdo sde): chobyas pa dang //dris 'dra ba'i skye blo'i 'khor dun su mchogs pa'ang ma sude la 'drin ces bya ste/gang dang gang du skye ba mi/tshe rabs tshe rabs thams cad /
39a6(mdo sde): mU na ga nga ba rnyed s+ho// dUd pa na rgyun da/na du mi// gas ga seM ts+tsha ga rnams kya da shA/
39a7(mdo sde): slu sa gas su sa / rkyen ma// na /sam khri ma sa ma/
39b1(mdo sde): na ku ma na su / sa / A r+m+ma rgyu tu shA na rgyu
39b2(mdo sde): sa nas pa 'gasas dul phyug sa kyi ga rnags kyi nasu 'din
39b3(mdo sde): so da na//rgyunas rjod na ga nags pa 'i b+hU r+b+hu nga skyod nan ste/ sa myu se sa/smres shi kun rgyu hU~M/
39b4(mdo sde): da ni hU~M / snang dung sa na sa//dran na sas sa pa d+ma//mas sa 'phel/sa pa thams
39b5(mdo sde): seMn mi ma //rjeg rnas na / rnams shig da //rgyun b+h+yo rnams da smran n+te/phyung phyu rgyu
39b6(mdo sde): ga nga gi la mi rgya khya sbyi kyi ba ga ma na hU~M
40a1(mdo sde): gisna de bzhin gshegs rnams kyi//mtshan rnams 'dzin par byed pa yi//bsod nams phung po de chos mang //rtag tu tshe rabs dran par 'gyur//byang chub
40a2(mdo sde): spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe//mi khom thams cad rnam spangs te//sangs rgyas 'byung ba rab mdzes brnyes//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mnyes par byed//dad pa bla na med pa'i'athab/
40a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rnams la rab dad cing //mchod pa dam pa byed par 'gyur//sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes byed de//mthong nas ston la rab tu dang //'jig rten sgron ma mthong
40a4(mdo sde): nas ni//mchod pa bzang po byed par 'gyur//mtshon rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa/bskal pa bye ba grangs med du//'a khor ba rnam par spangs nas su//byang chub myar
40a5(mdo sde): du 'tshang yang rgyu//nyin zhag bdun du chang bar ni//mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed na//gang gis 'dren rnams mthong 'gyur ba'o//rgya chen mig ni sbyangs par 'gyur//
40a6(mdo sde): 'jig rten mgon po de dag gi/mtshan rnams mi gang 'dzin byed pa//skye ba gang dang gar skyes par//de ni phyag bya'i 'o su 'gyur//mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa//bskal
40a7(mdo sde): pa bye ba bsam yas su//bkur sti ma yin 'thob mi 'gyur//'jig rten dag na grags po 'thob//mtshon rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa//de la bskal pa du mar ni//lha rnams
40b1(mdo sde): bsti stang byed par 'gyur//byang chub myur du 'chang mau rgyu//mtshan rnams 'dri dag 'dzin byed pa//mo sna byed shes rab 'tshal mi 'gyur//g.yo dang sgyu ni rnam par spangs//rtag tu
40b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rnams kyang mthong //mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa//lha dang dra za klu dbang do //mkha' ljid lha min gsang gag rtag tu de la srung bar byeda'o//gzugs dang mtshan
40b3(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs//nor chen khyim du skye bar 'gyur//sems can kun la sbyin pa byed//dpa' zhing gtong phod ser sna med//bskal pa bye ba brgya stong bar//lha yi tsan+dan dmur po dang //shin
40b4(mdo sde): tu dri zhim spos kun gyi//spos dang de yo kha nas byung //mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa//bskal pa bye bar sgra skad ni//tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ldan par 'gyur//rtag tu chos rgyal
40b5(mdo sde): tshul dang ldan//mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa//rin chen sna bdun pad+ma 'dab//bye ba stong phrag mdo yod las//'byor chen de skye lho gzugs ldan//mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin
40b6(mdo sde): byed pa//de ni pha ma spun sdug dang //skye bo dag gi tshogs rnams dang //'brel bar 'gyur ba mi mthong ngo //drang srong chen po rnams kyi mtshan//bud med kyis ni gzung byas na//bud med lus
40b7(mdo sde): lo ma chags nas//skyes pa blo gros ldan par 'gyur//mi yi lus ni thob gyur nas//bla med byang chub 'thob 'gyur te//chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor nas//'dod pa ji bzhin mya ngan
41a1(mdo sde): 'du'o//mtshon rnams 'di dag su 'dzin pa//de yi lus la mtshon drung ni//dug dang mo dang rgyal po dang //g.yon can rnams kyis mi tshugs so//mtshan rnams
41a2(mdo sde): 'di dag su 'dzin pa//de yi sems la nams kyang ni//dpung dang bzhon par bcas pa yi//bdud kyis glag so rnyed mi 'gyur ro//'di dag gi ni mtshan gyi rnams//mi glang 'dzin par
41a3(mdo sde): byed pa de//zhing ni bye ba bsam yas par//namakha' las ni 'gro bar 'gyur//sangs rgyas ston pa rnams mchod nas//'jigs pa med par zhu ba zhu//de dag de yi bsam mkhyen
41a4(mdo sde): nas//rgyal bde dag lung ston 'gyur//sangs rgyas mgon po de dag las//lung bstan pa ni 'thob 'gyur nas//de ni shin tu yi rangs te//rgyal ba'i bstan la the tshom med//
41a5(mdo sde): mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa/'jig rten mgon po rnams las ni//zab mo'i chos ni thos gyur te//thos nas thams cad 'dzin par 'gyur//de nas pha rol phyin sa
41a6(mdo sde): dang //mi 'jigs pa dang stobs rnams dang //mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po rnams//ma lus par ni rdzogs par 'gyur//sangs rgyas de dag rnams kyi ni//gang gi zhing du 'dod
41a7(mdo sde): gyur pa//de ni bla med yang dag rdzogs//byang chub rtogs nas 'tshang rgyar 'gyur//skyes pa yang ni bud med gang //mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin pa yi//yon tan 'di dang
41b1(mdo sde): gzhan dag kyang //sangs rgyas bskal pa rgyun du gsung //bag yod ldan par gyur nas ni//yon tan phun sum 'di thos nas//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grags ldan pa//de dag mtshan
41b2(mdo sde): rnams 'dzin par 'gyur//sangs rgyas 'di dag dpal snying po//sprin gyi rgyal po mi yi mchog/'jig rten mgon po 'di dag gi/mtshan ni bskol pa gang nyan pa//gang dag 'di rnam
41b3(mdo sde): mtshan nyen cing //thos nas gus por byed 'gyur ba//de dang de dag shes rab che//rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog tu 'gyur//dang srong chen po de dag gi/'di 'dra'i mtshan dag thos gyur
41b4(mdo sde): na//bag yod ldan zhing khams gyur lo//shes rab ldan mi su mi 'dzin//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams
41b5(mdo sde): pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /dge slong de dag dang /thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /lha dang /ma dang /lha ma yin dang /dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi ring
41b6(mdo sde): te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//'phags pa sangs rgyas bcu gnyis pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so///
41b7(mdo sde): rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzin mi tra dang /da na shI la dang /zhu tshen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
42a1(mdo sde): rgyu gar skad du/Ar+ya bud d+ha ma ku Ta nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra na ma hA d+hArma pan+d+ha yan/bod skad du/'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi dbu rgyan zhes bya ba theg pa chen bye/
42a2(mdo sde): mdo chos kyi rnam grangs chen po//sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tsha lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig no//bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i
42a3(mdo sde): khab na/bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang dgra bcom po zag pa zad pa stong nyes brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong rnams dang yang thabs cig/byang chub
42a4(mdo sde): sems dpa'i 'khor chen po byams pa dang /'jam dpal la sogs pa dang /lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /drang srong dang /rig sngags 'chang dang /lha'i bu mo'i tshogs
42a5(mdo sde): du ma rnams dang yang thabs cig tu bzhugs so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chu dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la bka' stsal pa/'od srung chen po las dang po pa'i byang chub sems
42a6(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu smin par bya ba'i rgyu rab tu bsten par byas/de'i phyir nyo la legs par rab tu yid la byos shig dang ngas khyod la pa shad do//bcom ldan
42a7(mdo sde): 'das legs so zhes gsol nas/tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po bac+doMs panyan /rjes kyis bka' stsal pa/'od srung tshon po shar phyogs ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas
42b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams chu bo gang+gA'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na/'jig rten gyi khams ting nge 'dzin gyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog
42b2(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin glang po dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs shing 'chol gzhes so//'od srung chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' sems
42b3(mdo sde): dpa' chen po rdul med rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba yod do//de na de bzhin gshegs pa de 'das pa dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
42b4(mdo sde): 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/de bzhin gshegs po dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rtag tu ting nge 'dzin glang po dam pa'i dpal zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung
42b5(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro//'od srung chen po rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa gang su dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
42b6(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin glang po dam pa'i dpal de dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdul med rnam par gnon pa de'i mtshan 'dzin par byed pa
42b7(mdo sde): de dag ni srid par skyes pa na tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro//bskal pa brgyar 'khor ba las phyir phyogs par 'gyur ro//de dag gis bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa 'ang yongs
43a1(mdo sde): //bzung bar 'gyur ro//bla na me pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye ba 'thob par snang 'gyur ro//'od srung chen po shar phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi nong 'di nas/
43a2(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams chu bo gaud+hA'i gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/'jig rten gyi khams byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan legs mdzes zhes bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs
43a3(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs shing 'tsho la ga zhes so//'od srung chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing de
43a4(mdo sde): na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag ni pad+ma zhes bya ba yod do//de 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa de 'das pa dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
43a5(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma dam pa'i gdugs kyi
43a6(mdo sde): rgyal po zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//'od srung chen po rigs kyi bu 'am//rigs kyi bu mo gang su dag de bzhin gshegs po dag bcom pa yang dag pa'i
43a7(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma dam pa'i dpal de dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad+ma de'i ming 'dzin par byed pa de dag ni srid par skyes pa na tshe
43b1(mdo sde): rabs dran par 'gyur ro//pad+ma dang 'dra bar 'jig rten thams cad k+Shi mi dge nga'i chos rnams kyis mi gos par 'gyuraro//pad+ma chu'i nang nas byung ba dang 'dra bar mngon par 'phags par
43b2(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro//bsgral pa sum cur 'khor bri las phyir phyogs par 'gyur ro//bla na med pa yang dag
43b3(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye ba thob par yang 'gyur ro//de dog gis bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa'ang yongasu bzung bar 'gyur ro//'od srung chen po shar phyogs na
43b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nus 'jig rten gyi khams chu bo gang+gA'i gsum gyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rdul bral bstsags pa zhes bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin
43b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi mo'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs shing 'tsho la bzhes te chos
43b6(mdo sde): kyang ston to//'od srung chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi 'od ces bya ba yod de/de bzhin gshegs pa de 'das nas bla na med pa
43b7(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs por 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhing de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'phags pa'i
44a1(mdo sde): /dpal thams cad rdzogs pa mtshan dam pa'i lus kyi sku can zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//'od srung chen po rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi
44a2(mdo sde): bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa grang su dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
44a3(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i dpal dam pa thams cad rdzogs pa mtshon dam pa'i sku can de dang /byang chub sems dpa' nyi 'od de'i mtshan 'dzin par byed pa de dag ni srid par skyes pa nacha
44a4(mdo sde): rabs dran par 'gyuraro//dge ba'i chos thams cad la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar snang ba thob par 'gyur ro//de dag la ngan song gsum po dag tu log par ltung ba'i 'jigs
44a5(mdo sde): pa 'du med par rig par bya'o//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye ba thob par yang 'gyur ro//bskal pa stong du 'khor bA las phyir phyogs bA tra 'gyuro//
44a6(mdo sde): blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par yang 'gyur ro//'od srung chen po shar phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams chu
44a7(mdo sde): ge d+ha'i bzhi'i bye ma snyed 'das pan 'jig rten gyi khams dpeng du gyur pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs po dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa
44b1(mdo sde): rgyas rin po che'i gdugs gcig pa dam pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes so//'od srung chen po rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la yang dag par
44b2(mdo sde): zhugs pa gang su dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i gdugs glacag pa dam pa'i mtshan 'dzin par
44b3(mdo sde): byed pa de dag ni srid par skyes pa na tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro//rigs ngan rnams su'ang skye bar mi 'gyur ro//dbul po'i rigs rnam su 'ang skye bar mi 'gyur ro//gang du skye bar 'gyur ba
44b4(mdo sde): thams cad du rgyal po'i rigasasu skye bar 'gyu ro//nam yang phas phongs pa 'am/mas phongs pa'am/longs spyod kyis phongs pa 'am/nod kyis nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ro//bla na med
44b5(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye ba thob par yang 'gyur ro//bskal pa stong phrag sum cur 'khor ba lo phyir phyogs par yang 'gyur ro//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
44b6(mdo sde): byang chub las kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro//'od srung chen po shar phyogs ni 'jig rten gyi khams chu bo gaung+gi'i lnga'i bye ma snyed 'dres pa na/'jig rten gyi khams yongasu dag
44b7(mdo sde): pau bsags pa zhes bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin dam pa'i rnam par gnon pa'i dpal zhes bya ba da
45a1(mdo sde): ltar bzhugs shing 'tshol gzhus so//'od srung chen po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin dam pa
45a2(mdo sde): rnam par gnon pa'i dpal de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/smon lam chen po 'di lta bu 'di skad ces rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo thog pa chen po la yang
45a3(mdo sde): dag par zhugs pa gang su dag gi ming 'dzin par byed pa de dge sring par skyes pa na skyes shing skyes pa thams cad du rab tu byung ba thob par 'gyur ba dang /rab tu byung ba thob nas
45a4(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin stong 'thob pa dang /ting nge 'dzin gcig kho nas ting 'dzin bye bo khrag khrig brgya stong mngon par bsgrub pa dang /ting nge 'dzin de dag las kyang rnam par mAM nyams pa
45a5(mdo sde): dang /'das pa'i sangs rgyas yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa khri bo gong dag dang chos ston pa la lta bar byed pa dang /'das pa'i ji lta ba bzhin du da ltar byung ba'i rnams la
45a6(mdo sde): 'dra de bzhin du 'gyur ba dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang /skyes shing skyes pa thams cad du bskul pa skyong stong du
45a7(mdo sde): 'khor ba las phyir phyogs par 'gyur ba dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i byang chub dang nye ba thob par yang 'gyur bor btab bo//'od srung chen po rigs kyi
45b1(mdo sde): 'am rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la lnga dag par zhugs pa gang su dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin dam pa rnam par gnon pa'i
45b2(mdo sde): dpal de'i mtshan 'dzin par byed pa de dag ni srid par skyes pa na tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro//'jig rten gyi khams rnam par bkra ba zhes bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dag
45b3(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i dkyil 'khor gzi brjid kyis mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po'i dpal zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes//
45b4(mdo sde): 'od srung chen po rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa gang su dog bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
45b5(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzi brjid kyis mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po'i dpal 'di mtshan 'dzin par byed pa de dag ni srid par skyes pa ni tshe rabs dran pa
45b6(mdo sde): dang /blo gris dang ldan pa dang /shes rab dang ldan pa dang /gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang /mtshan dang ldan par mi spro ba de lta bu'i tshig dang /spongs pa mi zlog pa rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu
45b7(mdo sde): modo dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro//de dag chos ston pa ni mdun na sangs rgyas kyi gzugs gnas par 'gyur//ma thos shing lung ma phog dbye ba khrag khrig grangs med par spro bar mi
46a1(mdo sde): 'gyur ba de lta bu'i tshig dang spobs pa mi zlog pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro//ci nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par
46a2(mdo sde): 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos ston par 'gyuro//bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med par 'khor ba las phyir phyogs par 'gyur ro//de dag glas bsod nams kyi phung po
46a3(mdo sde): dpag tu med pa'ang yongasu bzung bar 'gyuraro//'od srung chen po shar phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bzhi bcu
46a4(mdo sde): 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen ldan zhes bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen me tog kun tu
46a5(mdo sde): snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba de ltar bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes so//'od srung chen po rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa gang su dag
46a6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen me tog kun tu snang ba'i dpal de'i mtshan 'dzin par byed pa de dag ni srid par skyes 'dug
46a7(mdo sde): ste chos ston par 'gyu ro//'dod na dzam+bu gling 'di skad kyis go bar byed par 'gyur ro//'dod na stong ga sum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khoms 'di skad kyis go bar byed
46b1(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro//chos 'chad pa na sems can gang dag ji ltar myos pa dang /ci nas kyang bla na mod pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldeg par 'gyur ba de lta bu de dag
46b2(mdo sde): la chos ston par 'gyur ro//bskul pa stong phrag drug curu 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur ro//'od srung chen po shar phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams
46b3(mdo sde): stong phrag drug cu 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che zhes bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po
46b4(mdo sde): zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzheso//'od srub tshon po rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa gang su dge bcom ldan 'das de
46b5(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po de'i mtshan 'jig par byed pa de dag ni srid par skyes pa na tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro//rin po
46b6(mdo sde): che bdun po byang chub kyi yan lag gi rin po che rnams thob par 'gyur ro//'od srung chen po lho phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag sum cu 'das pa na 'jig
46b7(mdo sde): rten gyi khams sgra yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas go 'phong mtha' yas rnam par gnon ces bya ba
47a1(mdo sde): da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so//'od srung chen po rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa gang su dag bcom ldan
47a2(mdo sde): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas go 'phang mtha' yas rnam par gnon pa de'i mtshan 'dzin par byed pa de dag ni srid par skyes/
47a3(mdo sde): pa na tsha rabs dran par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba 'thob par 'gyur te/de la gnas nas shar phyogasu tsho bo
47a4(mdo sde): gang+gA'i bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'gyur ro//de bzhin du lho dang /nub dang /byang dang /shar lho dang /lho nub dang /nub byang dang /byang shar dang /'og dang /
47a5(mdo sde): steng gi phyogs dang /phyogs bcu kun tu'ang phyogs re rer chu bo gang+gA'i bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'gyur ro//de rnams kyis chos bstan pa'ang yang
47a6(mdo sde): dag par shes par 'gyuro//rtag tu sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes par bod par 'gyur ro//byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams dang mi 'bral/
47a7(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro//bskal pa stong phrag sum cu rtsa lngar 'khor ba las phyir phyogs par 'gyur ro///
47b1(mdo sde): dedag gis bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa yongs bzung bar 'gyur ro//'od srung chen po lho phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag sum cu rtsa/
47b2(mdo sde): lnga 'das pa na/'jig rten gyi khams spos mchog dri zhim zhes bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos mchog
47b3(mdo sde): mtha' yas rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs shing 'tshal gzhi so//'od srung chen po de bzhin gshegs pa spos mchog mtha' yas rgyal pos sngon gyi smon lam 'di skad
47b4(mdo sde): ces bta//sngon smon lam btab pa de gang zhe na/'di lta ste/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa gang su dag
47b5(mdo sde): bdag gi ming 'dzin par byed pa de yon tan 'di lta ste/skyes shing skyes pa thams cad du tshe rabs dran zhing tshangs par spyod par 'gyur ba dang /skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa
47b6(mdo sde): gnyis kyis lus legs par brgyan par 'gyur ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag tu snang bar byed cing yang dag por 'gro bar byed la/bodag gis kyang de dag gi sangs rgyas
47b7(mdo sde): kyi byang chub rdzogs par bya zhing gal te sa chen po 'di mes gang bar gyur na me de'ang bsad la de dag la rin po che dag 'byung bar bya ba dang /slong bar byed pa rnams la ci nas kyang
48a1(mdo sde): sems can gyi yid mi gcad par bya zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang /bskal pa stong phrag
48a2(mdo sde): sum cur 'khor ba las phyir phyogs par 'gyur ba dang /de dag gis bsod nams kyi phung po yongasu bzung bar 'gyur ba 'di dag 'thob par gsol ba btabo//'od srung
48a3(mdo sde): chen po lho phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams chu bo gang+gA'i brgyad kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/'jig rten gyi khams de na de bzhin gshegs pa dag
48a4(mdo sde): bcom pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen dam pa zhes bya ba dwa ltar bzhugs shing 'tshe la gzhes so//'od srung chen po rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo byung
48a5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa gang su dag de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen dam pa de'i
48a6(mdo sde): mtshan 'dzin par byed pa de dag ni srid par skyes pa na tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro//mngal na 'dug bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzigs pa dang /sangs rgyas
48a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong ba dang mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro//de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi zhal nas rigs kyi bu khyod bla na med pa yang dag par
48b1(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par byung ba yin no//rigs kyi bu khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa yin no//rigs kyi bu khyod mngalda na 'dug
48b2(mdo sde): bzhin du lho dang klu dang gnod sbyin gzhan dag kyang bla na med po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu smin par byed par 'gyu ro//bskal pa stong du 'kho ba las phyir phyogs par
48b3(mdo sde): byed par 'gyur ro zhes gsungango //de dag gis bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa yongasu bzung bar 'gyur ro//'od srung chen po nub phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig
48b4(mdo sde): rten gyi khams chu bo gang+gA'i gsum gyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams legs par rnam par phye ba rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
48b5(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthu snang che zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhoso//'od srung chen po rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la
48b6(mdo sde): yang dag par zhugs pa gang su dag bcom ldan 'dis de bzhin gshegs po dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthu snang che de'i mtshan 'dzin par byed pa
48b7(mdo sde): de dag ni srid par skyes pa na tshe rabs dran par 'gyu ro//byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'ang thob par 'gyur te/de la
49a1(mdo sde): gnas na sangs rgyas kyi zhing chu bo gang+gA'i bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams yang mthong bar 'gyuraro//'od srung
49a2(mdo sde): chen po de ltar na mi pham pa dang 'dra ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yon tan gang dag yin pa'i yon tan gyi phan yon de dag de la 'byung bar 'gyur ro//'od srung chen po bud
49a3(mdo sde): med gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan 'dzin par byed pa 'dra de'i bud med kyi dngos po tha ma 'ang de yin te/de nas shi 'phos nas skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob par 'gyuraro//
49a4(mdo sde): de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa mthu 'od chen po de'i mtshan 'dzin pa ni don chen po byang ba yin no//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di skad ces bka'

49a6(mdo sde): rgya zhing //lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten drag gi rten dang dpung gnyen 'gyur//'od srung tshon po rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa gang su dag

49b1(mdo sde): kyi phung po dpag tu med pa'ang 'byung bar 'gyuraro//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye ba thob par yang 'gyur ro//'od srung chen po byang phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dri nas/
49b2(mdo sde): pha rol na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen dam pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs shing 'tsho la go zhes so//'od srung chen po rigs
49b3(mdo sde): bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa gang su dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin
49b4(mdo sde): chen dam pa de'i mtshan 'dzin par byed pa de dag ni bsod nams chen po skyed par 'gyur te/'od srung chen po rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la yang dag par
49b5(mdo sde): zhugs pa gang zhig gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la r-i'i rgyal po ri rob lta bu de tsam gyi gser gyi phung po 'bul zhing gtong la 'jog par byed cing de lta bur dbul
49b6(mdo sde): ba 'bul bar byed pa 'dra lo bye ba khrig khrig brgya stong du dbul ba 'bul bar byed pa bas na sangs rgyas kyi mtshan yongasu bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di la brgya'i char yang nye bar mi
49b7(mdo sde): 'gro/stong dang /brgya stong dang /grangs dang /cha dang bgrang ba dang /dper yang nye bar mi 'gro ste/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin
50a1(mdo sde): tshenA dam rgyun 'dzin par byed pa rnams la ga la ta yod pa mchog ni 'di kho na yin no//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshog su bcad pa 'di skad
50a2(mdo sde): ces bka' stsal to//'jig rten gyi ni mgon pa 'od mdzad pa//de dag dus dang dus yin mkhyen pa yis//sems can thams cad dag la phan mdzad pa//de dag shar dang lho dang
50a3(mdo sde): nub dang nI//byang gi phyogs rnams dag na rab bzhugs pa//skyes bu rnams kyi gtso bo de dag la//nyin par dang ni mtshan mo dag tu yang //gus dang bcas pas thal sbyar phyag
50a4(mdo sde): byos shig/mi yi dam pa gang dag ni//bskal pa stong na dbyung ba yi//mchog tu rnyed dka' de la yang //phyag byas mngon shes ci zhig yod//sangs rgyas bkur sti byed 'dod
50a5(mdo sde): dpa'//rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod pa nyid//des ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi mtshan//rgyal bas bshad pa 'odi mnyan bya//sangs rgyas ye shes bskyod pa la//nr-i mo ya
50a6(mdo sde): som nyi mi za ste//dge bo'i rtsa ba de yis ni//ye shes bsam yas 'di 'thob bo//gang zhig rtag tu sangs rgyas la//mchod bya bsam yAs byed 'dod pa//de yis
50a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas mtshan thos nas//gzhan dag la ni rab bstan bya//gang zhig sems can bye ba dag/srid pa spongs par dgrol 'dod pa//de yis sangs rgyas mtshan thos
50b1(mdo sde): nA//mA nyid du ni de mi spro//gang zhig zhing ni bye ba dag/rkang pa'i mthe bos bA sbrul 'dod du//de yis sang+yas rgyus mtshan thos nas//skye bo mngal de bstan b+hu//gang zhig sangs rgyas rnams
50b2(mdo sde): kyi 'di 'dzin de//rgyal ba 'dren pa mang po mchod pas na//des ni skye ba gcig gis mi yin la//bcu yi som yin nyi shus ma yin no//'jig rten 'di ni gang+gA'i bye snyed kyi//rin chen
50b3(mdo sde): gser gyi mdog gros bkang 'bul bas//gang zhig sangs rgyas mchog gi mtshan thos na//sbyin phung de yis brgya yi char mi phod//gang zhig sangs rgyas mtshan 'di thos nas
50b4(mdo sde): 'dzin//de dag mir gyur mchog ni legs par rnyed//de mi'i 'jig rten dbyangs kyis yan lag ldan//rab tu 'byung ba legs rnyed zas legs spyad//bcom ldan 'das kyis
50b5(mdo sde): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /dge slong de dag dang /byang chub sems dpo'i de dag dang /gunas brtan 'od srung chen po dang /lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin dang /dri zar bcas pa'i
50b6(mdo sde): 'jig rten bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la rjesu yi rangs nas mngon par bstod do//theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi dbu rgyan zhes
50b7(mdo sde): bya ba thog pa chen po'i mdo'i chos kyi rnam grangs chen po rdzog so//rgya gar gyi mkhan po shAkya si d+ha dang /lo ts+tsha ba ban+de de ben+da rak+Shi tas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la
51a1(mdo sde): phab pa///rgya gar skad du/Ar+ya bud+d+ha b+hU mau nA ma ma hA yA na sU tA/bod skad du/'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi sa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i
51a2(mdo sde): mdo//sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tsholo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus cig na/bcom ldan 'das gzhal med khang chen po rin
51a3(mdo sde): bo che sna bdun mchog tu 'bar ba bkod pa/'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa rgyas par 'gengs pa'i 'od zer chen po rab tu 'byung ba/gnas tha dad pa shin tu rnam par phye
51a4(mdo sde): ba tshad med pa rnam par gnas pa/rgya yongasu ma chad pa/khams gsum pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i spyod yul/'jig rten las 'das pa'i de'i bla ma'i
51a5(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba/shin tu rnam par dag cing dbang sgyur ba'i rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas/byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med
51a6(mdo sde): pa'i dge 'dun rje su song ba/lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye tshon po dang /brgya byin dang /tshangs pa
51a7(mdo sde): dang /'jig rten skyong ba dang /mi dang /mi ma yin pa tshad med pa rnam par rgyu ba/chos kyi ro'i dga' ba dang bde ba chen pos brtan pa/sems can thams cad kyi don thams
51b1(mdo sde): cad yang dag par thob par byed par nye bar gnas pa/nyon mongs pa'i gnod pa thams cad dang bral ba/bdud thams cad yongasu spangs pa/thams cad kyi bkod pa las lhag pa/de bzhin/
51b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi bkod pa/dran pa dang /blo gros dang /rtogs pa chen pos nges par 'byung ba yin pa zhi gnas dang lhag mthong chen po'i bzhon pa yin pa rnam par thar
51b3(mdo sde): pa'i sgo chen po stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa nas 'jug pa/rin po che chen po'i pad+ma'i rgyal po yon tan gyi tshogs tshad med pas brgyan pa'i bkod pa la brten
51b4(mdo sde): pa na bzhugs te/bcom ldan 'das legs par thugs su chud pa'i blo dang ldan pa/kun tu spyod pa gnyis mi mnga' ba/mtshan nyid med pa'i chos la mchog tu gzhol bar mdzad pa/
51b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi gnas pas gnas da/ng+yas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid brnyes pa/sgrib pa med po'i rtogs pa brnyes pa/phyir mi zlog pa'i chos dang ldan pa/spyod yul gyis mi 'phrogs
51b6(mdo sde): bya/bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par 'jog pa/dus gsum la mnyam pa nyid tshar phyin pa/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du zhugs pa'i sku dang ldan po/chos thams cad la the
51b7(mdo sde): chom med pa'i mkhyen pa mnga' ba/spyod pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i blo mnga' ba/chos mkhyen pa la nem nur mi mnga' ba/rnam par ma brtags pa'i sku mnga' ba/byang chub sems
52a1(mdo sde): dpa' thams cad kyis ye shes yang dag par blangs pa/sngangs rgyas kyi gnas pa gnyi su med 'a dam pa'i pha rol tu byon pa//de bzhin gshegs pa ma 'dus
52a2(mdo sde): pa rnam par thar par mdzad pa'i ye shes kyi mthar phyin pa/mtha' dang dpung med pa'i sangs rgyas kyis mnyam pa nyid thug su chud pa/chos kyi dbyings dam pa can/na mkha'i
52a3(mdo sde): khams kyi mthas gtugs pa/phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa de nyan thos kyi dge 'dun tshad med pa thams cad kyang cang shes pa/sangs rgyas kyi sras/sems shin tu rnam par
52a4(mdo sde): grol ba/shes rab shin tu rnam por grol ba/tshul khrims shin tu rnam par dag pa/chos 'dod pa rnams bde ba dang phrad pa/mang du thos pa/thos pa 'dzin pa/thos pa
52a5(mdo sde): bsags pa/legs par bsam pa sems pa/legs par smra ba rjod pa/legs par bya ba'i las byed pa/shes rab myur ba/shes rab ma phyogs pa/shes rab rno ba/nges
52a6(mdo sde): par 'byung ba'i shes rab can/nges par rtogs pa'i shes rab can/shes rab che ba/shes rab yangs pa/shes rab zab pa/shes rab mnyam pa med pa/shes rab rin po
52a7(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa/rig pa gsum dang ldan pa/tshe 'di la bde bar gnas pa'i mchog thob pa/yon yongasu sbyong ba chen po/spyod lam rab tu zhi ba/phun sum tshogs pa/
52b1(mdo sde): bzod pa dang sa pa chen po dang ldan pa/de bzhin gshegs pa'i blo/'phrul shin tu zhugs pa sha stag dang /bya chub sems dpa' shin tu 'dus pa la sogs pa spangs rgyas kyi zhing bdu
52b2(mdo sde): nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpag tu med pa thams cad kyang ginas chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa/theg pa chen po'i chos kyis nges par byung gson pang
52b3(mdo sde): las su ma nyig/bskol pa dang bskal pa ma yin par rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba/bdud byir rgyal ba thams cad nges par bcom pa/rten thos dang nga sangs rgyas kyi yid
52b4(mdo sde): byed pa thams cad las ring du gyur pa/chos chen po'i ri'i dga' ba dang bde bas nye bar brtan po/'jigs pa lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/byir mi ldog pa'i sa bgrod pa gcig
52b5(mdo sde): dor gyur pa can/sems can thams cad kyi gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i sa mngon du gyur pa sha stag dang thabs cig go//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub
52b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' shin tu 'dus lnga bka' stsal pa/shin tu 'dus sangs rgyas kyis ni chos lngas bstis pa yin te/ na/gi sgra ste/chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa dang /mo lo
52b7(mdo sde): bu'i ye shes dang /mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang /bya ba bsgrub pa'i ye shes kyis so//shin tu 'dus do la chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa ni
53a1(mdo sde): 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha' ni gzugs su gyur pa sna tshogs kyi rnam pa thams cad na kun+da na yod kyang des brjod par bya ba'ang ma yin/sna tshogs kyang ma yin
53a2(mdo sde): te ro gcig go//de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'ang shes bya sna tshogs kyi rnam pa thams cod la kun na yod kyang des brjod par bya ba
53a3(mdo sde): 'ang ma yin/sna tshogs kyang ma yin te ro gcig go//shin tu 'dus 'dri lta ste dper na/na mkha' ni gzugasu gyur pa thams cad tha mi dad par zhugs kyang gzugs kyi nyes pa
53a4(mdo sde): rnams kyis kyang mi gos so//de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa 'ang sems can thams cad dang sems mnyam pa nyid kyi yongasu grub
53a5(mdo sde): pas tha mi dad par zhugs kyang sems can gyi nyes pa rnams kyis kyang mi gos so//shin tu 'dus 'di lta ste dper na/na mkha' ni lus dang /ngag dang /yid kyi las su gyur
53a6(mdo sde): pa thams cad la go 'byed kyang na mkha' ni rtsol ba'ang med/mngon par 'du byed pa'ang med do//de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings rnam par dge
53a7(mdo sde): pa'ang ye shes dang /sprul pa dang sems can gyi bya ba sgrub pa thams cad kyi go 'byed kyang chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa ni rtsol ba'ang med/mngon por 'du byed pa'ang
53b1(mdo sde): med do//shin tu 'dus 'di lta ste dper na/na mkha' lnga gzugs rnam pa tha dad pa rnams kyi skye ba 'ang snang /'jigs pa 'ang snang yang na mkha' ni skye ba 'ang med 'jigs pa'ang med do//
53b2(mdo sde): de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa la yang shes pa dang /sprul pa dang sems can gyi byi ba sgrub pa thams cad kyi skye ba 'ang snang /'jig pa'ang
53b3(mdo sde): snang yang chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa ni skye ba 'ang maud/'jig pa 'ang med do//shin tu 'dus 'di lta ste dper na/na mkha' la gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs du ma dag gi 'phel ba
53b4(mdo sde): 'di snang /'grib po'ang snang yang na mkha' la ni 'phel ba'ang med/'grib pa'ang med do//de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa la de bzhin
53b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i bstan pa snying khu 'phel ba'ang snang /nub par 'gyur ba'ang snang yang chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa ni 'phel ba 'ang med/'bri ba med do//shin tu 'dus 'di lta ste/
53b6(mdo sde): dper na/nam mkha' thug pa med pa'i phyir na mkha'i la phyogs bcu na gzugasu gyur pa rnams mtha' yas mu med kyang na mkha' ni 'gro ba 'am/'ong ba 'am/g.yo ba'am/
53b7(mdo sde): 'gul ba med do//de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa mtha' thug pa med pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa la phyogs bcu
54a1(mdo sde): dag na sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /badra ba so sor nye bar gnas par bya ba dag mtha' yas mu med kyang chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa ni 'gro ba
54a2(mdo sde): 'am/'ong ba 'am/g.yo ba 'am/'gul ba med do//shin tu 'dus 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha' la stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig pa dag kyang snang /'chags pa dag kyang
54a3(mdo sde): snang yang na mkha' ni 'jig pa'ang ma yin/'chags pa'ang ma yin no//de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa la rnam pa thams
54a4(mdo sde): cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang /yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa dpag tu med pa dag snang yang chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa la mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
54a5(mdo sde): rgya ba 'ang med/yongasu mya ngon las 'da' ba'ang med do//shin tu 'dus 'di lta ste dper na/na mkha' la rten pa gzugasu gyur pa dag la snang ba dang /'drul ba dang /'tshig
54a6(mdo sde): po dang /sgyum pa dang /'gyur ba rnam pa sna tshogs snang yang na mkha' la ni de dag gis 'gyur ba'ang med/yongasu skyo ba 'ang med do//de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
54a7(mdo sde): kyi chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa la rten pa'i sems can gyi khams la bslab pa dang /lus dang /ngag dang /yid kyi las log par grub pa rnam pa mang po snang yang
54b1(mdo sde): chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa ni de dag gis 'gyur ba'ang med/yongasu skyo ba'ang med do//shin tu 'dus 'di lta ste dper na/na mkha' la rten pa'i sa chen po'ang snang /ri chen po dang
54b2(mdo sde): me dang /stong ba dang /bya rgyu ba drug dang /nyi ma dang zla ba rgyu ba dag kyang snang yang na mkha' ni de dag gi mtshan nyid ma yin no//de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings
54b3(mdo sde): rnam par dgra ba la tshul khrims dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /shes rab dang /rnam par grol ba dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po dag snang yang chos kyi dbyings rnam
54b4(mdo sde): par dag pa ni de dag gi mtshan nyid ma yin no//shin tu 'dus 'di lta ste dper na/na mkha' la rgyu dang rkyen gzhan dang gzhan 'dus pa'i stong gsum gyi stong tshan po'i 'jig rten
54b5(mdo sde): gyi khams kyi dkyil 'khor dpag tu med pa dag snang yang de la na mkha' ni rtsol ba'ang med/mngon par 'du byed pa'ang med do//de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
54b6(mdo sde): kyi chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa la sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam pa thams cad phun sum tsho gros pa dpag tu med pa dag snang yang chos kyi dbyings rnam par
54b7(mdo sde): dag pa la ni rtsol ba'ang med/mngon par 'du byed pa'ang med do//shin tu 'dus me long lta bu'i ye shes ni 'di lta ste dper na/me long gi dkyil 'khor la rton nas/gzugs
55a1(mdo sde): brnyan dag spyad do//de bzhin du dbazhin grwa glegs pa rnams kyi ma lcong lta bu'i ye shes kyi kyil 'khor la brten nas skye mchod dang de'i yul la rnam par
55a2(mdo sde): shes pa'i gzugs brnyan dge slong ngo //de bas ni me long gi dkyil 'khor dang /me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor mnyam pas mnyam pa ste/des nA me long lta bu'i
55a3(mdo sde): ye shes de mA lang lta bu'i ye shes zhes bya'o//de lta bas na me long gi dkyil 'khor ni de'i dper rig par bya'o//shin tu 'dus 'di lta sto dper na mI bsod nams 'dod pa
55a4(mdo sde): la la zhig gis skye ba phal po che ji snyed 'ongs shing lhags pa dag rang gi lus kyi skyon dang yon tan la so sor rtog par bya ba'i phyir me long gi dkyil 'khor chen po gnas
55a5(mdo sde): bzang por mi 'gul bar bzhag na skyon sel cing yon tan skyed par 'gyu ro//de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mA long lta bu'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor yang
55a6(mdo sde): sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa ji snyed pa dag kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba la so sor rtog par bya ba'i phyir rgyun ma 'chad pas mi g.yo dar chos kyi
55a7(mdo sde): dbyings rnam par dag pa'i gan su bzhag na kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /rnam par byed pa sa yo ba dang /skyed par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//shin tu 'dus 'di lta ste dper na/ma
55b1(mdo sde): gi dkyil 'khor shin tu phyis pa gsal zhing rnam par dang la g.ya' med pa ni kun tu lam me thal le lhang nge'o//de bzhin du de bzhin gra shegs pa rnams kyi me long lta bu'i ye shes
55b2(mdo sde): kyi dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas kyi ye shes nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa'i dri mo bsal ba shin tu sbyangs pa'ang de la brten pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongasu bzung bas gsal zhing rnam
55b3(mdo sde): par dang la g.ya' med do//sems can thams cad kyi bya ba sgrub pa nyid kyi phyir lam me thal le lhang nge'o//shin tu 'dus 'di lta ste dper na/me long gi dkyil 'khor ni gzugs
55b4(mdo sde): kyi rkyen la ltos nas gzugs brnyan sna tshogs 'byung ba'i rgyur 'gyuraro//de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor yang sems can
55b5(mdo sde): gyi dus kyi rkyen la ltos nas ye shes kyi gzugs brnyan sna tshogs 'byung ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro//shin tu 'dus 'di lta ste dper na/me long gi dkyil 'khor la gzugs brnyan rnam
55b6(mdo sde): pa du ma rnam pa sna tshogs mang po snang yang me long gi dkyil 'khor de la de dag yod pa ma yin te/de la me long gi dkyil 'khor de ni rtsol ba'ang med/mngon par 'du byed
55b7(mdo sde): ba'ang med do//de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor la shes pa'i gzugs brnyan rnam pa du ma rnam pa sna tshogs mang po 'byung
56a1(mdo sde): yang me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor de la shes pa'i gzugs brnyan de dag yod pa ma yin te//de la me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor du
56a2(mdo sde): rtsol ba'ang med/mngon par 'du byed pa 'ang med do//shin tu 'dus 'di lta ste dper na/me long gi dkyil 'khor ni gzugs brnyan rnam pa du ma sna tshogs mang po de dag dang
56a3(mdo sde): ldan pa'ang ma yin/mi ldan pa 'ong ma yin te/de dag dang mi nye ba dang de'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro//de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi
56a4(mdo sde): dkyil 'khor yang shes pa'i gzugs brnyan rnam pa du ma sna tshogs mang po de dag dang ljon pa 'ang ma yin/mi ldan pa'ang ma yin te/de dag dang mi nye ba dang bsnyel ba mi
56a5(mdo sde): mnga' ba'i chos nyid kyi phyir ro//shin tu 'dus 'di lta ste dper na/me long gi dkyil 'khor ngos thams cad nas legs par phyis pa ni mdun dang /zur dang /rgyab dang /
56a6(mdo sde): kun nas kyang gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro//de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor yongasu ma chad pa dang
56a7(mdo sde): tshad med pa'i rnam pa shin tu sbyangs pa 'ang kun nus shes pa'i gzugs brnyan rnams 'byung ba'i rgyur 'gyur te/'di lta ste/nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams nyan
56b1(mdo sde): thos kyi theg pas nges par 'byung bar bya ba dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas nges par 'byung bar bya ba dang /theg pa chen po pa rnams theg pa chen pos
56b2(mdo sde): nges par 'byung ba bya ba'i phyir nyan thos kyi theg pa shes pa'i gzugs brnyan rnams dang /rang slongs rgyas kyi theg pa shes pa'i gzugs brnyan rnams dang /theg pa chen po shes
56b3(mdo sde): bya'i gzugs brnyan rnams kyi rgyur 'gyuraro//shin tu 'dus 'di lta ste dper ni/me long gi dkyil 'khor la 'di lta ste/sa dang /ri dang /shring dang /khyim dang /gzhalnga med khang chen
56b4(mdo sde): bo'i gzugs brnyan snang ste/gzugs brnyan chen po dag snang yang me long gi dkyil 'khor ni de'i tshad du ma yin no//de bzhin du de bzhin gshogs pa rnams kyi me long lta
56b5(mdo sde): bu'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor la 'ang byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po nas bzung ste sangs rgyas kyi sa'i bar dag gi ye shes kyi gzugs brnyan dug kyang snang /'jig rten pa
56b6(mdo sde): dang 'jig rten las 'dras pa'i chos thams cad shes pa'i gzugs brnyan dag kyang snang ste/me long lta bu'i ye shes la ni tshad yongasu chad pa gang yang med do//shin tu 'dus 'di
56b7(mdo sde): lta ste dper na me long gi dkyil 'khor ni gzugs gzhan gyis bsgribs pa'i gzugs rnams la gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i rgyur mi 'gyur ro//de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa
57a1(mdo sde): rnams kyi me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor yang sems can mI dge ba'i grogs pos zin pa dam pa'i chos ma yin pa nyan pas bsgribs pa dag la
57a2(mdo sde): ye shes kyi gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i rgyur mi 'gyur te/snod ma yin pa'i phyir ro//shin tu 'dus 'di lta ste dper na/me long gi dkyil 'khor ni gzugs mun pa'i nang du
57a3(mdo sde): bzhag pa rnams kyi gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i rgyur mi 'gyur ro//de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi me long de lta bu'i yis kyi dkyil 'khro lnga sa ni nyes par spyod pa la dga'
57a4(mdo sde): ba ma rig pa'i mun par zhugs pa rnams la ye shes kyi gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i rgyur mi 'gyur te/snod ma yin pa'i phyir ro//shin tu 'dus 'di lta ste dper na/me
57a5(mdo sde): long gi dkyil 'khor ni yul bskal pa rnams na gnas pa'i gzugs rnams kyi gozugs brnyan 'byung ba'i rgyur mi 'gyur ro//de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi
57a6(mdo sde): me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor yang sems can dam pa'i chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i las rnam par dag pa ma yin pa la gnas pa 'dod chen pa ma yin
57a7(mdo sde): bdag la ye shes kyi gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i rgyur mi 'gyur te/snod ma yin pa'i phyiraro//shin tu 'dus mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes ni yongasu grub pa rnam pa bcu
57b1(mdo sde): las rig par bya ste/mtshan dang /badrag po dang /dga' bo mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa yongasu grub pa las dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba nyam su myong ba mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa
57b2(mdo sde): yongasu grub pa las dang /mtshan nyid dben pa mtshan nyid med par mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa'i yongasasu grub pa las dang /yongasu skyob pa'i rnam pa'i byams pa chen po mnyam pa nyid
57b3(mdo sde): khong du chud pa'i yongasu grub pa las dang /yal bar mi 'dor ba'i rnam pa'i snying rje chen po mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa'i yongasu grub pa las dang /sems can thams cad la mos pa
57b4(mdo sde): ji lta ba bzhin du gzugs kyi lus kun tu ston pa mnyam pa nyid yongasu grub pa las dang /sems can thams cad kyis gzung bar 'os pa'i tshig mnyam pa nyid yongasu grub pa
57b5(mdo sde): las dang 'jig rten nye bar zhi ba dang ro gcig pa mnyam pa nyid yongasu grub pa las dang /'jig rten gyi chos bde ba dang sdug bsngal ro gcig pa mnyam pa nyid yongasu
57b6(mdo sde): grub pa las dang /yon tan shin tu bskyed pa mnyam pa nyid yongasu grub pa las so//shin tu 'dus so sor rtog pa'i ye shes ni 'di lta ste dper na/'jig rten gyi kham
57b7(mdo sde): ni sems can gyi khams kyi gnas yin no//de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyang ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo dang /so so yang
58a1(mdo sde): dag par rig pa dang /spobs pa dang /bstan pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi glunas yin no//shin tu 'dus 'di lta ste dper na/'jig rten gyi
58a2(mdo sde): khams ni sems can rnams kyi rnam par rig pa rnam pa sna tshogs can cig car 'byung ba'i rgyu yin no//de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi so sor rtog pa'i ye shes
58a3(mdo sde): kyang shes bya thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyi rnam par rig pa rnam pa sna tshogs can cig car 'jug pa'i rgyu yin no//shin tu 'dus 'di lta ste dper na/
58a4(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khyams ni kun dga' ra ba dang /nags tshul dang /rdzing bu nyams dga' bi rnam pa sna tshogs pa dag gis lA mo mI thal le lhang nge'o//de bzhin du de bzhin gshe
58a5(mdo sde): pa rnams kyi so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyang pha rol tu phyin pa dang /byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos dang /stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
58a6(mdo sde): rnams kyis rnam pa sna tshogs nyams dga' ba dag gos lam mo thal le lhong nge'o//shin tu 'dus 'di lta ste dper na/'jig rten gyi khams ni 'di lta ste/gling dang /zla ba dang /
58a7(mdo sde): nyi ma dang /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang /sum cu rtsa gsum dang /'thab bral dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /tshongs ris la sogs
58b1(mdo sde): pas shin tu rnam par phye ba'i rnam pa yin no//de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes kyang 'di lta ste/'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
58b2(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa dang /rgud pa dang /rgyu dang 'bras bur bcas pa dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag par 'grub pa ma lus pa la so sor rtog
58b3(mdo sde): pas shin tu rnam par phye ba'i rnam pa yin no//shin tu 'dus 'di lta ste dper na/'jig rten gyi khams ni sems can rnams kyi longs spyod chen por 'gyur ro//de bzhin du de bzhin
58b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa rnams kyi so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam pa thams cad phun sum tshogs pa kun tu ston pas chos kyi longs spyod chen
58b5(mdo sde): bor 'gyur ba'o//shin tu 'dus 'di lta ste dper na/'jig rten gyi khams na 'gro ba lnga po sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro dang /yi dgas dang /lha dang mi'i 'gro ba dag
58b6(mdo sde): snang ngo //de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi so sor rtog pa'i ye shes la 'ang rgyu dang 'bras bur bcas pa'i rnam pa rab tu dbye ba mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa'i 'gro
58b7(mdo sde): bi lnga dag snang ngo //shin tu 'dus 'di lta ste dper na/'jig rten gyi khams na 'dod pa dang /gzugs dang /gzugs med pa'i khamaso dag snang ngo //de bzhin du de bzhin
59a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa rnams kyi so sor rtog pa'i ye shes la'ang rgyu dang 'bras bur bcas pa'i rnam pa rab tu dbye ba mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa'i khams gsum
59a2(mdo sde): po dag snang ngo //shin tu 'dus 'di lta ste dper na/'jig rten gyi khams na ri rab la sogs pa rin po che'i ri bo chen po dag snang ngo //de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
59a3(mdo sde): kyi so srir rtog pa'i ye shes la'ang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang ldan pa'i chos rgya chen po ston pa dag snang ngo //shin tu 'dus 'di lta ste dper na/
59a4(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams na rgya mtsho chen po zab pa mi 'khrugs bdag snang ngo //de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi so sor rtog pa'i ye shes la 'ang chos kyi dbyings
59a5(mdo sde): zab mo mu stegs can dang /phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi 'khrugs pa'i chos bstan pa dag snang ngo //shin tu 'dus 'di lta ste dper na/'jig rten gyi khams nor
59a6(mdo sde): khor yug dang khor yug chen po rnams kyis kun nas bskor to//de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyang chos thams cad kyi rang gi mtshan
59a7(mdo sde): nyid dang spyi'i mtshan nyid kyi rnam pa thams cad la kun tu rmongs pa med pas yongasu bskor to//shin tu 'dus bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes ni 'di lta ste dper na/sems can
59b1(mdo sde): rnams kyi lus kyi las rtsol ba las byung ba des sems can rnams zhing las dang /tshod byed pa dang /rgyal po'i zhabs 'bring byed pa la sogs pas yongasu tshol bar byed do//de bzhin du
59b2(mdo sde): dri bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes rtsol ba las byung ba lus sprul pa'i las ngos de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sems can las dang bzo'i gonas thams cad
59b3(mdo sde): kyis rgyags dregs pa rnams lo las drang bzo'i gnas thams cad nye bar bstan te/zil gyis mnan nas thabs la mkhas pa des kyang sems can rnams bstan pa la 'dun par
59b4(mdo sde): byed/yongasasu smin par byed/rnam par grol bar byed do//shin tu 'dus 'di lta ste dper na/sems can rnams kyi lus kyi las yongasu spyod par byed pa des sems can rnams gzugs
59b5(mdo sde): la sogs pa yul rnams la yongasu spyod do//de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes yongasu spyod par byed pa lus sbrul pI wa des de bzhin gshegs pa
59b6(mdo sde): rnams skye ba'i gnas so sor skyes par gyur pa'i sems can rnams la skye ba mtshungs pa nyid du nye bar stan te/ris mthun pa mtshungs pa nyid du bstan pos kyang dbang byas nas thabs la
59b7(mdo sde): mkhas pa des kyang sems can rnams bstan pa la 'dzud par byed/yongasu smin par byed/rnam par grol bar byed do//shin tu 'dus 'di lta ste dper na/sems can rnams kyi lus kyi las
60a1(mdo sde): nyams myong ba spyod ba sems can rnams logs par byas pa dang /nyes par byas pa'i las rnams kyi 'bras bus las myong ba byed do//de bzhin du nga/
60a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa rnams kyi bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes nyamasu myong bar byed po lus sprul pa'i las des de bzhin gshegs pa rnams de lta bu byung po'i sde dang /skyes pa rabs kyi
60a3(mdo sde): sde dang /dka' ba spyang ba thams cad nyams su myong ba yang dag par bstan te/sems can rnams 'dun par byas nas thabs la mkhas pa des kyang sems can rnams bstan
60a4(mdo sde): pa la 'dzud par byed/yo su sbyin pa byed/rnam bya grol babyed/shin tu 'dus 'di lta ste dper na/sems can rnams kyi dgo gi lus yang dag par dga' bar byed pa des sems can rnams
60a5(mdo sde): phan tshun smra la/kun tu smra zhing rab tu dga' bar byed de//de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes yang dag par dgo' bar byed pa dag sprul pa'i
60a6(mdo sde): las des de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi don bzang po tshig 'bru bzang po thos pa tsam kho nas kyang sems can byis pa'i shes rab can dad par byed po'i chos ston par
60a7(mdo sde): rab tu 'jug cing thabs la mkhas pa des kyang sems can rnams bstan pa la 'jud par byed/yongasu smin par byed/rnam par grol bar byed do//shin tu 'dus 'di lta
60b1(mdo sde): sna dper na/sems can rnams kyi drug gi las sbyor bar byed pa des sems can rnams phan tshun du bya ba dag la rnam par sbyor bar byed de/'khrul pa la smod/ma 'khrul ba la
60b2(mdo sde): bstod cing 'bod do//de bzhin du de bzhin gshogs po rnams kyi bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes sbyor bar byed pa dag sprul pa'i las dengos de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yang dag par
60b3(mdo sde): bslab pa'i gnas 'cha' sdipag yid be la ni steng cing dad pas rjes 'brang ba dang /chos kyi rjesu 'byung ba la sogs pA'i gang zag rnams kyang rnam pa bzhog par byed la thabastsa la mkhas
60b4(mdo sde): pa des kyang sems can rnams bstan pa la 'dzud par byed/yong su smin par byed/rnam par grol bar byed do//shin tu 'dus 'di lta ste dper na/sems can rnams dag gi las yang
60b5(mdo sde): dag par glo bar byed pa des sems can rnams phan tshun du don mi shes pa rnams shes par byed de/skyon dngags dang bstan bcos rnams kyang rjod do//de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs
60b6(mdo sde): pa rnams kyi bya bo bsgrub pa'i ye shes yang dag par go bir byed pa dag sgrub pa'i las des de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi the tshom gyil
60b7(mdo sde): rnam pa dpago tu med pa dag zlog cing thabs la mkhas po des kyang sems can rnams bstan pa la 'dzud par byed/yongasu smin par byed/rnam par grol bar byed do//shin tu
61a1(mdo sde): 'dus 'di lta ste dper na/sems can rnams kyi yid ky-i las rnam par nges par byed pa des sems can rnams bya ba dang mi bya dag rnam par sems so//de bzhin/
61a2(mdo sde): du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bya ba bsgrub pa'i ye shes rnam par nges par byed pa yid sprul pa'i las des de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sems can rnams kyi sems
61a3(mdo sde): kyi spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi stong dag rnam par sems shing thabs la mkhas pa des kyang sems can rnams bstan pa la 'dzud par byed/yongasu smin par byed/rnam par grol
61a4(mdo sde): bar byed do//shin tu 'dus 'di lta ste dper na/sems can rnams kyi yid kyi las mngon par 'du byed pa byed pa des sems can dag rnam par bsam nas las kun tu
61a5(mdo sde): 'byung bar mngon par 'du byed do//de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes mngon par 'du byed par byed pa yid sprul ba'i las des de bzhin
61a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa rnams sems can gyi spyod pa de dag gi kun tu skyed pa dang /kun tu mi spyod pa yon tan dang nyes pa dag kyang dpyad nas/de dor ba dang bskyed pa'i phyir gnyen po
61a7(mdo sde): rnams mngon par 'du byed cing thabaso la mkhas pa des kyang sems can rnams bstan pa la 'dzud par byed/yongasu smin par byed/rnam par grol bar byed do//shin tu
61b1(mdo sde): 'dus 'di lta ste dper na/sems can rnams kyi yid kyi lus kun tu 'byung bar byed pa des sems can rnams lu kun nas slong bar byed do//de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
61b2(mdo sde): kyi bya ba bsgrub pa'i ye shes kun tu 'byung bar byed pa yid sprul pa'i las des de bzhin gshegs pa rnams de'i gnyen po'i chos bstan pa'i phyir ming gi tshogs dang tshig gi/
61b3(mdo sde): tshogs dang /yi ge'i tshogs rnams brjod cing thabs la mkhas pa des kyang sems can rnams bstan pa la 'dzud par byed/yongasu smin par byed/rnam par grol bar byed do///
61b4(mdo sde): shin tu 'dus 'di lta ste dper na/sems can rnams kyi yid kyi las nyamasu myong bar byed pa des sems can rnams bo ba dang sdug bsngal so sor myong bar byed do//de bzhin
61b5(mdo sde): du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes nyam su myong bar byed pa yi da sprul ba'i las des de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mgo gcig dang /rnam par dbye ba
61b6(mdo sde): dang /dri ba dang gzhag pa 'dri ba la lom go dab pa dag la ci rigs par lan god ba par bya ba'i phyir byung ba dang /'byung ba dang /da ltar gyi don rnams rab tu myong bar byed do//de nas
61b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' shin tu 'dus kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag na ye shes kyi rdzogs par longs
62a1(mdo sde): spyad pa/dgos pa/ro gcig pa/'dres pa/nyes par 'dres pa/ci de bzhin gshegs pa rnams nyid kyi lags sam/'on te byang chub sems dpa' rnams
62a2(mdo sde): kyi 'ang legs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shin tu 'dus ye shes kyi rdzogs par longs spyad pa/dgos pa/ro gcig pa/'dres pa/nye bar 'dres pa ni byang
62a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yin par yang blta'o//gsol pa/ye shes kyi rdzogs par longs spyad pa/dgos pa/ro gcig pa/'dres pa/nye bar 'dres pa byang chub sems
62a4(mdo sde): dpa' gang dag gi legs par blta bar bgyi/bka' stsal pa/byang chub sems dpa' mi skye bo'i chos la bzod pa thob pa rnams kyi ste/mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob
62a5(mdo sde): pa de dag ni gnyen 'du shes pa'i gnyen por sems mnyam po nyid thob ste/'di ltar bdag dang gzhan du 'du shes pa'i gnyen po'o//de dag de yan chad bdag dang
62a6(mdo sde): gzhan du 'du shes mi 'byung ste/ye shes kyi rdzogs par longs spyad pa/dgos pa/ro gcig pa/'dres pa/nye bar 'dres par 'gyur ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das
62a7(mdo sde): ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston
62b1(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba'i dpe mdzad du gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shin tu 'dus 'di lta ste dper na/sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha dag ji srid du 'dres pa'i tsha lnga du
62b2(mdo sde): zhugs par ma gyur pa de srid du de dag gi lha'i ljongs spyod rnams dngos po dang /nyam su myong ba dang /nga yid 'dzin pa'i sgo nas 'dres pa/nye bar 'dres par mi gnas kyi/gang
62b3(mdo sde): tshun chad 'dres pa'i tshal du zhugs par gyur pa de'i tshe 'dres pa'i tshal gyi mthu 'di 'dra ste/sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha der zhugs pa rnams kyi lha'i longs spyod rnams dngos po
62b4(mdo sde): dang /nyam su myong ba dang /ngo yir 'dzin pa med par 'dres pa/nye bar 'dres par gnas//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams ji srid du mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob
62b5(mdo sde): bar ma gyur pa dri srid du/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad la med pa/sems mnyam pa dri thob na sa btang snyoms pa de thob par mi 'gyur te/gnyisu 'du shes pa de
62b6(mdo sde): ngag ye shes kyi rdzogs par longs spyod ba dgos po/ro gcig pa/'dres pa/nye bar 'dres par mi gnas kyi gang tshun chad mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur pa de phan
62b7(mdo sde): chad gnyisu 'du shes pa'i gnyen pos sems mnyam pa thob nas/de'i 'og tu nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i btang snyoms thob ste/
63a1(mdo sde): de phan chad de dag gi ye shes kyi rdzogs par longs spyad pa/dgos pa/ro gcig pa/'dres pa/nye bar 'dres par gnaso//shin tu 'dus 'di lta ste dper na//
63a2(mdo sde): chu bo dang /chu bran rnam pa mang po dag ji srid du rgya mtsho chen por zhugs por ma gyur pa de srid du gnas tha dad pa dang /chu tha dad pa dang /chu chud pa dang /chu skye 'gro ba yod pa
63a3(mdo sde): dang /so so rang gi bya ba sgrub pa'i las can gyi chu dang /srog chags chu nas skyes pa byul bu dag gi 'chi ba nye bar ston pa'i gnas yino//gang tshun chad rgya mtsho chen por zhugs
63a4(mdo sde): byar gyur pa de'i tshe gnas tha dad pa mu yin pa dang /chu tha dad pa ma yin pa dang /chu tshod med pa dang /skye 'grib med pa'i chu dang /bya ba sgrub pa gcig pa'i lngas can gyi chu dang /
63a5(mdo sde): srog chags chu nas skyes pa phal po che chen po rnams kyi 'tsho ba nye bar ston pa'i gnas yi no//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpo'i rnams ji srid du de bzhin gshegs pa
63a6(mdo sde): rnams kyi chos kyi dribyings rnam par dag pa'i rgya mtsho chen por zhugs par ma gyur pa de srid du gnas thu dad pa dang /ye shes tha dad pa dang /yi shes chung ba dang /ye shes
63a7(mdo sde): skye 'grib yod pa dang so so rang gi bya ba sgrub pa'i las can gyi ye shes dang /sems can nyung ngu dag yongasu smin par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i gnas yino//gang tshun
63b1(mdo sde): chad de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i rgya mtsho chen por zhugs par gyur pa de'i tshe gnas tha dad pa ma yin pa dang /ye shes tha dad pa ma yin pa dang /ye shes
63b2(mdo sde): tshad med pa dang /ye shes skye 'grib med pa dang /ye shes kyi rdzogs par longs spyad pa/dgos pa/ro gcig pa/'dres pa/nye bar 'dres par 'gyur te/sems can tshad med pa dang /yongasu
63b3(mdo sde): smin par byed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i gnasu 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dri'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to//chos rnams kun gyi de bzhin nyid/sgru gnyis ldan
63b4(mdo sde): dag mtshon nyid can/dngos po shes pa de dmigs pa/dbang tshad mi shes mtshan nyid can/de bzhin nyid shes thams cad nas/bsgoms las yang dag 'grub pa can/sems can kun
