63b5(mdo sde): la gnyis skyed pa//rnam kun mi zad 'bras bu can//lus dang ngag dang sems sprul pa'i//sbyor ba'i thabs kyi las can yin//ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs sgo dang //dpag tu med pa gnyis
63b6(mdo sde): dang ldan//rang bzhin chos rdzogs longs spyod dang //sprul pas tha dad 'jug pa can//sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings//rnam dag 'di ni yang dag brjod//bcom ldan 'das kyis
63b7(mdo sde): de skad ces bka' stsal nas byang chub sems dpa' shin tu 'dus dang /byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /nyan thos chen po de dag dang /thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /lha
64a1(mdo sde): dang /mi dad /lha ma yin dang /dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//'phags pa sangs
64a2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi sra zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/rdzogs so///rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /shrI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang /pradz+nyA barma dang/zhus chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba
64a3(mdo sde): bin+da yau shes sngos nI ka dang sbyar te gsar du bsgyur cing zhus te gtanA la phab mo///rgyu gar skad du/Ar+ya bud d+hikle ban+d+ha ma myA hA s+thA na sU tra/bong+ga skad
64a4(mdo sde): du/'phags pa sangs rgyas mo spang ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gis
64a5(mdo sde): thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ro la dge slong stod nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang byang chub sems dpa'
64a6(mdo sde): brgyad khri dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med kyis byin pa 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur to 'dug go//byang chub
64a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan gyi mun pa thams cad nges par 'joms pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes kyi 'od dang /byang chub
64b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshangs pa las byung ba 'brug dbyangs sprin gyi nga ro dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin po che'i me tog kun tu rgyas
64b2(mdo sde): pa'i gzi brjid lta bu dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon po seng ge'i yon tan las byung ba 'brug gi nga ros 'gro ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po
64b3(mdo sde): 'od kyi gzi brjid rnam par bsdogs pa grags pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes kyi bkod pa mtha' yas po bsgrub pa la sems pa dang /byang chub sem
64b4(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin po che mtha' yos pa'i me tog kun tu rgyas pa'i rnam par bsgrags pa grags pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon po shes
64b5(mdo sde): rab kyi snang bas spobs pa bstan pa'i blo gros dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bcu po de dag 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'khod do//de dag ni gzungs thob
64b6(mdo sde): bar bya ba'i phyir lo bdun du brtson par gyur pa dag go/de dag ni lo bdun 'das nas sems mnyam par bzhag pa'ang ma thob na gang gzungs thob par 'gyur ba lta ci smos/de dag
64b7(mdo sde): ni lo bdun du rmugs pa dang gnyid yongasu spangs shing 'dug pa dang /'chag pa la brtson par byas/'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa yongasu sbyang ba la brtson par byas kyang bsam
65a1(mdo sde): bzhin ma thob cing gzu sa ma thob nus yongs spyodade'i yid kyis bsgrub pa phul nas nyams par gyur la/thams cad kyang khyim nA gnas pa'i skyon khas blangs
65a2(mdo sde): shing bstan pa 'di las phyir dong ba sha stag go//yang de'i tshe rgyal po mo skyes sgra 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go//de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po mo skyes dgra'i
65a3(mdo sde): 'gyod pa bsal to//'gyod pa bsal ba des kyang zhag bdun du sbyin po byin zhing bcings pa thams cad kyang rab tu thar bar byas so//de sbyin pa byin te zhag bdun po de dag 'das
65a4(mdo sde): nas srog chags bye ba phyag bdun dang lhan cig tu chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du lhags so//rigs kyi bu bcu po khyim na gnas pa'i skyon khas blangs pa
65a5(mdo sde): bstan pa 'di las phyir dong ba de dag kyang 'khor de nyid du lhag so//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag tsha ba med par gnas pa zhes bya gzungs thob pa
65a6(mdo sde): bskal pa grangs med par rje su mthun pa'i chos kyi bzod pa dang ldan pa mi skye bo'i chos la bzod pa thob pa/spobs pa sna tshogs pa/ye shes kyi sgo dang chos kyi sgo thams cad
65a7(mdo sde): sgrub pa la mkhas pa/chos bshad pa'i phyir sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang /lhag pa'i bsam pa dang /mos pa la mkhas pa zhig kyang 'khor de nyid du 'ongs so//de
65b1(mdo sde): nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bag tsha ba med par gnas pa stan las langs te/chosnga gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sA la
65b2(mdo sde): btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logasu thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu bcu po 'di dag ni
65b3(mdo sde): dgung lo bdun du gzungs kyi dron la brtson par gyur na de dag bsam pa ma grub cing bstan pa 'di las slar mchis pa khyim na gnas par ga yar gyis blangs pa lags na/de'i
65b4(mdo sde): slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu de dag la ci nas myur ba kho nar ye shes thob par 'gyur ba de ltar legs par lung dbog par mdzad du gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das
65b5(mdo sde): kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bag tsha ba med par gnas pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu 'di ltar de dag gis sangs rgyas mi spang ba zhes bya ba'i
65b6(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma thos la/sangs rgyas spong ba ni rje su thob ste/des na rigs kyi bu de dag myur du shes pa 'di la ma skyes so//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems/
65b7(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bag tsha ba med par gnas pas tshog su bcad pa 'di dag gis zhus so//chos kyi rgyal po 'od mdzad pa/mi yi nyi ma khyod la zhu//byang chub sems
66a1(mdo sde): /dpa' las spyod pa//spyod pa gang lags de bstan gsol//dpag med khyad par 'phags pa'i blo grags pa//sangs rgyas thogs med stobs bcu mtshungs ma
66a2(mdo sde): mchis//srid gsum 'byung ba rnam grol spros mi mda'//sangs rgyas byang chub spyod pa dri med gsungs//dpag med ye shes mnga' ba khyod la zhu/yid gnyis gcod par mdzad pa
66a3(mdo sde): khyod la zhu//bcom ldan mtshungs pa mi mnga' khyod la zhu//byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i tshul gang lags//rgyal ba bdud thul bad gshegs gang gis na/nyon mongs kun
66a4(mdo sde): los rnam par grol bar 'gyur//thugs rjes nyon mongs thul la byang chub lam//'phags pa de ni rab tu bshad du gsol//legs gsal legs byung legs 'bral gsung
66a5(mdo sde): ba po//srid sel srid 'gro rnam 'jim lhur mdzad pa//dge sbyong bzod pa sku mchog yid gnyis sel//rgyal ba bde gshegs dri med spyod kun gsungs//sngon gyi srid brgyad
66a6(mdo sde): legs spyad yon tan dge/'gro ba phan bden bsngo la brtson pa 'o//rin chen glang po rta spangs yun kyang ring //bud myed tshogs dang bro yang spangs mdzad pa//bzod dang dul
66a7(mdo sde): dgyes tshul khrims yon tan gzhol//blo gros dgyes gzhom brtul zhugs dka' thub brtsams//yon tan tshol bas sdug bsngal brgya bzod pa//rgyal ba khyod
66b1(mdo sde): kyis de brnyes yid gnyis bral//spyod la mkhas pa yid gnyis rnam spangs pa//skyon tshogs dri ma gsum gyi thab bral//'gro ba thams cad du yang rab ga shegs pa//mgon po byang
66b2(mdo sde): chub mchog gi tshul bshad gsol//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bag che ba med par gnas pa lnga 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
66b3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' bcu po 'di dag thams cad kyis ni sangs rgyas mi spang ba byas so//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas mi spang ba zhes bgyi ba de gang logs//
66b4(mdo sde): bka' stsal po/rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa sum cu 'das pa de'i tshe de'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams smig rgyu can du de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs
66b5(mdo sde): pa'i da ro zhes bya ba byung bar gyur pa de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na rigs kyi bu bcu po 'di dag khyim bdag shing sA la chen
66b6(mdo sde): po lta bu'i gzhon nur gyur to//de'i tshe rigs kyi bu bcu po de dag thams cad kyis gtsug lag khang lnga brgya byed du bcug go//gtsug lag khang re rer yang dge slong stong stong gnas par
66b7(mdo sde): gyur to//rigs kyi bu de'i tshe chos smra ba spobs pa brtsegs pa zhes bya ba bzungs thob pa zhig chos ston to//rigs kyi bu chos smra ba spobs pa brtsegs pa de chos kyi stan la 'dug pa
67a1(mdo sde): la sangs rgyas lnga stong spobs pa sgrub par mdzad de/lha dung phyur phrag brgyad kyang lus yongasu spyad pa'i phyir brtson par gyur to//de'i chos bshad pa
67a2(mdo sde): gcig gis srog chags bdun khri bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mo ldog par 'gyur to//srog chags khri ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo///
67a3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de'i tshe rgyal po zla bas byin pa zhes bya ba zhig byung ngo //des chos la gus pas chos smra ba de la mchod pa'i phyir bud med lnga brgya dang glu dbyangs dang rol mo byaso//
67a4(mdo sde): dge slong de la rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs kyis kyang mngon par gtor te/tsan+dan gyi byug pas kyang byugasaso//ras bcos bu lnga brgyas kyang bkab bau//bde ba'i rim gro thams
67a5(mdo sde): cad kyis mchod pa 'di lta ste//chos smra ba la mchod pa'i mchod pa mchog gis zhag bdun du rim gro byas so//de nas dge slong de la khyim bdag gi bu de drag gis 'chal
67a6(mdo sde): ba'i tshul khrims kyis glengs so//las de'i rnam par smin pas de dag lo dgu khrir sems can dmyal ba rnams su skyes so//tshe rabs lnga brgyar ni mi rnams kyi nang
67a7(mdo sde): du za ma dang /kla klo dang /log par lta ba'i khyim rnams su skyes so//tshe rabs drug brgyar ni dmus long dang lce med por gyur to//tshe rabs bdun brgyar ni rab tu byung
67b1(mdo sde): nas ji srid 'tsho'i mthar thug go bar du gzungs ma thob par 'chi ba'i dus byas te/las kyi sgrib pa de nyid kyis rigs kyi bu de dag bsgribs so//rigs kyi bu de lta bas na khyod mos par bya'o///
67b2(mdo sde): khyod kyi khong du chud par bya'o//chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas chos smra bo la mngon sum du mthong yang 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyis brjod par mi bya na thos pa lta ci smos/rigs kyi
67b3(mdo sde): grong zhig sems can thams cad kyi mig 'byin par byed pa bas ni gang zhig chos smrab la gshe ba'i bsam pas lta bar byed na/de ni de bas ches kha na mau tho ba'i las che ba yin no//gang zhig
67b4(mdo sde): sems can thams cad 'ching bar byed la/gang zhig chos smra ba mthong na rgyab kyis phyogs te 'dug par byed na/bsod nams ma yin pa 'dri la bsod nams ma yin pa lnga ma des brgya'i
67b5(mdo sde): char yang nye bar mi 'gro/stong gi cha dang /'bum gyi cha dang /grangs dang /cha dang /bgrong ba dang /dpe dang /rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gang chos smra ba la sgyur ba 'debs pa
67b6(mdo sde): de'u ni sangs rgyas la skur pa btab par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur bya bar 'dod pas chos smra ba la bsnyen bkur bya'o//sangs rgyas la mchog 'dod po chos smra ba la
67b7(mdo sde): mchod par bya'o//sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal bar 'dod pas chos smra ba la phyag bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba'i phyir dang /
68a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba'i phyir ro//gang las brten te byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub sems skyes pa de las/
68a2(mdo sde): brten nas de ni nyon mongs pa rnams kyi 'dod pa'i longs spyod la granas par brjod par mi bya/de ni nom du 'dra tshangs par spyod po la mi gnas par brjod par mi bya/de ni gozugs med
68a3(mdo sde): pi'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs kyang gzugs med par nye bar 'gro bar brjod par mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' de ni nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis mi
68a4(mdo sde): skye ste/byang chub sems dpa' ni smon lam gyi dbang gis skye ba'i phyir ro//de ni byis pa'i spyod pa thams cad las grol ba'o//gang byang chub sems dpa'i nyon mongs pa rnams ston par
68a5(mdo sde): 'dod pa des ni na mkha'i khams kyi gzugs bstan par 'dod du zad do//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/klu thams cad klu nyid du sbyar song ba yin pas klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa
68a6(mdo sde): niklu'i bgrang bar yang 'gro la klu'i nyes pa gsum gyis kyang gos par mi 'gyuraro//gsum gang zhe na/mag yo bye tshan mi 'bab pa dang /skyo ba po'i lus dang lhan cig tu kun tu
68a7(mdo sde): mi gnas pa dang /de la na mkha' lding gi 'jigs pa mi 'byung ba ste/rigs kyi bu klu'i skyon gsum po de dag gis gos par mi 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub
68b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ched mo dang /dga' ba thams cad nyams su myong bar byed kyang srid pa gsum du 'dod pa dang /nyon mongs pa dang /sdug bsngal rnams kyis zil gyis
68b2(mdo sde): mi non par brjod par bya'o//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/sems can gyi rosau nya pa zhes bya ba yod do//de ni chu la spyod chu lwa palta'ang der 'chi bAr dus byed par mi 'gyur ro//rigs kyi
68b3(mdo sde): bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor ba na spyod kyang de nyid du byos pa'i spyod pa la gnaso nas ye shos kyi spyod pa tshal lo//chos yang dag par blangs
68b4(mdo sde): pas kyang rmongs par mi 'gyur ro//byis pa dang lhan cig tu gnas pas srid pa gsum gyi sdug bsngal nyam su myong bar yang mi 'gyur ro//de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems
68b5(mdo sde): dpa' chen pos bdag bsrung bar bya'o//de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to//bde bar gshegs pa la gang zhig mchod bya dang //de la
68b6(mdo sde): gang zhig phyag kyang 'tshal 'dod po//des 'dir bde gshegs sras rnams mchod par bya//'di ni rgyal ba rnams la mchod pa mchog/nga yi gos dang lhung gzeng gding ba dang //
68b7(mdo sde): mal cha dang ni 'chag las gang yin pa//gang dag byang chub don du brtson byed pa//de dog la ni nga yis gnang ba yin//'di ltar mi mchog sangs rgyas thams cad kyang //
69a1(mdo sde): de las ngas pUr shin tu byung ba'i phyir//sangs rgyas rnams la d+hI ltar mchod bya glu/de bzhin de dag la yang mchod pa bya//de dang do dag mgond
69a2(mdo sde): mkhas pa ste//long ba rnams la mig kyang sbyin par byed//lam la rmongs pa rnams kyi ston pa ste//'chi ba med pa'i phyogasu 'dren pa yin//gal te sems can rnams
69a3(mdo sde): kyis de dag la//rtag tu dga' bas longs spyod kun byin yang //de dag rnams kyi dang po'i sems brtan pa//de la'ang lon glan byas par mi 'gyuraro//de nas bcom ldan 'das
69a4(mdo sde): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgo tsha ba med par gnas pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' de dag gri las kyi
69a5(mdo sde): sgrib pa de gang gis rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs 'ga' zhig mchis lags sam/bka' stsal pa/yod de dag tsha ba med par gnas pa/gal te rigs kyi bu
69a6(mdo sde): de dag rab tu byung nas gzungs sngags kyi gzhi dge zlos par byed na'o//s+yAd ya the dan/adun+te/ad ts+tsha ba~M ti/a nu bi le/a shaiShe/a kri twe/a nA yA he/a hrI/
69a7(mdo sde): a bi dza ri ti/b+ha ba tu/bog ma/yu ta nya ba/pra ba/ni gaTo/u gra hi/hu tu me/tsa ba lo/sa de/sau ma/sa ma daM/yo te/na mo/ba re sho d+hI/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
69b1(mdo sde): kyi bu mod de dag gis gzungs sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bzlas la/zhag bdun du 'dzin pa med pa dang /'jog pa med pa dang /gzugs med pa dang /rnam par rtog pa med pa dang /rlung tu
69b2(mdo sde): dang ba med pa dang /yun ring po 'gro ba med pa dang /byed pa med pa dang /gos pa med pa dang /mnyam pa'i sems dang bral ba dang /phung po lnga dang bral ba dang /mi bzod pa med pa'i tshul
69b3(mdo sde): gyis sangs rgyas rje sa dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin pasgom par bya dgos te/da ni de dag phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas stong gi zhal mthong bar byed pa dang /nyes pa 'chags 'jug pa
69b4(mdo sde): byed pa'o//de nas rigs kyi bu de dag gis rab tu byung ste/gsang sngags kyi gzho 'di dag bzlas nas dun du brtson par 'dzin pa med pa la sogs pas sangs rgyasarje su dran
69b5(mdo sde): pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgoms te/sangs rgyas stong yang mthong ngo //las kyi sgrib pa de'ang bshags so//de nyid kyi tshe thams cad sgrub pa'i ye shes kyi sgo zhes bya ba'i gzungs
69b6(mdo sde): kyang thob bo//'khor ba las bskal pa sum cu'ang phyir bsnyil lo//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las kyang phyir mi ldog par gyur to//bag tsha ba med pa
69b7(mdo sde): gnas pa de la gang rgyal po zla bas byin zhes bya ba gong gis chos smra ba de la mchod pa byas par gyur pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
70a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas tshe dpag tu med pa yin te/de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po zla ba sa byin par gyur to//gang spobs pa brtsegs pa zhes bya ba chos smra ba byung ba de ni de
70a2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa yin te/de'i tshe de'i dus na chos smra ba spobs pa brtsegs pa zhes bya bar gyur to//gang
70a3(mdo sde): dag khyim pa shing sA la chen po lta bu'i gzhon nur gyur pa bcu po de dag ni rigs kyi bu 'di dag yin te/de'i tshe de'i dus na gang dag gis chos smra ba spobs pa brtsegs pa de la
70a4(mdo sde): 'tshal pa'i tshul khrims kyis glengs pa ste/khyim bdag shring sA la chen po lta bu'i gzhon nu bcu por gyur to//rigs kyi bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar
70a5(mdo sde): gnas pas gnas kyang rung ste/byang chub sems dpas srog gi phyir yang 'khrul pa la lta bar mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rigs kyi bu chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems
70a6(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi byang chub yong su spyod par byed pa'i phyir ro//bzhi gang zhe na/stong pa nyid sgom dang /sems can thams cad la zhe 'dras pa med pa'i sems dang /byang chub
70a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams pa rtag tu phan pa nye bor sgrub po dang /zang zing med pa'i sems kyis chos sbyin pa yang dag par bstan pa ste/rigs kyi bu chos bzhi po de dag ni byang chub
70b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis byang chub yongasu sbyong bar byed pa'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gis bka' stsal to//rgyal
70b2(mdo sde): bas gang gis de dag rnam dag pa//stong la mos po lam gyi dang por gsungs//de la rtag tu bag yod gang gnas pa//de ni sangs rgyas thob nas 'jig rten snang //sems can kun
70b3(mdo sde): la rtag tu dang ba dang //gang la 'ang kA zhes brjod par mi 'dod cing //nga rgyal spangs nas skye bo rnams la bzod//'di ni sbyong bar byed po'i lam gnyis pa'o//sdig pa'i dngos po dri
70b4(mdo sde): med gang ci'ang rung //byang chub mchog brtson rnams la de sbyin zhing //de dag las ni lon 'dod mi bya ste//byang chub rob mchog gi ni lam gsum pa'o//snying rje can gyis nges
70b5(mdo sde): par skye bo la//zang zeng med par rtag tu chos sbyin zhing //lhag pa'i bsam pa yis ni snying brje ba//de bzhin mkhas pas sbyong ba'i lam bzhi pa'o//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang
70b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs la sbyor bar byas pas ni dgon pa la bsten par bya/chos nyan du 'gro bar bya//gos gtsang ma dag bcang bar bya//gcig pu
70b7(mdo sde): gnas par bya//spyod lam bzhis gnas par bya/chos spro ba rnams la sna tshogs sbyin pa bsgrub pa'i bsam pa la sbyar ba dad mos par bya/dkon mchog gsum la gus pa
71a1(mdo sde): dang bcas par bya//gzhan gyi dbang du mi 'gyur bar bya/yongasu mi skye ba dang /rtag tu brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang /g.yo med pa dang /sangs rgyas rjes
71a2(mdo sde): dran pa dang ma bral ba dang /mi dmigs pa dang /mtshan ma med pa legs par bsgom pa dang /ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed par bya/sangs rgyas la gsol ba gdab par
71a3(mdo sde): mos par bya/nyes pa bshags pa dang /rje su yi rang ba dang /yongasu bsngo ba la mkhas par bya/ma brtags pa'i spyod lom du mi bya/mi skrag pa dang /ston pa dang /bla ma
71a4(mdo sde): la gnas bca' byas gnas par bya'o//mthun par 'dzin par bya'o//chos de dag la yongasu mi skyo bas bsten par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs
71a5(mdo sde): 'di bshad pa na srog chags sum khri na sngon sngamA ma bskyed pa los byang chub tu sems skyes so//srog chags lnga stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing
71a6(mdo sde): dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go//byang chub sems dpa' sum khri na mi skye ba'i chos lo bzod pa skyes so//chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa ni byang chub sems dpa'
71a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po gces spras byed pa'o//gang gis bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che su bdag
71b1(mdo sde): gyis bkang nas dkon mchog gsum la sbyin pa byin par byed la gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan par byed na/de ni de dag las mchog tu bkrabs pa'o//gang zhig bskal pa stong du shes
71b2(mdo sde): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma gtogs par pha rol tu phyin po lnga la spyod par byed la/gang zhig chos kyi rnam grongs 'di nyan par byed na 'di ni de dag las mchog tu bkrabs pa'o//gang zhig sangs
71b3(mdo sde): rgyas stong la sngo dro dang /nyin byed phye ma red kyi dus su bsnyen bkur byed/gus por byed/brjed par byed/mchod par byed la/gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangasA 'di nyan par byed na/'di ni de dag las
71b4(mdo sde): mchog tu bkrab pa'o//rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsrung ba dang /bcang ba dang /bklog pa dang /bstan pa dang /yi ger bri bar bya ba'i phyir khyed cag la gtad
71b5(mdo sde): kyis/nga'i bstan pa 'di lus dang srog yongasu gtad pa dang yang bsngo zhing yongasu bsrung bar bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/byang chub sems dpa' bag
71b6(mdo sde): tsha ba med par gnas pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /dge slong de dag dang /thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin dang /dri zar bcas pa'i
71b7(mdo sde): 'jig rten yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//'phags pa sangs rgyas mi spang ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so///
72a1(mdo sde): rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mai tra dang /pradz+nyA barma dang /zhus chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
72a2(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/Ar+ya aSh+Ta maN+Da la ka nA ma ma hA yA ne sU tra/bod skad du/'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad pe zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/sangs rgyas dang byang chub
72a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi
72a4(mdo sde): kun dga' ra ba na/dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhug so//byang chub sems dpa' rab tu mang po 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa'
72a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sgra dbyangs dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi pham pa dang /ngag mchog dang /blo gros mtha' yas dang /dri med snying po dang /ye shes
72a6(mdo sde): rgyal po dang /mtha' yas sde dang /ye shes snang ba dang /ye shes sgron ma dang /shes rab snang ba dang /tshangs pas byin dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i
72a7(mdo sde): cod pan dang /de dag dang gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang tshi ba dbang che bar grags pa sha stag dang yang thabs cig go//de nas bcom ldan 'dra
72b1(mdo sde): kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA rI'i bu la bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dri nas shar phyogs logasu 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig
72b2(mdo sde): rten gyi khams gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan shin tu yongs
72b3(mdo sde): bsgrags dpal zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to//shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logasu 'jig rten gyi
72b4(mdo sde): khams gang+gA'i klung ginyis kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mthong dga'o zhes bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
72b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to//shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logasu 'jig rten
72b6(mdo sde): gyi khamosA gang+gA'i klung gsum gyi bye ma rnyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba med pa zhes bya ba yod/da na de bzhin gshegs po dgra bcom pa yang drag par
72b7(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba'i dpal zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la ches kyang ston to//shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di
73a1(mdo sde): nas shar phyogs log su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed 'dus pa na 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu rnam par dag pa'i tshogs zhes bya ba
73a2(mdo sde): yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po'i tog gi rgyal mtshon gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing
73a3(mdo sde): gzhes la chos kyang ston to//shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logasu 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung lnga'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rdul bral
73a4(mdo sde): tshogs zhes bya ba yod do//de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yos pa snang ba'i dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba de
73a5(mdo sde): ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to//shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logasu 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung drug gi bye mo snyed 'das
73a6(mdo sde): phrin 'jig rten gyi khams slu ba med pa zhes bya ba yod do//de na de bzhin gshog slu ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thogs pa med par ston pa'i dpal
73a7(mdo sde): zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to//shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs log su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung bdun
73b1(mdo sde): gyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi tshogs zhes bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i
73b2(mdo sde): pad+ma la rnam par gnon pas bzhud pa zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to//shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logasu 'jig
73b3(mdo sde): rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams skra dbyangs snyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par
73b4(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i pad+ma la rab tu gnas pa'i ri dbang rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to//shA ri'i bu de bzhin
73b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rloT ba'i sad+yas brgyad po de dag gi sang+yas kyi zhi de dag ni yongasu dag pa ste/bud mA med//snyigs ma lnga med do//shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
73b6(mdo sde): kyi bu mo thag pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa gang la la zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas brgyad po de dag gi mtshan
73b7(mdo sde): thos nas len cing 'dzin la klog cing kun chub par byed de/'jug par byed cing gzhan dag la 'ang rgya cher rab tu ston na/shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo de
74a1(mdo sde): sems can dmyal bar 'gro 'am/dud 'gro'i sgro gnas sam/yi dwags kyi yul lam/lha ma s+t+rai kyi yu byin du gro bar 'gyur ba de'i gnas med de go skabs ma//
74a2(mdo sde): yin no//mi khom pa rnamasu skye bo de'i gnas mad do//shA ri'i bu bud med kyi kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi
74a3(mdo sde): mtshan thos nas/blangs shing bzung la blags shing kun chub par byas te 'jug par byas shing /gzhan dag lI 'ang rgya tshur yang dag par rab tu bshad na/shA ri'i bu de bud med
74a4(mdo sde): kyi dngos po lan gnyis len pa'i gnas de med cing go skabs ma yin te de'i gnas mod do//shA ri'i bu rigs kyi 'amo/rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs
74a5(mdo sde): pa gang la la zhig gis/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi mtshan thos nas blangs shing bzung la klags shing kun chub
74a6(mdo sde): par byas te 'jug par byas shing /gzhan dag la 'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston na/de la lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /srin po dang /mi dang /mi ma yin pa dang /
74a7(mdo sde): rgyal po dang /chom rkun dang /me dang /chu dang /dug dang /mtshon cha las 'jigs pa mi 'byung bar shes par bya'o//shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo theg pa
74b1(mdo sde): chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa gang la la zhig gis de bzhin ga sh+log sdu pa dgra bsgom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas d+mo dag go mtshan brjod do//rngub mo srong la
74b2(mdo sde): na byede byu gi sbyi kyis ldog par 'gyur/de ba sa par 'gyur zhing sdig pa can gyi rmi lam+b+haN+Di mi'i gyur te/dag nyid kyis mig pan 'ang lha rnams bsgreng bar y-id+d+ha mo/
74b3(mdo sde): shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'amya rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la rdza dag par zhugs pa gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
74b4(mdo sde): rgyus de dag gi mtshan brjod nas mtshan mo tho rangs 'jig rten pa'i bya ba rnams rtsol na 'phel ba nyid du 'gyur gyi 'grib par mi 'gyuraro//shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi
74b5(mdo sde): mo thug pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa gang la lce smrig de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi mtshan thos nas len
74b6(mdo sde): tsau 'dzin la myog cing kun chub par byed de/'jug par byed cing gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston no//de 'di nas bzung ste/byang chub kyi bar du nam yang
74b7(mdo sde): mngon par shes padang bral bar mi 'gyur/nam yang gzungs dang bral bar mi 'gyur/nam yang dbang po ma tshang bam m-i 'gyur/nam yang mtshan dang grol bar mi 'gyur/nam yang
75a1(mdo sde): shes rab shin tu rgyas pa dang dran pa/bar mi 'gyur/nam yang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /nyan thos dang bral bar ma
75a2(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//de 'di nas bzung ste/byang chub kyi bar du nam yang shes rab phun sum tshogs pa shin tu rgyas pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'
75a3(mdo sde): stsal te/bde bar/shegs pas de skad gsungs nas/ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//'jig rten mgon po 'di dag gi/mtshan rnams mi gang 'dzin byed
75a4(mdo sde): pa//de ni ngan 'gro kun zlog nas//ring po mi thogs bde 'gror 'gro//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mnyes par byed//de yi sems ni dang bar 'gyur//rtag tu 'jig rten mgon mthong nas//
75a5(mdo sde): mchod pa dam pa byed par 'gyur//mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa//bskal pa bye ba grangs med du//don 'du ba'i sgo rnyed cing //de ni rtag tu bkur bar 'gyur//mtshan rnams 'di
75a6(mdo sde): ngag 'dzin byed pa//bskal pa bye ba grangs med du//lha rnams kyis ni rtag tu mchod//myur du byang chub 'tshang rgyar 'gyur//mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa//de ni shes rab 'tshal
75a7(mdo sde): ba'am//blon pa 'am 'on par yong mi 'gyur//kun tu sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur//sangs rgyas rnams kyi mtshan 'dzin pa//de la lha klu gnod sbyin dang //gsang ba lha dang lha
75b1(mdo sde): min rnams//nyin dang mtshan du srung bar byed//mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa//de ni gzugs mtshan phun sum tshogs//'byor pa'i rigasu skye 'gyur zhing //de ni sbyin pa'i bdag por
75b2(mdo sde): 'gyur//thub pa rnams kyi mtshan 'dzin pas//bskal pa bye ba brgya mang du//da yi kha nas dri 'byung ba//dri gsung zhim po 'byung por 'gyur//thub po rnams kyi mtshan 'dzin pa//rdzu 'phrul
75b3(mdo sde): tshe zhing yid gzhungs la//'dab ma bye ba stong ldan pa'i//rin chen pad+ma skye bar 'gyur//mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa//pha dang ma dang rtsa lag dang //spun rnams kyi ni yid 'ong zhing //
75b4(mdo sde): nam yang phongs pa mthong mi 'gyur//bud med kyis kyang blo ldan pa//de dag rnams kyi mtshan thos na//bud med lus la yid byung nas//mkhas shing skyes par skye bar 'gyur//lus
75b5(mdo sde): can kun la phan pa'i phyir//myur du byang chub 'tshang rgya ste//lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi//rten dang skyabasu 'byung bar 'gyur/de la mtshon gyis mi tshugs te//dug gis mi
75b6(mdo sde): tshugs mes ma yin//g.yon can dag dang chom rkun dang //rgyal po 'ang de la gnod mi 'gyur//thub pa rnams kyi mtshan 'dzin pa//de la sdig dang ldan pa'i bdud//nag po'i rtsa lag
75b7(mdo sde): bzhon bcas pas//glags ni rnyed par yong mi 'gyur//zhing rnams bye ba bsam ya su//de ni mkha' las 'gro 'gyur te//phun sum tshogs pa'i zhing der ni//'jig rten mgon
76a1(mdo sde): po rnams la blta//brtan pa sangs rgyas rnams mthong nas//dad pa brtan po thob par 'gyur//de yi bskyam pa mkhyen nas su//mi mchog rnams ni lung
76a2(mdo sde): ston to//thub pa rnams las mngon sum bdag/byang chub lung bstan thos nas su//rtag tu dga' dang ldan 'gyur zhing //de ni dogs pa med par 'gyur//mkhas pa gang zhig maN+Da
76a3(mdo sde): 'di dag/thos nas rab tu 'dzin byed pa//de ni yon tan 'di dag dang //rgya chen gzhan yang los kyang 'thob//thub pa drang srong che gyur pa//'di dag rnams kyi mtshan thos nas//mi
76a4(mdo sde): gang mtshan rnams 'dzin byed pa//rdzu 'phrul chen mkhas bsod nams 'dod//de lta bas na bdag nyid che//de dag rnams kyi mtshan thos na//skyes bu mkhas pas bzung bya
76a5(mdo sde): zhing /gzhan dag la yang bshad par bya//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /dge slong de dag dang /byang chub sems
76a6(mdo sde): dpa' de dag dang /lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin dang /dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//'phags pa
76a7(mdo sde): dkyil 'khor brgyad pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so///rgya gar skad du/Ar+ya maM ga la aSh+Ta ka nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/bod skad du/
76b1(mdo sde): 'phags pa bkra shis brgyad pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//'dri skad bdag gis zos
76b2(mdo sde): pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das yangs pa na a mra srung ba'i tshal no bzhugs//de nas lid ci ba'i bu rtsal rab bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan
76b3(mdo sde): 'dres kyis zhabs la mgo bres phyug btsal te/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
76b4(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas gang la la sngon gyi smon lam phun sum tshogs pa dag bzhugs pa bcom ldan 'das gang dag thos ni bdag gis spyi bos bkur zhing gang dag bdag gis spyi dos
76b5(mdo sde): bkur bas mi 'am mi ma lags pa las 'jigs pa 'am/gtse ba 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang /bcom ldan 'das bdag rgyal po'i pho brang du mchis te/sgra brjod pa na
76b6(mdo sde): ci nas gang gis kyang smra ba la zlog pa mi bgyid cing zil gyis mi non pa dang /mtshan de dag nyid badrug 'dzin nag nyid kyis log na'ang sdig pa'i rmi lam rmi bar mi 'gyur
76b7(mdo sde): ba dang /'dab mtshon cha gzas pa'i g.yul gyi nang du zhugs na'ang lus la mtshon cha rnams phog par mi 'gyur la/de las bde bar thar par yang 'gyur ba dag bcom
77a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis yongasu bstan du gsol//de skad ces gsol nas/bcom ldan
77a2(mdo sde): 'dus kyis lid tsa bi'i bu rtsal rab la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rtul rab shar phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams grags ldan zhes bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
77a3(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgron ma'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhug so//rtsal rab shar phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams skyo ba med pa zhes bya ba yod de/den
77a4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rtsal brtan don grub dgongs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so//rtsal rob shar phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams
77a5(mdo sde): bde ldan zhes bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun la dgongs pa rgya cher gragaso pa can zhes bya ba bzhug so///
77a6(mdo sde): rtsal rab shar phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams bgegs med pa zhes bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
77a7(mdo sde): byams pa'i rgyan gyi dpal zhes bya ba bzhug so//rtsal rab shar phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams chad pa spangs pa zhes bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs po dgra
77b1(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dge ba grags pa dpal dam pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so//rtsal rab shar phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs ldan
77b2(mdo sde): zhes bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lhun po ltar 'phags pa rtsal rab grags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs
77b3(mdo sde): so//rtsol rab shar phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams dpal 'bar ba zhes bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sems/
77b4(mdo sde): can thams cad la dgongs pa grags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs/rtsol rab shar phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje grags pa dga' ba can zhes bya ba yod de/
77b5(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yid tshim par mdzad pa rtsal rab grags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so//rtsal rab
77b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan 'di dag legs par rab tu bzung bar bya'o//kun chub par bya'o//bcang bar bya'o//rtsal rab sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
77b7(mdo sde): thams cad ni yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan mod kyi/'on kyang rtsal rab de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di dag
78a1(mdo sde): gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni yong su dag pa ste/snyig snga ma rnams dang bral ba yin no//rtsal rab khyod kyis gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
78a2(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di dag gi mtshan rnams blangs nas 'dzin na des yon tan gyi khyad par de dag dang gzhan dag tu'ang 'gyur te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
78a3(mdo sde): kyi mtshan 'di dag ni sngon gyi smon lam gyi yon tan dang ldan pa yin pa'i phyir ro//nub mo srong la zer na 'ang khyod kyis mtshan 'di dag bsam par bya'o//ldang ba na'ang bsam par
78a4(mdo sde): bya'o//'jig rten gyi bya ba gang ci'ang rung ba dag rtsom pa dag na'ang thams cad la mtshan 'di dag bsam nas de'i 'og tu brtsams na der yang khyed la 'phel ba nyid du 'gyur gyi 'grib
78a5(mdo sde): par ni ma yin par shes par bya ste/'dis khyod gnas par gyis shig/de nas lid tsa bi'i bu rtsal rab kyis bstan pa 'di thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/rab tu dga'
78a6(mdo sde): nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba smos te/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan 'di dag yongasu rjod cing rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog brgyad stong gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon
78a7(mdo sde): par gtor te bskor ba byas naso//de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan yongasu brjod pa bkra shis brgyad pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung ste bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song ngo //
78b1(mdo sde): de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur nas 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom
78b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das bdag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan yongasu brjod pa bkra shris brgyad pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyam su blangs lag so//khacom ldan 'das kyis bka'
78b3(mdo sde): sA lA bA/kau shi ka de'i phyir khyod kyis lha dang /lha ma yin g.yul 'gyed pa na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongasu brjod par bya'o//yongasu brjod pa na lha'i dbang po khyod rgyal bar 'gyuraro//
78b4(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan yongasu brjod pa gang yin pa 'di ni bde zhing 'jigs pa med par yongasu brjod pa yin pa'i phyir ro//mtshan songasu brjod pa gang
78b5(mdo sde): yin pa 'di ni kun nas lhung ba med par yongasu brjod pa yin pa'i phyir ro//de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan yongasu brjod pa gang yin pa 'di ni yang dag pa'i mtshan yongasu brjod pa
78b6(mdo sde): yin pa'i phyir ro//de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan yongasu rjod pa gang yin pa 'di ni g.yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das par yongasu brjod pa yin pa'i phyir ro//de
78b7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan yongasu brjod pa gang yin pa 'di ni zil gyis mi non par yongasu brjod pa dang /zhi bar yongasu brjod pa dang /yongasu gdung ba med par yongasu
79a1(mdo sde): brjod pa dang /'jigs pa med par yongasu brjod pa yin pa'i phyir ro//de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod par
79a2(mdo sde): phyir/bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog man+dA rA ba dag gis mngon par gtor nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te lan gsum bskor ba byas na
79a3(mdo sde): yid dga' ba dang /sems dge ba dang /sems sgrib pa med pa dang /sems kun nas ldang ba med pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshon yongasu brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
79a4(mdo sde): yid la byad bzhin du slad kyis kyang bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal mthong bar gyur cig ces tshig tu smras nas/sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan
79a5(mdo sde): 'das kyi thad nas dong ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/lid tsa bi'i bu rtsal rab dang /lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang /lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin dang /
79a6(mdo sde): dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//'phags pa bkra shis brgyad pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs
79a7(mdo sde): so////rgya gar skad du/Ar+ya bud d+ha a nu smr-i ti/bod skad du/'phags pa sangs rgyas rje su dran pa/sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams
79b1(mdo sde): cad la phyag 'tshal lo//'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/bad
79b2(mdo sde): bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha la sgyur ba bla na med pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das so//de bzhin gshegs pa de dag
79b3(mdo sde): ni bsod nams dag gi rgyu mthun pa/dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams chud mi za ba/bzod pas brgyan pa/bsod nams kyi gter rnams kyi gzhi/dpe byad bzang po rnams kyis spras pa mtshan
79b4(mdo sde): rnams kyi me tog rgyas pa/spyod yul ran par mthun pa/mthong na mi mthun pa med pa/dad pas mos pa rnams mngon par dga' ba/shes rab zil gyis mi non pa/stobs rnams
79b5(mdo sde): la brjid pa med pa/sems can thams cad kyi ston pa/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yab/'phags pa'i gang zag rnams kyi rgyal po/mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'gro/
79b6(mdo sde): ba rnams kyi deng dpon/ye shes dpag tu med pa/spobs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/gsung rnam par dag pa/dbyangs snyan pa/sku byed lta bas chog mi shes pa/sku mtshungs pa ming
79b7(mdo sde): pa/'dod pa dag gis ma gos pa/gzugs dag gis nye bar ma gos pa/gzugs med pa dag dang ma 'dres po/sdug bsngal los rnam par grol ba/phung po dag las rab tu
80a1(mdo sde): rnam par grol ba/khams rnams dang mi ldan pa/skye mched rnams bsdams pa/mdud pa rnams shin tu bcad pa/yongasu gdung ba dag las rnam par grol
80a2(mdo sde): ba/sred pa las shin tu grol ba/chu bo las rgal ba/ye shes yongasu rdzogs pa/'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye
80a3(mdo sde): shes la gnas pa/mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas pa/yang dag pa nyid kyi mtha' la gnas pa/sems can thams cad la gzigs pa'i sa la bzhugs pa ste/'di
80a4(mdo sde): dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes yang dag pa'i che ba'i yon tan yin no//'phags pa sangs rgyas rje su dran pa rdzogs so///
80a5(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/d+harma a nu smr-i ti/bod skad du/chos rje su dran pa/sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//dam pa'i chos ni legs par
80a6(mdo sde): gsungs pa/tshangs par spyod pa/thog mar dag ba/bar du dge ba/tha mar dag pa/don bzang po/tshig 'bru bzang po/ma 'dres pa/yong su rdzogs pa/yong su dag pa/yongasu byang
80a7(mdo sde): ba/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos 'dul ba legs par gsungs pa/yang dag par thob pa/nad med pa/dus chad pa med pa/nye bar gtod pa/'di mthong ba la
80b1(mdo sde): don yod pa/mkhas pa rnams kyis rang gis rig par bya ba/chos 'dul ba legs par bstan pa/nges par 'byung ba/rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gro bar byed pa/mi mthun pa med cing
80b2(mdo sde): mthun pa dang ldan pa/rten pa dang ldan pa'o//rgyun la mchod pa'o//chos rjesu dran pa rdzogs so///rgya gar skad du/song+ga a nu smr-i ti/bod skad du/
80b3(mdo sde): dge 'dun rje su dran pa sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo//'phags pa'i dge 'dun ni legs par zhugs pa/rigs par zhugs pa
80b4(mdo sde): mthun par zhugs pa/drang por zhugs po/phyag 'tshal ba'i 'os su gyur pa/thal mo sbyar ba'i 'os su gyur pa/yon tan yongasu byang ba chen po/yon yongasu sbyong ba/sbyin pa'i
80b5(mdo sde): 'os su gyur pa/kun gyi sbyin pa'i 'os su gyur pa'o//dge 'dun rjesu dran pa rdzogs so///sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyagro 'tshalo//
80b6(mdo sde): 'di skad bdag gis thos po dus cig na/bcom ldan 'das yul spong byed ni/ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang /grong skyil bu can du byon te/grong spyil bu can gyi grong gi byang
80b7(mdo sde): phyogs kyi shing sA la'i tshal na/dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag
81a1(mdo sde): 'di dag ni tshul khrims yin no//'di ni ting nge 'dzin yin no//'di ni shes rab yin no//dge slong dag tshul khrims la goms par byas na/ting 'dzin la
81a2(mdo sde): yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro//ting nge 'dzin la goms par byas na/shes rab thob par 'gyur/shes rab la goms par byas na/'di lta ste/'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /
81a3(mdo sde): gti mug dag las sems yang dag pa kho nar rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro//de ltar sems yang dag pa kho nar rnam par gol ba'i 'phags pa'i nyan thos kyis ni bdag gi
81a4(mdo sde): zag pa 'di zad do//tshangs par spyod pa ni bsten to//bya ba ni byas so//'di las srid pa gzhan mi shes so zhes yang dag pa kho nar shes par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis de
81a5(mdo sde): skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//bslab pa gsum gyi mdo rdzogs so///
81a6(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/Ar+ya kA ya traM nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/bod skad du/'phags pa sku gsum zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams
81a7(mdo sde): cod la phyag 'tsha lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod phung po'i ri la bzhug so//byang chub sems dpa' tshad med
81b1(mdo sde): grangs mod pa dang /lha dang /klu dang /'khor thams cad dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/bcom ldan 'das la bkur stir bgyid cing mchod do//de'i tshe 'khor der byang chub sems dpa'
81b2(mdo sde): se'i snying po 'dug pa stan las ldangs nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das la sku du mnga'/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sa'i snying po
81b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la sku gsum mnga' ste/chos kyi sku dang /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang /sprul pa'i sku'o//rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
81b4(mdo sde): gsum ni rang bzhin rnam par dag pa ni chos kyi sku'o//ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pa ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o//spyod pa rnam par drag pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprul pa'i
81b5(mdo sde): sku'o//rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku ni na mkha' ltar rang bzhin med pa'i dran no//longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ni sprin ltar 'byung ba'i dron no//sprul pa'i sku
81b6(mdo sde): ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phrin las te/char pa lta bu ste thams cad 'ongs pa'i don no//bcom ldan 'das lo byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to//
81b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gsum gyi bshad pa ji ltar blta bar bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po la bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu de bzhin ga
82a1(mdo sde): /pa'i sku gsum ni 'di ltar blta bar bya'o//chos kyi sku ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo gang la blta bar bya'o//ljongs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ni byang chub sems
82a2(mdo sde): dpa'i ngo gang la blta bar bya'o//sprul pa'i sku ni mos pas spyod pa'i so so skye bo'i ngo gang la blta bar bya'o//rigs kyi bu chos kyi sku ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang rang bzhin mthun
82a3(mdo sde): par gnas so//long+ga spyod rngo Da pa'i sgo ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang tingange 'dzin mthun par gnas so//sprul pa'i sku ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang phrin las mthun par gnaso//
82a4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu kun gzhi gnasu dag po ni me long lta bu'i ye shes te chos kyi sku'o//nyon mongs pa'i yid gnas su dag pa ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so//yid kyi rnam par shes
82a5(mdo sde): pa gnasu dag pa ni so sor kun tu rtog pa'i ye shes te longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o//sgo lnga'i rnam par shes pa gnas su dag pa ni bya ba grub pa'i ye shes te sprul pa'i
82a6(mdo sde): sku'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la dam pa'i chos thos
82a7(mdo sde): pa ni rab tu leg so//bde bar gshegs pa rab tu legaso//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang gis
82b1(mdo sde): ra tu 'dzin pa des bsod nams tshad med brjod du med grangs med cing dpag tu med pa thob bo//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'
82b2(mdo sde): si'i snying po dang /lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//'phags pa sku gsum
82b3(mdo sde): zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//rgya gar skad du/Ar+yA tri skAn+ta kan+t+ra ma mA hA yA na sUtAM/drod skad du/'phags pa phung
82b4(mdo sde): po gsum la zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshol lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus cig na/bcom
82b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das chos kyi dbye dgon pa na bzhugs te/'das po dang /mi byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ye shes chen pos legs par thugs su chud
82b6(mdo sde): de'i blo mapar bya/sangs rgyus thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid brnyes pa/chos kyi sku gnyi su med pa la brten cing gnas pa/na mkha'i dkyil yul du gyur cing thug pa med pa'i
82b7(mdo sde): ye shes mnga' ba/chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rab tu zhugs pa'i sku dang ldan pa chos kyi cod pan chags pa med pa mtshig dam pa dri ma med pas bcings pa/so so yang
83a1(mdo sde): /dag par rig pa chen porjesu bsgrags pas shin tu rnam par bye ba'i dbyings tsan+d+ra/bsod nams mi zad pa'i mdzod kyis ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor yangs
83a2(mdo sde): shing 'od gsal ba/nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos thugasu chud pas mi rten par gnas po/chos kyi dbyings thams cad du shin tu rnam par grol ba'i ye shes kyi sku dang ldan
83a3(mdo sde): pa/bskal pa bye ba dpag tu med par yon tan gyi chos yongasu brjod kyang mi zad cing thug pa med pa'i yon tan gyi bsngags pa bstan pa'i khyad par brnyes pa de dag la phyag
83a4(mdo sde): 'tshal lo//de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad snyed kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang rnams las de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i tshul khrims kyi yon
83a5(mdo sde): tan gyi bsngags pa phun sum tshogs pa las brtsams te/bskal pa mtha' yo ba bsngags pa brjod kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de'i tshul khrims kyi yon tan gyi bsngags
83a6(mdo sde): pa phun sum tshogs pa'ang mi zad cing thug pa ma mchis la de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi spyobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa la'ang thug pa ma mchis te/de ltar
83a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshul khrims dpag tu ma mchis pa de dag la mos pa'i mchog gis mos so//gtso bo dang /dam pa dang /khyad par du 'phags pa dang /
83b1(mdo sde): dang /phul dang /rgyanas pa dang /zlu ma dang /blan ma mchos pa dang /mnyam pa ma mchis pa dang /mo mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang /mtshungs pa ma mtsho smra ba dang /snang ba ma mchis pa da /
83b2(mdo sde): bdag nyid chen po dang /zil gyis mi non pa dang /yon tan gyi chos thams cad sdud pa dang /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa'i mas pas lhag par mos so//
83b3(mdo sde): tshul khrims la ji lta ba de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin dang /shes rab dang rnam par grol ba dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dang /de bzhin du byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen
83b4(mdo sde): po dang /dga' bu chen po dang /btang snyoms chen po dang /de bzhin du stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yod dag par 'byung ba'i bar dag
83b5(mdo sde): lhag par mos so//myos nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la phyag 'tshal lo//bstod do//bkur ro//bstsogs so//rab tu bsngags so//'drud do//rab tu 'dud do//phyag
83b6(mdo sde): bgyi'o//gzhol lo//blta'o//brtag go//byams pa'i lus kyi las dang /byams pa'i ngag gi las dang /byams pa'i yid kyi las oM shes ston du 'gro ba dang /kun tu bzang ba dang /
83b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi rgyun gyi lus kyi las dang /ngag gi las dang /yid kyi las kyi sa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la phyag 'tshal lo//bstod do/bkur ro//bsngags so//
84a1(mdo sde): /rab tu bsngags so//'dud do//rab tu 'dud do//phyag bgye'o//gzhol lo//blta'o//brtag go//dmigs pa dpag tu ma mchis pa dang ldan pa'i me tog
84a2(mdo sde): dang /spos dang /phreng ba dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /chos gos dang /gaudugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /mar me dang /bkod pa dang /lhab lhub dang /mchod rten rtsig pa
84a3(mdo sde): dang /sku gzugs bgyi ba dang /rin po che dang /rgyan dang /bzhon pa dang /'chags dang /gtsug lag khang dang /yo byad thams cad bkod pa rnam par dag pa rgya chen po 'di dag gis
84a4(mdo sde): kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la bsti stang du bgyi'o//btsun par bgyi'o//ri mor bgyi'o//mchod do//gsol lo//rim gror bgyi'o//mchod pa mos pa'i stobs las dum
84a5(mdo sde): par byung ba/khamasna gsum pa las shin tu 'ongs pa/nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i chos las byung ba/mngon par 'du bgyid pa ma mchis pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa/ye
84a6(mdo sde): shes sgyu ma las shin tu yongasu grub pa/lus sgyu ma las shin tu rnam par phye ba/gnas thams cad las shin tu spangs pa/'jig rten sgyu ma l-is byung ba/ngo bo nyid kyi
84a7(mdo sde): chos dang 'brel pa/yang dag por rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa'i mchod pas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la bsti stang du bgyi'o//btsun par bgyi'o///
84b1(mdo sde): ram+bAr ba gyib+h+yo/mchod phrugasol lo//rim g+hor bgyi'o//gong du'ang byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyud bsab par 'tshal ba/sems can gyi rgyud yongasu smin par
84b2(mdo sde): bgyid par 'tshal la/zhing gi rgyud rnam par sbyong bar 'tshal b+ha/las kyi rgyud dang mi 'gol bar 'tshal ba/chos kyi rgyud rab tu rnam par 'byed par 'tshal ba/dus gsum gyi rgyud yongs
84b3(mdo sde): rtogs par 'tshal ba/phyogs kyi rgyud la rab tu 'jug par 'tshal ba/'dod chags ma mchis pa'i rgyud la rab tu 'a god par 'tshal ba/mos pa'i rgyud rnam par skyong bar 'tshol ba/
84b4(mdo sde): dbang po'i rgyus pa lta bar 'tshal ga chos kyi dbyings kyi 'khor lo la rnam par 'phrub por 'tshal pa/'gro ba'i 'khor lo thams cad bsdu bar 'tshol ba'i byang chub sems dpa'
84b5(mdo sde): rnams kyis ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gis spangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa chags pa mi mnga' zhing sgrib pa mi mnga' bas mkhyen cing rab tu mkhyen pa de lta bus de bzhin
84b6(mdo sde): ga shags pa de dag la mchod par bgyi ba de bzhin du bdag gis kyang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa'i mchod pa/byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil
84b7(mdo sde): 'khor thams cad rab tu dga' bar bgyid pa/byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa rab 'byams las nges par byung ba/byang chub sems dpa' ye shes bla ma
85a1(mdo sde): /gnas pa'i yul mye su zhugs pas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par bgyi'o//de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyi slad du de bzhin
85a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa la mchod pa dang /rim gro bgyi ba gtsug gi bla ma zhes bgyi bas 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du 'dug ste/de bzhin gshegs pA la
85a3(mdo sde): mchod pa 'di lta ste/pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba/ma skyes pa'i chos las byung ba/byang chub sems dpa'i rigs btsun par skyes pa'i ye shes kyi mig gis rig pa/
85a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pos 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyingasu gtogs pa ming gis khyab pa mang po drag na chos kyi dbyings rgyas
85a5(mdo sde): par 'gongs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams dang /na mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs po chos kyi dbyi su gtogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnamasu 'jug
85a6(mdo sde): de bas gong du'ang mchod pa yon tan dpag tu ma mchis pa dang ldan pa/dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po'i shugs kyis bskyed pa/rdo rje'i dbang po snang bar bgyid pa/sangs rgyas kyi
85a7(mdo sde): yul thams cad du snang ba'i me tog gi rgyal po'i ye shes las byung ba'i mchod pas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la bsti stang du ribye'o//btsun par bgyi'o//ri mor
85b1(mdo sde): bgyi'o//mchod do//gsol lo//rim gror bgyi'o//ji ltar bdag gi don du mchod pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam ma lus pa thams cad na sems can dzi nam
85b2(mdo sde): sems can gyi res na mchis pa/sems can gyi khams de dag thams cad kyi ched du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la mchod par bgyi'o//de ltar bdag de bzhin gshegs
85b3(mdo sde): pa la mchod pa'i stobs kyis bslan pa'i sems bskyed pa/byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen pos nye bar bstan pa/'gro ba thams cad yongasu bskyab pa'i smon lam dang ldan
85b4(mdo sde): pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi brlabs kyi mdzod kyi rjesu zhugs par gyur/shes rab dang /thabs kyi stobs chen pos yongasu bzung bar gyur/bdud kyi
85b5(mdo sde): lam dang yul thams cad las yang dag por 'das par gyur nas sgrib par 'gyur ba'i las thams cad bshags par bgyi ste/gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
85b6(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa dang /gang sems can dam pa rnams kyis rnam par spangs pa dang /gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis smad pa dang /gang byang chub sems dpa' rnams
85b7(mdo sde): kyis yongasu spangs pa dang /gang 'phags pa rnams kyis bshud pa dang /gang mkhas pa rnams dang zhe 'gras pa dang /gang rig pa rnams kyis bor ba 'dod chags dang /zhe
86a1(mdo sde): nasdung dang /gti mug gis rab tu gzir ba'i dbang gis byung ba 'am/nga rgyal dang /'chab pa dang /'khon du 'dzin pa'i dbang gis byung ba'am/phrug dog dang /
86a2(mdo sde): ser sna dang /mya ngan gyi dbang gis byung ba 'am sgyu dang g.yo'i dbang gis byung ba 'am/mngon par zhen pa'i stobs kyis byung ba 'di lta ste/las kyi sgrib pa 'am/chos kyi sgrib pa'am/
86a3(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa 'am/lta ba'i sgrib pa'am/mi shes pa'i sgrib pa 'am/rnam par smin pa'i sgrib pa 'am/chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i sgrib pa 'am/nyan thos dang /
86a4(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i sgrib pa 'am/theg pa chen po'i bar chad du 'gyur ba'i sgrib pa 'am/dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sogs pa la gnod pa'i sgrib pa 'am/
86a5(mdo sde): sdig pa'i grogs po dang 'dre ba'i sgrib pa 'am/byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i smon lam yongasu rdzogs par bgyi ba la sgrib pa dang chod pa'ang rung ste/
86a6(mdo sde): sgrib pa'i las bgyis shing bsogs pa sgrib po'i kun nas ldang ba gang gis sems can dmyal bar mchi bar 'gyur ba dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnasu mchi bar 'gyur ba dang /
86a7(mdo sde): yi dgas kyi yul du mchi bar 'gyur ba dang /lha dbul por skye bar 'gyur ba dang /sangs rgyas la lta ba yongasu mi 'dzin pa dang /chos mnyan pa yongasu mi len pa dang /
86b1(mdo sde): do na gshegs pa dang /chos dang /dge 'dun dkon mchog mngon par mi rig par 'gyur ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' dang 'grogs pa mi 'thob par 'gyur ba dang /dge
86b2(mdo sde): ba'i ni shes gnyen yang dag pas yongasu bzung ba mi rnyed par 'gyur ba dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba chab 'tshal ba yongasu 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang /byang chub kyi sems brjed par 'gyur ba
86b3(mdo sde): dang /pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam mI nyan par 'gyur ba dang /bdud sdig can rnams kyis 'joms par 'gyur ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos theg rong du bgyid par 'gyur ba dang /dag
86b4(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad brtsam pa'i sbyor ba las rnam par ldog par 'gyur ba dang /dge ba'i bshes gnyen la 'khu bar 'gyur ba dang /bsam pa yongasu dag pa miSh+Ta thog dang /
86b5(mdo sde): dran pa brjed pa ma mchis pa mi 'thob pa dang /chos lnga lte ba mi 'thob pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi rnam par sprul pa la mi mo sa pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la yid gnyis
86b6(mdo sde): 'tshal bar 'gyur ba dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo khong du mi chud pa dang /sa nas sngar gnas pa mi 'thob pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' dang 'grogs pa mi 'thob pa dang /
86b7(mdo sde): rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i las byis pa dang ldan pa khong du mi rgud pa dang /smon lam chen po las nur bar 'gyur ba dang /spyod pa yongasu dag pa mi
87a1(mdo sde): 'thob pa dang /gzungs kyi rgyun gyi snang ba mi 'thob pa dang /spobs pa'i rgyan gyi snang ba khong du mi chud pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i
87a2(mdo sde): spyod pa'i smon lam la yongasu 'dres par bgyi ba khong du mi chud pa dang /chos mnyam pa nyid mi rtogs pa dang /bsod nams mnyam pa nyid mi skyed pa dang /ye shes mnyam pa
87a3(mdo sde): nyid khong du mi chud pa dang /'khor ba'i chos rnams kyis kun tu gzhom par 'gyur ba'i sgrib pa de lta bu la sogs pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang /yon tan
87a4(mdo sde): gyi chos thams cad kun tu sgrub pa la mi phyogs par 'gyur ba'i sgrib pa'i 'gebs pa grangs ma mchis pa 'bum phrag bcu po de dag dus gsum du gtogs pa'i
87a5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad chos kyi dbyingasu 'dus pa/ye shes gzigs pa sgrib pa mi mnga' ba/chags pa ma mchis pa'i mig gi yul brnyes pa/mnyam pa nyid
87a6(mdo sde): kyi rje su zhugs pa'i sku dang ldan pa/chos kyi dbyingos mun pa ma mchis par zhugs pa'i ye shes kyi spyan brnyes pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi spyan sngar bdag
87a7(mdo sde): mngon sum du gyur par mos nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul tshad med par brtags te/skra'i rtse mo'i tsha shas bzhag pa'i khyon tsam re re la de bzhin gshegs pa sems can
87b1(mdo sde): thams cad snyed du lhag par mes so//skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas gcig bzhag pa'i khyon la ji lta bu de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings thams cad du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams
87b2(mdo sde): cad sred du lhag par mos de bzhin gshegs pa re re la'ang lus thob pa 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems snyed kyis zho bos kyi 'og tu gdugs te phyag 'tshal lo//lus thob pa re re la
87b3(mdo sde): 'ang mgo ngag gi 'am nges pa'i tshig snyed du lhag par mos so//mgo raM re la 'dra kha'i sgro zhing thams cad kyi rdul rab tu dbye ba snyed du lhag par mos so//kha'i sgo re re la'ang
87b4(mdo sde): lce'i rtse mo zhing thams cad kyi rdul phra rab tu dbye ba snyed du lhag par mos so//lce'i rtse mo'i dkyil 'khor re re la'ang nges pa'i tshig gi sgrar brtags pa'i tha snyad yang dag par rdzogs
87b5(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa/'gro po thams cad kyi tshig gi spyod pa dang mnyam pas sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i dkyil 'khor dang mthun par gyur nas lhag pa'i bsam pa nyon
87b6(mdo sde): mongs pa'i ri chen po rnam par 'thor ba las byung ba'i sgrib par 'gyur ba'i las de dag 'chags so//mi 'chab po/'jig rten gyi khyams thams cad du 'tshal bur 'gyur ba'i bshakra
87b7(mdo sde): pas 'chag so//bsal lo//rnam par gzhig go/rab tu gzhom mo//spang ngo //gnon to//las la dbang bas dbang bgyi'o//stobs bskyed pa brnyes pa rnams kyi bde ba nye bar bstan
88a1(mdo sde): dru grum su da sa skyed ba / na pa mas sgyu ya dag shA rA ts+tsha nas mi spyo pa'i
88a2(mdo sde): dug myur 'dzin par 'tshal la pha rol tu phyin pa thams dzin ma rdzogs pa bgyidachem te/thams can thams cad yod sbyin par b+hi par tshal gyi
88a3(mdo sde): sgrib par 'gyur ba'i las bshags la dugyub ba'i dzin dan mau dag par gyur
88b1(mdo sde): /gdul bar 'gyur pa dang //nam tho rnam mchis par 'gyur ba dang /gsal bar 'gyur du dang /dugs mdzes par byur ba dang /sgrub pa ma mchis spya 'gyur ba dang /byar dru gcod pa ma
88b2(mdo sde): mchis par 'gyur dang /son tan gyi chos thams cad sgrub par 'gyur ba de lta bur sgrib par 'gyur ba'i las kyi ltos pa thams cad 'chag so//ji ltar bdage gidon du shegs
88b3(mdo sde): bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam myu lus pa thams cad ni sems cani rje tsam sems can gyi ris na mchis pa sems can gyi khams de drug thams cad kyi tshod du
88b4(mdo sde): s+thi byar 'gyur ba'i chos kyi nyes pa 'chagos so//de ltar bdag gi lus kyi skyes pa hU~Mb par 'gyur ba thams parnas sor bshags nas sgrib bya ma mchis pa rnam phyur dag de'i kyi
88b5(mdo sde): khor la gnas te/'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rgyu la rjesu yi rang //dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyi khyad pa gang gis dran skyong dbul po yi dgas kyi mi khom par mkhyen
88b6(mdo sde): thams cad rnam par bzlog pa de la'ang rjes yi rang ngo //skye ma la gnod pa ma mchis shing 'dogs lta 'o//dge ba'i rgyu ba'i chogasngas khyad par gang gis ngan spyod du 'gron gyi
88b7(mdo sde): gnas kyi mi khom par mchi ba thams cad rnam par bzlog pa de la'ang rje su yi rang ngo //dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyi khyad par gang gis sems can dmyal ba'i mi kho ma
89a1(mdo sde): mchi ba thams cad rnam par bzlog pa de la'ang rje su yi rang ngo //bzang po'i gnas dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyi khyad par gang gis lha dang mir skyo ba thams cad
89a2(mdo sde): yo su 'dzin pa de la 'du rje su yi rangango //dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyi khyad par gang gis bsam gtan gyi dga' ba dang mgu bo dang bde ba thams cad myong ba do la'ang rjesu
89a3(mdo sde): rad //dge de'i rtswa ba'i tshogs kyi khyud pa gang gis 'khor du la yod 'byung ba'i sems thob pa de la bud hUM su m+b+hi rang //dge ba rgyu ba'i tshogs kyi khyad par gang gos
89a4(mdo sde): dge ba'i bshes gnyen yang dag pos yongasu bzung ba thob pa de la'ang d+he suM yi rang ngo //dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyi khyad par gang gis dge ba'i bsheso gnyen rnams la
89a5(mdo sde): gus pa'i sems skyed pa de la 'ang rje su yi rang ngo //dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyi khyad par gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par bgyid de/mnyes
89a6(mdo sde): nas mi mnyes par mi 'gyur bya de la 'ang rje su yi rang ngo //dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyi khyad par gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams las chos bstan pa mngon
89a7(mdo sde): sum du nyan cing thos nas kaus mi nyi dang /yid gnyis bzlog ba de la'ang rjes yo rong ngo //dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyi khyad per gang gis 'jig rten gsum pa thams
89b1(mdo sde): cad nas 'byung ba rtogs pa de la'ang rje su yi rang ngo //dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyi khyad par glang gis sems can thams cad kyi ston pa'i sems bskyed pa snyed pa de la'ang rje su yi rang ngo //dge
89b2(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyi khyad par gang gos 'gro ba thams cad thogs pa ma mchis pa'i mig thob pa de la 'ang rje su yi rang ngo //dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshotshigs kyi khyad par gang gis ngos mnyam
89b3(mdo sde): pa'i rjesu mchi ba smon lom chen po yongasu dag par bgyid pa de la 'ang rje su yi rang ngo //dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyi khyad par gang gis lus mtshan dang /dpe byad bzang pos legs par
89b4(mdo sde): brgyan pa thob pa de la 'ang rje su yi rang ngo //dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyi khyad par gang gis yon tan thams cad rnam por dag pa'i rgyan dag yongasu dag pa thob po de la 'ang rje su yi rang ngo ///
89b5(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyi khyad par gang gis stobs bcus brgyan po'i sems rin po che thob pa de la'ang rje su yi rang ngo //dge bo'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyi khyad par gang gis thams cad
89b6(mdo sde): mkhyen pa nyid kyi shugs las phyir mi ldog pa thob pa de la 'ang rje su yi rang ngo //dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyi khyad par gang gis gzud kyi rigs khong du chud pa de la'ang rje su yi
89b7(mdo sde): rang ngo //dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyi khyad par gang gis chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa khong du chud pa de la 'ong rje su yi rang ngo //dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyi khyad par gang gis
90a1(mdo sde): rnam par smin pa mi zad pa la gnas te//mngon par shes pa thob pa de la 'ang rje skye yi rang ngo //dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyi khyad par gang gis sangs rgyas/
90a2(mdo sde): kyi zhing gi rgyan bsgrub pa khong du chud pa de la 'angadra rje su yi rang ngo //dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyi khyad par gang gis bdud kyi rtsod pa'i dmag tshogs thams cad rab tu bcom nas khyu
90a3(mdo sde): mchog tu gyur pa khong du chud pa de la'ang rje su yi rang ngo //dge ba'i rtsa ba nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos mnyam pa nyid las skyes pa'i rigs pa dang /rnams
90a4(mdo sde): par grol ba dang /'dod chags dang bral ba dang /zag pa ma mchis pa dang ldan pa gang lags pa de dag la 'ang rjesu yi rang ngo //byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dge ba'i
90a5(mdo sde): rtsa ba gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad dang ldan pa nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub khong du chud pa dang ldan pa'i bar gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba
90a6(mdo sde): de dag la'ang rje su yi rang ngo //de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyi slad du/de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang /rim gror bgyi ba byang chub sems dpa'
90a7(mdo sde): dbang bskur ba rnams kyi khyad par du 'gro ba zhes bgyi bas 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du 'jug pa gang lags pa de la 'ang rje su yi rang ngo //de bzhin
90b1(mdo sde): gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyi slad du de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang /rim gror bgyi ba byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas mchog na gnas pa rnams kyi khyad
90b2(mdo sde): bar du 'gro ba zhes bgyi bas 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du 'jug pa gang lags pa de la 'ang rje su yi rang ngo //de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyi slad du
90b3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang /rim gro bgyi ba byang chub sems da mngal na gnas pa rnams kyi bsod nams kyi me tog rgyas pa'i snying po snang ba zhes bgyi bas 'jig rten
90b4(mdo sde): gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du 'jug pa gang lags pa de la'ang rje su yi rang ngo //de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyi slad du de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang /
90b5(mdo sde): rim gro bgyi ba byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam pa na gnas pa byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i gtsug gi bla ma zhes bgyi bas 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams
90b6(mdo sde): cad du 'jug po gang lagos pa de la 'ang rje su yi rang ngo //yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dus gsum du gshegs pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thabs mkhas pa bsam
90b7(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab pas rnam par 'phrul pa dang ldan pa gang lags pa de la'ang rje su yi rang ngo //gong du 'ang byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyis rtsod pa'i dmag tshogs thams cad rab tu gdul
91a1(mdo sde): bar 'chal ba/phas kyi rgol ba'i tshogs thams cad zil gyis gnon par 'tshal ba/ma rig pa'i mun pa mun gnag dang /rab rib kyi ling tog mang ba
91a2(mdo sde): sel bar 'tshal ba ngan song dang /mi khom pa dang /ngan 'gro'i lam thams cad gcod par 'tshal ba/ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par sbyong bar 'tshal ba/chos
91a3(mdo sde): thams cad snang ba thob par 'tshal ba/kun tu bzang po'i lus khyu mchog tu gyur pa thob par 'tshal ba/'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du tshim par bgyid pa'i dbyungs
91a4(mdo sde): kyi yan lag rnam par dag pa thob par 'tshal ba/chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs par bgyi ba'i slad du ye shes kyi mig rnam par sbyong ba 'tshal ba/'asngo ba'i 'khor lo bzlog lnga 'tshal go chos
91a5(mdo sde): kyilalho lo tsA bol tu skor bar 'tshal ba/stobs bcu'i ye shes kyis gnon par 'tshal ba rnams kyis ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dog gis sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa chags
91a6(mdo sde): pa mi mnga' zhing sgrib pa mi mnga' bas mkhyen cing rab tu mkhyen pa de lta bus dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad la rje su yi rang bar bgyi ba de bzhin du bdag kyang rjesu yi
91a7(mdo sde): rang bar bgyi ba de bzhin du bdag kyang rje su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rje su ya rang ngo //gtso bo dang /dam pa dang /khyad par du 'phags pa dang /rab dang /phul dang /gya nom pa
91b1(mdo sde): drung /b+h+ra ma dang /blan ma mchis pa dang /mnyam pa ma mchis pa dang /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang /mtshungs pa ma mtshos pa dang /snang ba ma mchis pa dang /bdag nyid chen po dang /
91b2(mdo sde): zil gyis mi non pa dang /yon tan gyi chos thams cad sdud pa dang /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa'i rje su yi ring ngo //ji ltar bdag gi don rje su yi rang ba de
91b3(mdo sde): bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam ma lus pa thams cad na sems can ji tsam pa sems can gyi ris na mchis pa sems can gyi khams de dag thams cad kyi ched du'ang dge
91b4(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad la rje su yo rang ngo //de ltar bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la rje su yi rang nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la bskul lo//da ltar na phyogs
91b5(mdo sde): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs bcu'i mu thug yongasu rje bar 'jug pa/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gzhi phyal ba'i rjesu 'gro zhing 'jug pa/steng g.yogs med pa'i rgyud kyi
91b6(mdo sde): phyogs yong su rje bar bshad pa/'chol po'i rgyud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mngon du sgrub pa/rnam par 'byed pa'i mig 'phrul lta bu chos kyi dbyingasu gtogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
91b7(mdo sde): rab 'byam thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag kha cig bdud kyi rtsod pa'i dmag tshogaso thams cad mngon par btul nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
92a1(mdo sde): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa nyid brnyes pa/byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par gshegs pa/chos kyi
92a2(mdo sde): tshul g.yo ba ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin du gyur pa/chos kyi skur rab tu zhing dang ldan pa dag 'di lta ste/chos gzung bar mdzad pa'i slad du 'jig rten thams cad na bskul ba'i sa
92a3(mdo sde): la gzhes te chos kyi 'khor lo mi skor ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bdag gis bla ma la ri mo gus par bgyi ba chen pos lus btud pa bgyis nas chos kyi
92a4(mdo sde): 'khor lo chen po rab tu bskor bar bskul gyis/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yongasu grub par bgyi ba dang /'gro ba thams cad bskyab pa dang /nyon mongs pa thams cad
92a5(mdo sde): rnam par byang bar bgyi ba dang /som nyi thams cad yang dag par gzhom pa dang /the tshom thams cad kun tu gcad pa dang /sangs rgyas dang /chos dang /dge 'dun thams cad
92a6(mdo sde): rab tu bsgrogs pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du sangs rgyas 'byung ba rgyun mi 'chad par bgyi ba'i slad du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis pha rol tu
92a7(mdo sde): byin pa'i yan lag thams cad shin tu yongasu sbyangs pa/phyir mi zlog pa/stobs bcus zil gyis mi non pa/'khor ba'i 'khor lo rab tu 'jom pa/lta bar gyur pa
92b1(mdo sde): dang /nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu 'jig pa/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhin rje su bsgrags pa shin tu rnam par phye ba'i sgra dang ldan pa/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i tshul nges
92b2(mdo sde): par brtags pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor bar gsol lo//snying rje chen po'i stobs la lhag par dmigs par bgyi ba dang /rang gi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgyun mi
92b3(mdo sde): gcad par bgyi ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i lam thams cad yongasu skyed ba'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la'ang bdag sprul lo//snying rje chen po'i stobs la
92b4(mdo sde): lhag par dmigs par bgyi ba'i slad du nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad la 'ong bdag skul lo//mi dge ba'i chos thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang /dge ba'i chos
92b5(mdo sde): thams cad yongasu rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du sems can thams cad la'ang bdag skul lo//gong du'ang byang chub sems dpa' bskul ba'i phung po dang ldan pa rnams kyis ji ltar
92b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gis sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa chags pa mi mnga' zhing sgrib pa mi mdo' bas mkhyen cing rab tu mkhyen pa de lta bus sangs rgyas thams cad dang //
92b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /sems can thams cad la bo skul bar bgyi ba de bzhin du bdag kyang bskul ba'i mchog
93a1(mdo sde): dang /gtso bo dang /dum pa dang /khyad par du 'phags pa dang /rab dang /phul dang /gya nom pa dang /bla ma dang /bla na ma mchis pa dang /gong nA ma mchis pa
93a2(mdo sde): dang /mnyam pa ma mchis pa dang /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang /mtshungs pa ma mchis pa dang /snang ba ma mchis pa dang /bdag nyid chen po dang /zil gyis mi non pa
93a3(mdo sde): dang /yon tan gyi chos thams cad sdud pa dang /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa'i bskul bas skul lo//ji ltar bdag gi don du bskul ba de
93a4(mdo sde): bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam ma lus pa thams cad na sems can ji tsom sems can gyi ris na mchis pa sems can gyi khams de dag thams cad kyi ched du
93a5(mdo sde): 'ang bskul lo//gong du rang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bdag la mngon par gsol ba da lta na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs bcu'i mu thug yongs
93a6(mdo sde): su N+ye bar 'jug pa/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gzhi phal ba'i rjesu 'gro zhing 'jug pa/steng g.yogs med pa'i rgyud kyi phyogs yongasu rje bar bshad pa/'chol
93a7(mdo sde): de'i rgyud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par sgrub pa/rnam par dbye ba'i mig 'phrul lta bu chos kyi dbying su gtogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad
93b1(mdo sde): na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag kha cig chos kyi 'khor lo dag shin tu bskor ba/gdul ba dag shin tu gtul ba/zam pa dag shin tu btags pa/bstan pa dag shin
93b2(mdo sde): tu byin gyis brlabs pa/byang chub sems dpa' dag shin tu lung bstan pa/sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa dag shin tu mdzad pa/phas kyi rgol ba'i phyogs thams cad shin tu
93b3(mdo sde): tshor gcad pa rje su bstan po rnams shin tu 'phags gzhing thams cad du bsgrags po/'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dag pa'i gnas rnams zhing
93b4(mdo sde): de dang de dag dang /'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam de dang de dag dang /sems can gyi ris de dang de dag na sems can rab 'byam ma gus par gyur pa/dbang po yongasu skyo ba/snod du
93b5(mdo sde): ma gyur pa/de bzhin gshegs pa la lta ba'i rgyan bcad pa/rtag tu chags pa/yul la mngon par dga' ba/'dus byas kyi sgrib pas zin pa/'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la srid pa'i dbang
93b6(mdo sde): du ma chis pa de dang de dag la yul thams cad las bdag med par yang dag par ston cing sems can 'khong ba la mngon par dga' ba rnams yid 'byung ba skyed pa'i phyir dang /'du byed
93b7(mdo sde): thams cad mi rtag par rab tu bstan pa'i ched du 'byor pa thams cad mthar chud pa'i sgor yang dag par sten la/sangs rgyas yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa chen po zhi bar yang dag
94a1(mdo sde): par bstan pa'i ched du srog gi dbang po thams cad mthar 'chi bar yang dag par ston cing de bzhin gshegs pa 'phos te/shin tu bral nas 'jig rten du mi
94a2(mdo sde): dga' ba chen po ston la/lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mdun du yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa chen po ston te/lha'i dbang po thams cad du ba dang /klu'i
94a3(mdo sde): dbang po thams cad mya ngan bgyid pa dang /gnod sbyin gyi dbang po thams cad smre sngags 'don pa dang /'gro ba'i dbang po thams cad rab tu mi dga' ba'i yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa
94a4(mdo sde): chen po lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mdun du ston pa na bdag gis bla ma la rim gro gus pa chen pos lus btud pa bgyis nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan
94a5(mdo sde): 'das de dag la sku tshe bsring ba dang /ring du bzhugs par gsol gyis/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'gro ba thams cad sdug bsngal gyi phung po las bzlog pa dang /

94b1(mdo sde): cad chos dkon mchog gis tshim par bgyi ba dang /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongasu sbyang ba dang /'gro ba thams cad gdul ba mthar thugs pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'
94b2(mdo sde): thams cad yongasu gzung ba'i slad du bskal pa chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/na mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs par bzhugasu gsol/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la

94b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gis ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa chags pa mi mnga' zhing sgrib pa mi mnga' bas mkhyen cing rab tu mkhyen pa de lta bus byang chub sems dpa'
94b7(mdo sde): rnams kyi gus pa de lta bu dang /lus btud pa de lta bu dang /ngag gi las 'byung ba de lta bu dang /yid kyi las sgrub pa de lta bus sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'da' bar
95a1(mdo sde): phyogs par dgongs pa la phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal par sku tshe yongasu bskyang bar mngon par gsol bar bgyi ba de bzhin du bdag kyang gsol lo//

95a3(mdo sde): de dag thams cad kyi ched du'ang mngon par gsol lo//bdag de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par gsol ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs bskyed pa thob par gyur bsam

100b6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa de'ang mi bzhugs so//gong du sems bskyed de bskyed ma thag pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni rab tu mang gi sems can thams cad 'khor los sgyur ba dang /'jig
100b7(mdo sde): rten myong ba dang /brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dang /nyan thos dang /rang so sa rgyu su gyur pa rnams kyi bsod nams kyi phung ba na de tsam ma lag so//bdag gi bsod nams kyi phung po byang chub
101a1(mdo sde): sems bskyed pa dang ldan pa gang lags pa dang /sems can thams cad la rtsal ba gang lags pa dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad la phul ba gang
101a2(mdo sde): lags pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phul ba gang lags pa dang /sangs rgyas thams cad la dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bul ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po yongasu bzung ba
